y ibigemurwa  iy imirimo cyangwa iya serivisi

nyuma y urupfu rwe

yakubiswe na omnibus

kandi butuma impanda ivuga iranguruye 
bo mu buyobozi bari mu bakozi bakuru

umunsi w ubukwe bwanyu   Urukundo rw Imana  igi   
mu gihe ubugenzuzi bwite buri gukorwa

irari ryahindutse ikibi
yumvise ayo magambo agwa mukantu

ngogozi ziba zaremerejwe zigeraho

ntazi uko meze ndumva umutima 
atari kumva amasengesho yabo

ibyo kutuburira kugira ngo tudahakwa na Satani

Urwego Ngenzuramikorere cyangwa ku
Sinigeze ntekereza ko bizarangira gutya 
ahubwo amata abyaye amavuta rwose
Yahamagawe mu bucuruzi
Yatekereje kuri Jeanie mu mva ye
bakivuga neza ku buryo bisa neza
Nuko none dore umwami mwitoranirije kandi
Bobo ntiyakundaga gutura mu mujyi maze asubira mu murima yakuriyemo 
biteganywa hakurikijwe amategeko agenga
Ninde nshuti ansezeranya kutazakwibagirwa
byagateganyo igice cyibikorwa byacu binini binyuze mumiterere yimiterere yinyuguti
Ngiye gukenera ubufasha bwawe kuriyi
Umusatsi wa Tom ni umukara wigituba 
yumvisemo izina ryanjye mbona abuze amahoro 
yinjira muri class yabo
Uzagira saa sita nkiyi
Hariho itegeko rikomeye ribuza kunywa itabi mu buriri 
Mariya yatangiye kumwambura imyenda
Yabifashye abihishye Inyuma yikigega
Agira Simoni na Rwubusisi 
ubukwe bwanjye buzashyingirwa numuntu ugukunda
Sinigeze ntekereza ko nzongera kukubona muzima 
muhishe willia william nawe ati ehee
Niba Trix yigaragaje bizangiza umunsi wa Mukandoli
Ntabwo nari nagiye kure cyane igihe nafatwaga muri douche 
Ku iherezo ryawe uzabona ukuri
minsi ibiri ya nyuma y ikoraniro
Gusaba byagenze
Mwa bana binshira mwe ni nde wababwiye ngo muhunge umujinya uzatera
kellia numujinya mwinshi ati
Adamu yasaga nkaho yavuye mu nzozi
urakozeeee cyaneee ubu ndikumva mbuze uburyo
nimuhange mube abaganga
Ndakeka ko nshobora gukoresha ubwogero 
Ni ryari ngomba gusubiza imodoka 
Aramwereka anyuze muri manhole hasi
Mbaraga yansabye ko nandikira Mariya ubutumwa 
Yarahagaritse ariko iminwa ye ishaje iragenda
Reka twumve umuziki 
numvaga ko abana beza nkawe batakibaho gusa
Sinshaka rwose kuvuga kuri ibyo 
Bakeneye ivugurura mu mirire niminywere 
Muri icyo kigo abantu bakwiriye kwigishwamo 
Bisi imaze kuza aragenda
gukora isuzuma ry ishoramari ryigenga
Kwemera cyane
Wakuye he igikoma ku itama 
Ugomba kwirinda gukora ayo makosa 
Fransisko Nyangezi yatwaraga Ubushiru
Abagabo ntabwo ari amazina yabagabo bonyine
kubafasha kwihangana no kwigomwa ubwabo 
Bana banjye ndabasabye mujye mwumvira
Tom ntabwo yari azi aho Mariya ari

masaha y akazi igatangirwa icyemezo
yagukesheje uyu mugambi wubwenge wo gukemura ubukene

nakazi bakoranaga na papa angella
Amakuru avuga ko yapfuye byarantunguye 
nkurangire aho uzakura ibyangombwa byose kuko narangije kubikwandikaho
Nari gushobora kwishimira umudendezo mu maboko yawe
uha amafaranga bakamukuzanira koko
Siyera Lewone na Gineya
nonese niyo mpamvu ni kellia

Primrose umwana wimfura wa Ver

kugira uruhare mu micungire

yo gucika intege kwimbaraga zintekerezo

ntibazashyikira imico iboneye ya Gikristo

ariko hanze y aho hantu

kuko mukase yaramutotezaga akamukoresha imirimo adashoboye
babwandika nabi ugasanga budasomeka

Tom yari ashishikajwe no kuvugana na Mariya
David akwiriye kwishima 
Tom na Mariya bari bahari
Ingingo ya   Igitabo gikubiyemo uburyo bwo
Umuntu agomba kubwira Bobo ko inama yahagaritswe 
Aho kutaba  byumvikane bakabaza
Iyo nariye umutima wanjye
Sinigeze mbitekereza mbere 
Kaba kubasura bazenguruka
Nigute utambwira ko uri data 
Kubaho udasinziriye mugihe utareba
Kuba indahemuka ku Mana bisobanuye byinshi 
ipfa ryi byokurya byoroheje 
Tom yirukanye ikiganza mu musatsi 
Navuga ko bigabanya hasi gato 
Niba Tom yavuze ko azafasha azabikora 
bushake l agenewe Imana y ukuri
Igicucu icyubahiro cyarazwe cyabakire
Mfashe akantu kanjye gato
Jye na Mary twakomeje kuba inshuti nziza imyaka myinshi
Shaka igihe uba wumva utuje kandi ababyeyi bawe badahuze cyane 
Birakonje cyane Ndatekereza ko ngiye gufata imbeho 
kuzamura udusimba tworoshye ku bitugu
Yahisemo kwimuka uwo munsi nyine 
Nari ngiye kuryama gusa arampamagara 
Ntabwo bishoboka ko iyo firime izinjiza amafaranga menshi 
ndashaka gukora iminsi ibiri
Ibi nibyiza dushobora gukora 
binyuze mu irari ribi nibyifuzo bibi 
Babarira imbabazi za carle zishaje
Turababajwe nuko tudashoboye gutanga icyifuzo cyawe
Ibi birashobora kuba amahirwe yawe yanyuma

cyangwa hari ibikorwa rusange  Ariko
no kwishimira ibyagaciro kiteka ryose bwacogoye

ntimuzirirwe muranshaka kuko mutazambona
Nashakaga kuguha ikintu ariko sinari nzi neza icyo ushaka 
bakorwe n isoni bamwarane  Abishimira ibyago

nkabandi kandi rwose ndagira 
Abwira Labani ati Urabikoze
Numvise umuyaga ukonje mu maso 
Ntabwo yari akeneye gukora ako kazi

abantu bafitanye isano n ikigo cy imari
Ntushobora gukora ibintu batabikubwirije
na salade yutwungu hamwe numugati
Yagambiriye mu mutima we ko ataziyandurisha
Noneho nonaha hanyuma mu maso hakeye
Nzi neza umuziki we 
Ku munsi wejo wasinziriye iki

iyo baza gukurikiza amabwiriza yo kwirinda 
Sinshaka gukomeza nta umwanya wanjye

Nishimiye ko yarangije

Hamwe no kudashyira mu gaciro ibitekerezo bye
Mu kanya gato mugihe izuba rirenze icyuma

Amatara yazo azunguruka buri gihe
Nanga gukoresha ibyago ariko nta kundi nabigenza 
naramwegereye ngo mukoreho numve niba akirimo akuka
Abagore basa nkabakunda kubwimpamvu runaka 
impuhwe zawe ninkiza bihehe
naho waba uboheshejwe ubwoya bw intama

reka mbereke ko mfite gahunda

nkindabyo amababi meza Niba amababa

twakomeje kuganira namwe murabyumva uko twari tumerewe

Icyitonderwa ku Bantu Bagira Ibibahugije Cyane
Chris ahora yambara amashati yubururu
Nkuko umwizera afungura Bibiliya ye
Yantumye kubaza yaba nyinanyoni yagaruka
basinziriye nibwo yahise akubita ku mutwe ya mva 
Hariho amakimbirane ahoraho nubwicanyi
Igihe kirekire igiti kiri mu bendera cye kireba
Icyambabaje cyane ntabwo yaje 
Iyo dufite ibyagezweho bishingiye kubyabo
Ntabwo bishoboka ko ari umuswa 
Nabonye ubwanjye ko ibi bidatangaje
Nkuko byanyuze hejuru nguruka
Kora unkorere icyo ubona cyose gikwiye
Narebye rero kugeza ibintu bituje narose
Igihe umuntu ananiwe ahangayitse 
neza umugeni Fabric amuhabwa
Urimo kubikora gusa sibyo 
Yicaye ku buriri
Ndarambiwe rwose nicaye hano 
kera kugeza ubu
Mama ati ugomba kuva muburiri 
Yicujije kuba yaramugurije icyo gitabo 
uremereye kugeza igihe umubiri uba utagifite

aramubwira ati cyakoracyo urakajiji

basanga umwami wabo arambaraye hasi 
Bobo yemera ko Mariya yahisemo neza 
Urimo guha Tom 
Ntuye hafi yurugo rwe ariko gake mbona

ibigize ayo mafunguro Imboga Mu gitondo nkibyo ku mezi

Yumviswe muri banki zombi
ku gucukumbura ibyateza ingorane

nahise nkabona muri uwo mupira ndigaya nsanga nanjye ndi indangare

ikigo cyasabye ko cyemerewe kugira uruhare

urukundo rugiye kuzagusaza kandi

si byiza ko mperanwa namateka nagahinda

kuko ntituzabatenguha Dusabane Magazine

remy yaba afite ibibazo

bituma angella yumva abaye

URUHARE ABATURAGE BAGIRA MU BIBAKORERWA
bo akaba Perezida warwo  Rugizwe

Chris yari akwiye guhamagara

ahita ahaguruka aramwegera
umurimo wo kwigisha abana babo ngo bazabeho neza

ariko se ubundi ubabazwa niki

no kwitegeka bakiri impinja Ababyeyi babagore

Guceceka birabya ukuri gutegerejwe
angella ati reka reka nonese

umurimo wa gisirikare umuhanaguraho icyaha

Ariko icyerekezo gito bakoze
Igihe umuriro watangiraga yari asinziriye 
Abunganizi mu by amategeko
Niyo mpamvu ntekereza ko nzahitamo 
utavugwa Kristo yagize mu gihe kinini 
Impeshyi irihafi Ni mugihe ikirere cyatangiye gukonja 
Ikibazo nuko bisaba amafaranga menshi 
Wishimiye serivisi 
Imirire yo mu kigo ntigomba gutegurwa 
Ari mu itsinda ryumuziki 
Ushyigikiye cyangwa urwanya iyo politiki 
Tom yakoze ibyo Mariya yamubwiye gukora byose
Funga urwo rugi kandi wihute kubyerekeye 
avuga atireka nkwereke ko tutiganye ndaje
Abanyeshuri barishimye ariko abarimu ntabwo 
Buri gihe arakureba 
kazitunga buri gihe aguma mu buriri kugeza saa sita ku cyumweru 
Ndibaza niba ejo imvura izagwa 
Gaily to burgeon kandi mugari gukura
Ingingo ya   Abagize Inama y Ubutegetsi 
Noneho gusomana byarashize
imwe yo kureka umururumba mu mirire
Tom ni se ubyara Mariya meerkat
ntangira kurira gusa samantha arambwira ngo
Tom yabajije Mariya niba ashobora gusoma ibaruwa ya nyina 
Yamusabye kwinjira mu nzu ye ariko aranga 
Ndahiga hafi buri munsi 
Kubugingo bwanjye budatsindwa
Kuraho aya matiku yawe yose
Ibi biteza akaga kindwara yigikatu 
abanyarukiko n abakuru bose b Abisirayeli  maze
kazitunga yari hafi gusohoka mugihe terefone ivuze 
Abantu nkabo ni bo Imana izabwira aya magambo ngo Nuko nuko mugaragu mwiza ukiranuka 
nikiremwa muntu kiriho muri iki gihe 
Mbeguburyo kwitwabana blmana byatumyabantu bagiragaciro
atabyaye abahungu  o Nimuduhe gakondo mu bavandimwe
Kugabanya umuvuduko wigihe gito
Yujuje ubushake bwe bwateganijwe
Ariko numvaga nijoro gusa igicucu cyacyo
Gutekereza ku mwami ibyangiritse murumuna wanjye
Ntawundi ariko urashobora kunshimisha 
Gikeri yitegerezaga uruhu rubengerana
Bisaba imyitozo myinshi yo kumenya ururimi rwamahanga
Imana ni yo yaremye isi nimbaraga zayo
gutsinda ibigeragezo bahuraga na byo impande
Ibikwiye kwitabwaho muri serivisi zirebana n isuku n isukura
Tom na Mariya baricaye ngo basangire mugihe gisanzwe 
Kumuzana aho ndigukorera siporo
Abusalomu mu mutima  bari aho
kandi mwite ku Byifuzo byabo byiza
Ntekereza ko iri ari ikosa 
muri urwo ruhushya biguma kuba bimwe 
neza ibyo byokurya biva mu butaka bwiwabo 
Yamubajije impamvu yaje atinze 
Nashyize ikiganza ku rutugu rwa Tom
mubizi mugakomera mu kuri kuri muri mwe ubu 
Ubu butumwa burabisobanura neza
Ibitekerezo bya Canterbury ya Geoffrey Chaucer
bya gatatu mubona bituma abarwayi
Hafi ya bose hano barashobora kuvuga igifaransa 
ahanganye nicyo kigeragezo kubwa muntu
ibinyomoro pome nandi moko anyuranye 
Gutaka no kurira ntago abikunda
Ingingo ya   Isuzumabushobozi rya buri 
urura cyangwa ugira aside Udusate twawo 
Urukundo rw Imana  rusobanura iki   b  Ni iki cyatumye ukunda Yehova 
Mu minsi abami bari hafi yo gushaka
Ntabwo nigeze ntanga igitekerezo cya kabiri 
Ntabwo nizera ko Bobo yakubwira ibyo 
hamwe ni byifuzo bibi ni byo byari ishingiro
undi murimo werekeye ubuhanga mu  
Igihe mwarimu yatangiraga gusakuza baretse ibyo bakora bariruka 
Datawacu yangiriye inama nziza mugihe nari mubibazo 
urushyi rwiza cyane aravuga ati
ahita yihutira kureba ikijya mbere ku muryango
Ntabwo nigera nkora ibintu nkibyo 
Yungutse byinshi kubyo yakoraga
Nyuma yo kwakira dosiye isaba kwemererwa
ahita yikubita arasohoka arigendera
Uratekereza ko ibi aribyo 
Nibyo wifuzaga kutubwira 
batirinda boroshye mu bitekerezo 
Icyemezo cyo gusesa umuryango gishobora imbuto zo mu buhinzi cyangwa
David ntashobora kuyobora uburakari bwe 
akira shyiramo nimero zawe
Ntabwo nemera ko nongeye gukora ibi 
dosiye y utanga kandidatire ku mwanya 
Data yagiye mu mbuto ambonye ndikumwe na we

ikibazo cyo gukoresha ifunguro rya gatatu

kuko Bali ari yo itanga umusaruro ku gihe cyawo

ITSEMBABWOKO NI AKARANDE 
Navuze ko nzamushimisha 
Umusatsi wawe urasa neza 
Uzatsinda mbabajwe nabarwanyi
Bizaba intego yacu yo kugushimisha
Byarabaye kuburyo batari bahari 
mu gihe cy amezi cumi n abiri  
Izi modoka zakozwe mu Buyapani 
Tom yagiye mu biruhuko
kellia nawe ati shn 
iteguwe mu buryo bumwe nta gusimburanya buri munsi 
Ntabwo nishimye ariko ntabwo nakwiyahura 
ibyifuzo bibi nibyo ingeso zabo zirarikira
Nibabona ubuhanya mu mico mbonera no mu byumwuka bwabantu 
Ibya serivisi byabafasha kunononsorwa kurushaho
Ntekereza ko munsi yameza hari amazi 
Barambura amasahani yabobatangira kurya
Tom ntagiha Mariya indabyo
Umutoza mwiza atoza iyi kipe 
Ntabwo nashoboraga kuguhamagara 
Nta nubwo inzoka yihishe
Nibihe ukunda ibiryo bikonje ukunda 
Ndumva buke bwanjye ndimo kwikuramo ubwanjye
Ninde uzasetsa Edith cyangwa agasetsa Jeanne
nabaye icyogere mu nyambo nimanye inka 
Y ABASHINJACYAHA N ABANDI BAKOZI
Uzapfira mu mahano yo gutereranwa kwose
kazitunga yashakaga gukurura imbarutso ariko ntiyabishobora 
kuzirikana ibyaha byabo byari byarabateye kujyanwa mu bunyage i Babuloni
Umuziki wo kuboneka kwe waririmbaga injyana yihuse mumaraso ye
gikubiyemo amabwiriza agenga ipiganwa kandi
Tom ntabwo asa naho aruta Mariya
Kugwa kwawe insanganyamatsiko yindirimbo ya chorale
Kurebera mushiki we ubwitonzi
Ufunzwe nyamuneka ushake inyandiko
ku meza yanjye ntawe bireba
igihe cyose irari rye nimirire ye bitagendana nibyo yizera 
ariko mureke mbibarize akabazo kamwe 
Hari itsinda ryabantu bavuga ko bemera ukuri
Ntabwo bazishima tutarapfuye 
Tom akanguka kare hafi buri gitondo 
Imana Rurema  Uwiteka iravuze  Ihamagaye isi
Aca anyerera ati Uraho mwami
noneho basi kelli reka mwandikire 
Nanjye ndakubwira nti  Uri Petero  kandi nzubaka
bumenyi bukagendana no guhugurirwa kubushyira mu bikorwa 
guhita zishyirwaho ku buryo buhutiweho
Nsiga umutima wanjye mubabaro
yaravuze ati Nimuteranye ubuvungukira busigaye
Innocent atinarindikugira ngo niba bishoboka
Ohereza icyifuzo cyawe ku Mana hejuru
u Rwanda binyuze muri siporo yibicuruzwa
Yemwe ba shebuja icyubahiro kibasaba kandi gihumuriza
Ikintu cyingenzi nuko twese turi hamwe 
Urasa naho wishimye 
Ntabwo nizera ko Bobo yagerageje kumbeshya 
Byishimo naribwiye nti mukerarugendo
Murabe maso mutagwa mu mitego ya satani    
Ese Ikibazo nikihe koko 
Nabitse ikarita mu gifaransa nkiri umunyeshuri 
mama nawe atangira kurira byagezaho ndasohoka 
Mutarama   imaze kubisuzuma no kubyemeza 
bakayimuha  Nguko uko batangiraga kubigisha gusoma  kandi iyo bamaraga gukura
Nari nkwiye kubanza kukubaza 
Umwijima wizahabu wo mu bihe byashize hamwe nibyiringiro byuzuye byejo hazaza
Niba nta kindi cyubururu uretse ikirere ninyanja
Washimishije David cyane 
mubi nururimi rwuzuyeho imyanda
Muri iyi mibereho turimo tubasha kutaba intyoza
Urukundo ruracyafite imyaka makumyabiri
Mu ijoro ryitumbahaguye imvura 
Kandi amatara yijimye gusa azunguruka muri njye
Amazina namwongoreye ni ay ukuri
Ingingo ya   Icyaha cy ihohoterwa ku kazi 
twakora iki Turi bwumvikane twese
Ingingo ya   Icyicaro cya buri Ntara n icy Umujyi
bakirira icyo bashaka kuko ipfa ryabo rigendana
Mubigishe kubaho mu buryo bworoheje 
Ndatekereza ko ugomba guhamagara Chris 
Umugore yambaye ubusa 
Kandi yarashobora gutegereza  twamubona ejo
Nishimiye kuba Umuyahudi mwiza

bivugwaho icyaha cy iyigana gifatwa
biteganywa muri iyi ngingo ibimenyetso

YASHYIZWEHO UMUKONO I TUNIS MURI
ahubwo yari afite ubushake bwo kwiyemeza gukora ibintu byose ashingiye ku kimenyetso gito cyane cyubuntu bwImana 
Ni ryari ushobora kumenyesha ibisubizo 
Sinshaka kongera gushaka 
inyubako   ishyirahamwe ry abakora
Tugomba gufata ibyago gusa 
mwishuri ryaba cyntia ho
Ayo mafaranga wakoze iki 
Nabaye ku munsi wose
eheee nonese mukaba muje hano kumara iki
Ni ukubera iki nkwiye kuba mu mutwe kubera ko ntagaragara
Yicara ku gikoko hamwe nikiganza cye kiva amaraso
Ntiwibagirwe kunyibutsa ibyo 
Iyo ubyutse mugitondo cya mugitondo
Mukara ati uzi ibyabaye kuri Mukandoli
Mushishikajwe no gushyira ku meza yanyu amavuta
Kuberako ntitugomba kwibagirwa ikintu na kimwe
Gakwaya ntabwo yari azi ko Mariya yarubatse 
Ubu buvyeyi bugaragarira mu ntege nke zabwo
Tom niwe wenyine wari wicaye 
Amavuta yabo yera kwiyiriza ubusa kwabo
Kugirango ubyiteho neza cyane
Genda Umubiri wawe ntushobora kongera kuba amaraso yawo
nawe nzahita mugukurikiza
kazitunga ntazi igihe Mary azava i Boston 
Chris ntiyari yiteze ko Mariya asubiza ikibazo cye
mu minsi mirongo itandatu  
Umunyapolitike yari afite intoki zifatika kandi  byamasezerano yarangiye mumufuka 
Ntabwo nigera nsohoka ntaguze ikintu 
bo mu yandi madini bakwiriye gukurikiza 
Ndashobora kwibuka kubona ayo mashusho 
Kandi munsi yumunsi yitwikiriye nkumuseke wijimye
Ati Sinkunda ko bampeza
Imico ye yari nziza cyane nkimiterere ye
mbivuyemo rwose ntanyungu nazakura
gusa arambwirango nze gutaha kare hari icyo ashaka kumbwira
Sinzi igihe cyose wishimye 
Tom yifuza ko abantu bose bagira ibihe byiza 
David arishimye nkuko twigeze kumubona 
kurutete nagakubise umunyagisaka nirukira kumushahura
Ibyatsi byo mu rwuri byashoboraga gushimangirwa hasi
Urabizi Bobo nibyo rwose natekerezaga 
Ntabwo twigeze tujya mu itorero ku gihe 
na we yari kumwe n abagabo ijana n icumi 
zarangiye kandi agapira kagarutse
amasezerano na nyir ubwite ku
Mukara yakuye amafaranga mu gikapu cye ayiha Mukandoli
namufashije kugirango arangize kare
Hasi cyane nahanaguye ibyatsi namaboko yanjye
Umwami Uwiteka aravuga ati Ndirahiye 
Yizera ko ari umwere 
Yamusabye kwicara 
kwitabariza  bakiringira amafarashi bakizigira
Tom yicaye ku nkongi yumuriro 
oya we kwirenganya kuko nanjye bikunda kumbaho
Nigute Tom na Mariya babanye
Kandi irakinguye kubyakira
abagera kuri   bafite ubwishingizi
Inkubi yumuyaga yangije ibihingwa byinshi 
gutembera ahantu agacucu 
Ibi twabyanditse tugitangira akato
umuntu ushaka kumarana ubuzima bwawe bwose
Buri gihe yiga mugihe yumva umuziki 
Byaba byiza wicaye Tom

David ntabwo yigeze arya ibiryo byinshi

inkunga kandi abafitiye akamaro

Na Bisamaza nyiri Ubukamba

n amategeko agenga ubucuruzi mu

KOMITE ZISHINZWE GUHUZA ABARWAYI N ABAGANGA
Boss atinonece ko burigihe iyo mubonye mba
Ibisabwa kugira ngo umunyamuryango atorerwe
Yagiye mu busitani bwe
Bobo yicaye hafi yikidendezi mu koga akikijwe nabagore beza bambaye bikini 
kudusubiza namwe murabyumva yaramaze kugwa muri
Tuzarya ryari 
Navunitse ukuboko nkiri umwana 
Imisoto nayimenyereye kera 
Hoba hariho ingingo mubukode yerekeye 
hashize akanya yashobewe yumva 
Sinshobora kubyuka ngo ngire icyo
Nta kindi bashoboye gufungura uretse umuhanda
Urageze ku gihe
Kuramo iyi myanda hano 
Ubukonje bukora umurimo wabwo wibanga
Yavuze ko buri gitondo afata urugendo muri parike
Ko impaka zose zagize

mu buryo biryohera abantu
ane   akurikira impera z umwaka

maze akagirira ipfa ibyokurya biboneye 
Igihe cyo gutangira nikibazo nyamukuru 
kugira ngo bazungure abo muri Edomu basigaye 
mbere gishinzwe guhagarika amaraso ngo adakomeza kuva  gihita

Uzaduha inyungu zuburambe bwawe
Nibihe byishimo byo kwigunga
Twe na njye turi inshuti magara kuburyo dushobora gusoma hafi ya buriwese

urwandiko rwa muganga  amavuta yo kwisiga

uteza irari ribi mu bantu

kellia uyu nawe yitwa cyntia

arebye neza abona ni boss umuhamagaye
cyane ku buryo umwaka uko ugenda usimbura

mubikorwa no kureba uburyo amategeko yubahirizwa
Iyi ndirimbo nindirimbo yurukundo

ni ku bw izina ryanjye ryera

ndebe ko ndibugumane akazi kajye dore ko buriya

Tom yahagurutse nyuma ya Mariya
Tom yasabye Mariya kugenda
Nari ngiye kugenda mugihe wahamagaye 
Buri mwizera akwiriye gukorana ubwenge 
Ntabwo azi uburyo azana umunezero mwinshi
kwomeka kuri raporo yacyo inyandiko 
batazi imihango y Imana y icyo gihugu 
ariko bury iyo ugeze aho bikomeye nibwo Imana
uharanira uburenganzira bwa muntu

gusesa uruhushya rwo gukora ku buryo

yavuze atyo japhet ahita amureba mumaso

buriya ntushobora gukira icyo gikomere utagize undi muntu wo

umucyo w abari mu mwijima

maze akenshi ugasanga urubyiruko rutwarwa
ni ko kuzaba kuko nkuko bari bameze

ntikize ari ukuri Indyo imwe gusa 
isa neza mu gitondo igapfa nimugoroba

isengatabaro ikingira izinkenzi bananiye

kutagira ububasha bwo kurega cyangwa kuregera urukiko rudafite ububasha  Ibyo ahanini babiterwa

bigira ingaruka kuri buri karandaryi
Iki ni iki Subiza nagateruro kagufi kuzuye 
nkibyo birakwiriye ko dutangira ubu kwimenyereza 
Iminsi ngufi kandi igicucu
Ibikurikira muri arch bisa nibi
kwigomeka kimwe guhosha icyifuzo kimwe cyatakaye ubutunzi bwibagiwe
nzego byagiye bigaragarira Komisiyo kugira ngo bishakirwe ibisubizo 
hagakurikiraho uburwayi Kurya ku bihe bidahinduka

uko bishoboka kose

intege ubushobozi bwabo bwo gutekereza
mazima kandi byubaka umubiri

bigahita bishyirwa mu bikorwa mu gihe
yisi umwaka wamashuri urangiye

unyumve mubyukuri ibyo wabonye ni bike cyane
NTABYEMERE KOK IMANA imuri iruhande 
Inama y Ubuyobozi ya RGB ni rwo rwego

Gakwaya yanyemeje ko Mariya yavuze ukuri

Ingingo ya     Ukwemera gufite inenge

n abantu barindwi   barimo Perezida

ijoro  bwacya imigambi yabo ikagurumana

ingingo zurwungano ngogozi ntibitume imbaraga

bihumbi magana abiri   cyangwa thousand Rwandan francs

ICYO ABABYEYI BAKENEYE KUMENYA
Ndimo nibaza igihe cyo kugura mudasobwa 
Kurasa mbere baza ibibazo nyuma 
n akazi kakozwe n umukozi wa Leta 
Muri rusange abagore bakunda kubaho imyaka icumi kurenza abagabo 
Amayeri adahwitse nkayakubiswe nko guhuza inkwavu mu ngofero
igishoboka cyose ariko bipfe
Tom yambajije uburebure bwanjye 
ubwo cyntia yahise agaruka mucyumba
Yaje ku mwanya wa mbere Niyo mpamvu yabonye intebe nziza 
Nubwo nicaye hano ku zuba ndacyakonje 
Ibitekerezo by inama y ubutegetsi
Ubujyakuzimu budashyigikiwe kandi butigishijwe
Inyungu zidasanzwe kandi zishimishije gato
Numutwe wimbwa numubiri wumuntu 
isanga ko gutanga uruhushya bisaba ko
Tom arahaguruka ngo agende ariko Mariya aramuhagarika
Tom na Mariya bategereje hamwe na Yohana
Azatekereza ko yibagiwe rwose 
cyangwa ubuhanga mu mitekerereze yuwigisha 
Ntiwibagirwe kugaburira imbwa
no kurya bakurikije amabwiriza agenga ubuzima bwiza
cy i Kanani  b None turakwinginze  
uwamwezi yanditse izina rya mwarimu mushya kugirango atazibagirwa

Ndaryamye iruhande rwawe
Mariya arimo avugana nabantu batazi
Ubushobozi bwibyumwuka kimwe nubwubwenge

ikigereranyo cye gishingiye k uko abibona neza 
Ntukibagirwe
Tom yabonye igipangu agishyira hejuru ya Mariya

IHUTIRE URASABWA IGIHE CYAYO
Umuhanuzi atera hejuru avugira kuri icyo gicaniro ijambo ryImana 
Nicyo kintu kibi cyane nabonye 
Lizzie yitwikiriye ibihuKwunama hafi
Nahitamo kwicara nsoma mu isomero kuruta gutaha 
Ni ikosa rikomeye ku bagabo nabagore 
amubwira nuko abona sibyiza kuba yamubwira
Tom ntabwo yateguye kubabaza umuntu
Ni byiza ko abikora wenyine 
Hari ibyiringiro by imibereho yawe y igihe kizaza 
Arsenal yiteguye kugabanya abakozi
Umudugudu wose wasohotse kumwakira 
Mu bihe bibi umuntu arashobora gufata imbeho byoroshye 
Chris ahora asaba abana be kugerageza ibintu bishya 
ubundi ajya inyuma ya Fabric atangira kumukurura
Atangira gusoma agira ati umugoroba mwiza
Mubaze igihe cyose ushidikanya 
Ukwigomwa kurya kwa hano ku isi ntikugomba gusimbura 
Sinatevye guteshuka
Sinigeze numva iyi ndirimbo 
Tom yohereje Mariya ubutumire
icyo gihugu basezeranyijwe cyaje kuba icyabo babifashijwemo na Yehova 
Byiza cyane Izina ryera  rya pome
Kandi nka sisitemu yumuriro
Iyo mu mpeshyi nabonye imvura
Tom yasabye inama Mariya 
ibisubizo byatuma intara itera imbere 
Iradusunika iradurya kandi isaha yingirakamaro yarahunze 
Bobo yambwiye ko ufite ubukonje 
Indwara ziterwa no kubura intungamubiri ntizikira mu buryo bworoshye
Tugomba kunesha kwacu twese turi benshi
kandi tugomba kwirinda kwivanga bitari ngombwa
Ni amaraso kugeza kumavi yawe
Agiye kubonabonurwego runini ruvuye kw isi 
Kirima na Mukandoli ntibashyingiranywe
kazitunga ntakindi akora usibye kureba TV umunsi wose 
amatungo ibisebe bibi cyane  
Turashobora kwibagirwa gusa ibi byigeze kubaho
hose bazajya bosa ibitambo
biteganyijwe kuri site yagenwe
Nicyo kintu cya mbere data yanditse 
tutari twigeze dusinzira kandi numuganga nawe 
agomba gusubira mu kazi uhereye ku munsi mbere
yabyo cyangwa bibuzwa kugira icyo bigeraho
mu mirire niminywere yabo 
Mukobwa muto nzaba meze neza
David avuga ko atishimye 
bikanyiza kandi bizirikana ubwabo aho kugaragaza imico yImana 
Gusubizwa mu buzima busanzwe no gusubizwa mu cyubahiro
Ubwoba bwihuse butamenyekanye
Ntabwo nari kumenya neza iyo nza kuba wowe 
Njya kuryama kare iri joro iyo nza kuba wowe 
Urashaka rwose gutora Chris 
Umujyi wuzuye amabuye aho ubuhinzi bwaguye
Kuri sikeli no guturika amapine
kuvuga se mbwira ndakumva
Mushiki we yari ahagaze iruhande rwabo
yagiye kumva yumva kellia aramubajije ati

wamupolice yaraje kumara
Tom yazengurutse iduka agura ibintu yari akeneye

Nshobora kuba nkuraho ibi

Nshobora gukoresha ubufasha bwawe

Imana ivuga Icyo Bibiliya itwigisha 
ku murwayi ni ukwigomwa kurya ifunguro rimwe
Ntabwo nigeze mfatwa kubera ikintu na kimwe
mu mwuka udushoboza gusobanukirwa ukuri 
Sinigeze mvuga ko atari igitekerezo cyiza

Bagumye murugo kuko hari hakonje cyane

ahubwo ndumva ntameze neza reka ndyame

kugusobanurira icyo akurikiza atanga amanota

Nzawusibanganya mu bwenge bwabantu

itabi mu mufuka wipantaro

bitewe numururumba winda mbi

ABABA  MURI ETIYOPIYA KU WA
Ndatekereza ko dukwiye gukora ibirenze ibyo 
Ntawe uvuga neza uwo munyapolitiki

Tom ahangayikishijwe nibyo Mariya azakora
uko ink inkoni ye  Tom ashidikanya niba Mariya azaza ku gihe 
yabahaye ku byerekeranye nivugurura mu byubuzima
nyirabwo n ifungurwa ryabwo

Ntabwo ndi mwiza cyane kuriyi 
asanga Paul umuyobozi

tugomba guhangana nabarwanya ubutungane 
Nari mfite imyaka cumi nitatu igihe byaberaga

Ni inyumba rwabunga

Yaramwitegereje abona amarira

Ninjye njyenyine uzabikora byose
yagiye kubona ni numero atazi maze Henry aramwitaba 
Borne imbere mugihe gitokirenge
Mbega ukuntu afite ubwiza butangaje  
Ni amafaranga angahe wahishe munsi yigitanda cyawe 
Ntabwo nashoboraga kukwishimira 
ahubwo mbwira sha urabona meze ute
ari bo rusengero rwarwo

Sinzi icyo Tom yabwiye Mariya

Gaju yakamu ni ko nabaye
Iyi modoka isa neza cyane

Ubwanyuma umusozi wimyaka

n abakodesha  Abakodesheje bagomba gukora ibisabwa

ibihumura neza

Uyu ari kuri njye

kandi mubwira ko mukunda mbikuye ku mutima

MU RWANDA  L L B R  ni Pasiteri
Kuri Dome ya cyami ya cyami
Bobo ntaho yari ahuriye na kimwe muri ibyo 
zifite mu nshingano kwita ku buzima 
ari na yo Mana yawe
inama isaba ko hakorwa igenzura ku
Utimutse uzaba uhuye nibibazo 
Tom na Mariya bombi basaga naho bahangayitse
Iyi gare iroroshye kugenda 
birenze guceceka kwa Eva kutavuga kwanjye
Twahise tuhagera arareba maze nawe ubwoba buramwica 
byo ukora byose no mu mishinga yawe yose
Nagize umutwe muto nuko njya kuryama kare 
Ntekereza ko ndimo gukonja 
Wabonye buji ya saa sita zijoro zaka
Trix yashyize amabaruwa menshi kumeza ya Mukandoli
Bobo yahamagaye gusa atubwira ko ari munzira 
Yamusabye gufasha se gusukura igaraje ariko avuga ko ahuze cyane ku buryo atashobora 
Ntabwo nkora amakosa 
nuko akora mumufuka winyuma wipanaro ako
Waramweretswe se none uramutegereje
Kandi nzaguhemukira ntagutera ishyari
Innocent avuga akankama mwijwi riremereye
ari ama Komini cumi n atatu  
Urashaka rwose gukorana natwe 
Ubuzima utarimo ntiburasanirwa
ariko Uwiteka yari atari mu muyaga 
Tom yasabye umwunganira 
Cyari gifite umutwe wumugore umubiri wintare
Tom akwiye gufasha Mariya kenshi
abana bagomba Kubakuramo no kubonsa
si nabayirimo yayikomeresheje ubwenge bwayo
Kandi usabe kwishongora kwagutse
Umweru winkuta nini wampiga nkinzozi
Namanutse kuri banki
Wanshakaga none ndaje
Ntabwo rwose nita kubyo Chris atekereza 
Yumvise ijwi rimeze nkinuma yinuma
Henry yagize ikibazo adashobora kwitaba phone
Ni bwo aba bera bashinze
Rimwe na rimwe bibaho gutya 
kazitunga yagiye kuryama ryari 
Nibyo utekereza nibyo ubona
kuko bibaho rimwe gusa mubuzima…
Tom akunda kumva umuziki kuva muri mirongo inani 
ko nahishe abahanuzi bUwiteka ijana mu buvumo bubiri mirongo itanu mirongo itanu 
Byimbitse nkinyanja itagira ingano
Baza nk abaciye mu cyuho
Umugabane munini wiki gihe cyubuhakanyi muri Isirayeli Asa yawumaze ari ku ngoma mu Buyuda 
Nibyo byakubayeho Gakwaya  Nibyo washakaga 
Ndakeka ko yishyuye amafaranga 
Nibagiwe ko namusanze mukwezi gushize
Ngwino usange boss muri parking akubwire
Ntabwo yagerageje kuryama icyarimwe 
Sinibuka uko nageze murugo gusa icyo nibuka nuko nahageze 
Kuva icyo gihe ntabwo ari ibinyejana ariko buri wese
Tom afasha Mariya mubushakashatsi bwe
cyangwa gutangwa n abatanga serivisi 
Boss aho yari yicaye yari wenyine byongeye kandi
Turi beza ko bibagiwe kuduhamagara 
Imbwa yari umunyabwenge kuburyo yasaga nkumuntu 
Ntabwo nkwiye kuzamuka niba ntabishaka
nemeye guhiga ndi ruheza aho
byagerageje bikomeye uko yizeraga ububasha bwImana nzima bwo kumuha ibyo akennye 
Ndetse  n amabuye n ibiti n umukungugu  
Guhuza ibitekerezo Ndagukunda nkuko urumuri rwizuba ruyobora umuhigo
Tom na Mariya bombi bakomeje gutuza rwose
Masaru avuga ko ari umwere 
namaganya nkwibagize ibyahise
Wakoze iryo kosa nkana 
bizagenda birushaho kongera imbaraga no gukomera 
Mose yabihanangirije kuziririza umunsi wIsabato no kuweza
Uyu munsi urahari ndashimira Uwiteka
Gusa kora ibyo nakoze ubwo nahuraga na Mukandoli Mubwire ko ari mwiza
kumwitegereza phone ye bayohererezwaphone ya
tujyane mu rugo uruhuke kandi nkugororere 
Nta wundi wigeze kubyumva uretse njye 
rw ubuvanganzo n iby ubugeni harimo
umubiri akamaro bikwiranye nibyo abaturage

UBUZIMAGATOZI KOPERATIVE   HAGURUKA MUKANISHI 
Mumaze kugutererana ndashobora kuvuga T ni byiza
jya wibagirwa ibibazo nibiguhagarika umutima 
Kwitotomba
nahise nsubira inyuma ndangije ndamuhamagara 
Amaze ukwezi hanze yigihugu
ariko ubwo buntu ntibwagiye bwitabwaho 
Iyo ukoresheje umutima wawe utera vuba 
Mbabajwe cyane no kubamenyesha ko yapfuye 
kazitunga ntabwo yashakaga kubwira Mariya ibanga ariko arabikora 
Ndashaka kuvuza ingoma nkumva ko nabishobora
Nshobora kugusoma nonaha 
uyu munsi harimo bonus nziza no kuzamura umushahara 
Ntabwo nigeze ntekereza ko nzahurira nawe hano 
Birasa nkaho nakumenye ubuzima bwanjye bwose 
Ku ndabyo ko mu gicucu no kuzunguruka no guhinda umushyitsi
hamwe no kugirirwa nabi bikorerwa
Aho umutima ufunguye utera
Amatungo dukama ntabwo ibihe byinshi aba ari meza 
Mwumve namwe ko byacitse 
imirire irangwa no kwirinda 
n Iterambere ry Ubukungu  SEDO  
Tuzabikemura mugihe nikigera 
Iyi ngofero ni nto cyane kuri wewe
Ubuso bwa mpandeshatu ni kimwe cya kabiri cyubuso bwurukiramende rufite ishingiro nuburebure bungana 
david ati cyane rwose ubwo 
Ntabwo wigeze uba mubuzima bwanjye
Kwambara ibyiyumvo byimbitse nkikamba
Urashobora gutwara hirya no hino ukaguma i Lunenburg
Tom yabwiye Mariya ko amwenyura neza
kazitunga yashakaga kuguha ibirori bitunguranye ariko nari nzi ko uzabyanga ndamubwira nti 
Ntubaze ibibazo kora 
Turatekereza ko nta ntambara zikwiye kubaho 
mu magambo  Banki Nkuru itegura
Nzasana iyo mashini ubwanjye 
Tom yinjiye mu kabari yicara ku ntebe iruhande rwa Mariya 
abana ngo babatoze gukurikiza amategeko 
Yatekerejwe mu gukiranuka yavutse mu byishimo
Tom yashyize imbwa ye imbwa
Ni akaga kuzamuka uwo musozi 
aho hose n abo mu turere dukikije Kigali
asimbura neza amatunda agisoromwa 
Twese tuzi neza ko bikenewe
Yari umugore mwiza cyane yigeze kubona 
yavuze agira ati Ubugingo bwawe nintabuhwanya nubwabo ejo nkiki gihe 
Natinyaga ko ugiye kubivuga 
uziko yatangiye kubira nibyuya mureba
Uzengurutse igiti kibujijwe kuribwaho
Impeshyi yacu ni ngufi ariko irashyushye 
Iyo niyo modoka yawe mumuhanda 
Ntacyo yari afite umukene agomba kuba yarishe umuhanzi
no kubwo gushaka kunguka ubwenge mu byubuhanga 
Icyampa nkaba narize Igifaransa cyane nkiri muto 
yibagiwe guhamagara Mariya ejo nimugoroba
Kuri Picus intwari Horatius
Ntabwo ndi hano mubucuruzi
Kandi niba ashobora gutinyuka urupfu ubwabwo
Kwiyongera kwijimye kuzuye kwerekwa igicucu
Filime Mukandoli akunda cyane ni Umugeni wumuganwakazi
Urashaka ko nkora iki aka kanya
Yavuze ko yakubwiye kuvuga buhoro 
Nari i New York igihe byaberaga 
Ndarambiwe cyane kubitekereza ubu 
y Igihugu y Abagore bikorwa n Inama rusange
kigo cy imari ni ifatizo  ry igihe bigenze nabi 
Antoni Kanyangira yatwaraga Migongo
Tom avuga ko iryo joro Mariya yari ahari
kubwira umwami ibyo bintu 
Mukara asa nkudashishikajwe cyane na Mukandoli
Ubushake nubugwaneza buhebuje cyane
maze abona ndikugenda nangiira imbaraga ntazo
baraduashimira ndetse duhita bahava twemeranyije
kazitunga ntakindi arya uretse imbuto nimboga 
Bya mirimo yuburiganya bampaye
Nashyingiwe amarozi kugirango uwo ukunda ashaka kurongora
Ndashimira byimazeyo ibishya twahinduye
Hoba hakonje hanze 
ruzasanga mu gasozi kidatashye  urubura
Ikigaragara ni uko ahuze cyane ku buryo atakubona 
Uwo musego wo hasi urasa nuwihenze 
numusenyi muto nkifu yingezi

kigena imitunganyirize n imikoreshereze
ubwo haciyemo akanya pe

ngo ubwo niwe wangiriye inama yo kujyayo

Ko numva ko ngomba

Umuntu wese ahora ambaza ibyo

Twihatiye gukorera ibikenewe mumuryango wawe
Ubwo yavugaga ibyo atazi
Uyu mugore rwose azi ko atazi icyo ashaka 
Nta kintu kibi kiruta kuba inkorabusa 
Wowe ufashe ibyemezo bikomeye
Yasa nkuwatunguwe cyane igihe namubwiraga

Nta jambo na rimwe yavuze mu bubabare bwumutima we

kuburyo william azajya amureba

Tom yabajije inama za Mariya kuri icyo kibazo 
Nimirima ya ba sogokuruza ku gahanga kisugi

kugenzura imirimo  no guhuza

bine  kuva ku mpera y isi kugeza ku mpera y ijuru  f

magana atandatu   biyandikishije ku murenge

Trix yabajije Mukandoli icyo atekereza ko akeneye
Bahujije igihe cyabo kugeza igihe cyakera
Ntabwo ndimo kubiringira
cumi n abatatu   batorwa n Inama Nkuru 
Uyu muhanda ujya mumujyi 
Tom yashoboraga kumpa inama niba abishaka 
no kurya birengeje urugero
ko bagomba guhanga amaso yabo kuri Yesu
Yerobowamu wari warigeze kuba umugaragu wa Salomo 
Ntidushobora kubaho kuri  yen ku kwezi
cyangwa abari abakozi bazo baziteje igihombo 
Ntimugomba gutanga amabwiriza mubwira abantu 
Tom yicaye inyuma 
Bafite aho basohokera nubwinjiriro bwabo
Abagore babiri baririmba
Gupfukama birangora cyane mumpindurire igihano
Kandi byambabaje cyane umutima wanjye gutekereza
Imwe muri iyo mvura mubuzima bwose ntishobora kubigisha
Naragutumye ngo ugende usubire muri Isirayeli maze uhagarare imbere 
ibya nimugoroba nubundi ko
Kwitegereza neza
kugezwaho amasezerano rusange y umurimo 
Ni ryari uheruka kuvura umurwayi 
Undi musatsi ushobora no kuzungura
Nabwiye Tom uko nagera kwa Mariya
Yari afite Valentine wanjye
ITEKA RYA PEREZIDA N    RYO KUWA
Niba se gucibwa kwabo g kwaratumye isi
Bamwe barandize isoni zo kutamupfuka
Nubaha abahora bakora ibishoboka byose 
bitera igifu kwivumbagatanya 
Agacisha amarenga intoki ze
Tuzashimira byimazeyo amakuru ayo ari yo yose
Ubwoko buhebuje ku isi
ukandagira ubutaka ni bugatigita  n umwitero 
neza ugereranije na   aho abagore 
ibyaha  maze Aroni n abahungu be barambika ibiganza mu
Ndi ubwoko bugira ubwoba imbere yabantu nuko meze nabi kuvuga 
Trix afasha Mukandoli kwitegura urugendo rwe
agize impanuka  igahitana umuntu  Umunara w Umurinzi 
Nta muntu ushobora gutwara
Iyo nza kuba umuntu wapfuye mu mva ye
nyemezamwenda mu Rwanda igihe ushyira ku
Mushiki wanjye akunda umuziki 
uhamagare wumve ko hari 
obedia arongera ati angell
Ko turi abaragwa ba kamere kandi umwe
Urashobora koga koko 
Iyi skirt ni Mariya yaguze ejo 
Kuri Madame kandi bivuye ku mutima
Kubantu bakuze ku nkoni
Urupfu rwe ni igihombo gikomeye 
Twashoboraga kwandika David ibaruwa 
Bagumye bicaye aho 
Genda wicare kwa so 
ntashobora kwizera ko Mariya atekereza ko ari byiza kureka John akaryozwa amakosa
Tom arakariye Mariya
ko hafi yabo hari akaga katuma 
Amaso yuzuyemo gukina no gukomera
Muri buri kigo hariho abantu bamwe
cyo kwemera cyangwa kwanga ukuri kwahishuwe
Wazamutse ibiti ukiri umwana 
Ndagushimira ko nkiri muzima 
Twahinduwe umwe hamwe nibyo dukoraho kandi tubona
ku mirire yageneye umuntu katanga ka mbere
kuri za politiki n imigenzereze y ikigo cy imari
Iyo aza kwigumira aho yari ari 
agira ati Bakundwa ndabahugura 
zawusize uruheha mu ruhekane rwa ruguru
Ntabwo twashoboraga kubyara 
Nibisanzwe ko habaho ubwumvikane
Nzasubiza ryari igitabo 
Nibagiwe gushyira kashe ku ibahasha
Ubwitonzi bwiyongereye bwibice
Urashobora kuza mubiro byanjye mugihe ufite akanya 
Sinigeze ntekereza ko nzagukorera 
angel niwe wabibonye ahita ambwira ati
Ntabwo nemera ibyo numva 
imari shingiro  ntiyemerewe kugira ibyo itanga
Inkoni ya mwarimu ntamuntu uyikoraho
Ntidushobora kwizera ikintu Bobo avuga kuri Mariya 
kuki Wanga Gakwaya cyane 
Mfite ubukonje buke nagiye kuryama kare 
Kandi urumuri rwurutoki rwe rurabagirana
kinywa amazi yimvura 
ijwi ryumugabo wambere arikoma
Ubu bushakashatsi bukorerwa mu yahoze 
Fabiora byaramunaniye kwihangana nuko ajya
Kuki utabaza mugihe ufite ikibazo 
Fabiora atibwira neza seeee wazamuwe muntera
Fabric atiariko se ko numva uvuga nkumuntu wari
Umucyo urabagirana ubutunziflame
Ubu se koko Linda arakorera iki Samantha
Ifite imbaraga zo kubabara
Ukirinda aho yaciye
ngo barangwe nimico iboneye kandi yukuri
maze batera hejuru bati  ugomba 
Ntabwo nizera ko baduteye kwishyura 
Mukara yasabye Mukandoli kumusanganira kwa John saa mbiri nigice
Nukuntu bava muburiri
cyangwa imaragarita  cyangwa imyenda y igiciro
Azamura amaboko yombi
Ninde wasomye ikayi yanjye nkiri hanze 
ubwiganze burunduye butabonetse ku nshuro

ariko se koko jack mwaretse
Inzu itangaje mbona ni iyihe 
ibi bintu koko ntuzi ko njye narimaze

Ibyiza icyubahiro amategeko atazi kunama
Isake yonyine yari ihagaze hejuru yinzu

ku rwawe ruhande cyangwa ku byerekeye

INZIRAINZIRA  INTAMBWE UMWE
Tom ni uwa Yohana na Mariya
yokwisondeka ngo urakundana na kiragisaza
Kumwenyura guhisha gutukwa no kwicuza
babahoresha kubaha amashereka nyamara kandi 
Ni gute Abanyamerika benshi bumva bameze iyo babonye umupolisi 
kellia ati yego nyine
Umusifuzi yicaye ku ntebe ndende kuruhande rwurukiko 
Kandi ni ibintu byiza cyane byanyuze muri njye
Niki wansaba ko nkora 
mu rwego rw ubutegetsi no mu mafaranga
Hanyuma akabigisha ababwira ko indwara 
Iki gice cyumuziki ninzira igoye cyane kuwucuranga 
bidasanzwe kuko numvaga na Henry akiriho
Ni ukubera iki uhora utinda ku ishuri 
Icyo dushaka gukora nukwicara tukaruhuka 
Natekereje ko dufitanye umubano mwiza 
Ibi ntibyigeze bibaho mbere 
Nshobora kubabaza abasore ikintu 
Nshimye ko iki atari umurimo woroshye kuri wewe 
Tom yari wenyine ku ntebe ya parike
mu marira menshi nawe tekereza kubona umuntu wumugabo arira
Umugabo windarikwa uvuga ibinyoma
Abaganga bagomba kuba maso bagasenga 
Hariho ikintu cya nyuma kigomba gukorwa 
kazitunga certainly goes to bed early 
Data yakundaga kuvuga ko igihe ari amafaranga 
Bateranira mu mudugudu wacu
Amakuru avuga ko yahukanye yatunguranye cyane 
Ntabwo ntekereza ko batwizera 
kazitunga yandikiye Mariya ibaruwa yurukundo ariko ntiyayisoma 
Nabyishimiye cyane 
Ibyo bizaba bihagije kubwubu 
Ku burezi bwabafite
David ntabwo azishimira ibi 
kandi ururimi rumena ibanga
Nakoraga kuri banki kugirango amfashe
Ah ububabare bukabije urukundo rwe rumutera

nibirungo byose ipfa nirari byari 
mu gifu maze bigatuma bumva na none

boss ari kumushakira cyane

zawishinjijeho ntizawukuraho nibango na limwe
Ndamwubaha cyane

mu buryo buhesha umubiri amagara mazima
Nyuma Fabiora yaje guhamagara mama we ngo

ishobora kuneshwa gusa nubufasha duhabwa nImana

Iyo imvura ihagaze nzajyana imbwa gutembera 
Ntabwo wamanuka hano kuko ntibyoroshye
Jya mbere kubantu uzi neza ko bazagufasha 
Bimwe mu byokurya bitegurwa mu buryo budasanzwe

ahubwo yavugije Induru isanzwe
agaciro nyako ka buri mugabane

shimishwa nizuru ryawe riri mumaso yawe

Niwowe muntu wenyine udafata imiti runaka byibura rimwe mu cyumweru

ni hejuru yawe pe

imva zuzura ntakind iyuzuza

mu gihe bonsa usanga bakora imirimo ibarenze

Nagize ibihe byiza rwose kwa Chris 
Ukwo byakuzuye amasahani
Mugihe umuyaga wasinziriye uragutwara
yo kureka gukoresha inzoga nitabi
Kimwe mubyasizwe na ba kera
Gutiza impumuro ye izuba ryabafaransa
ngiye guhangana numuntu ntazi iyo arava
Ndababaje uyu muforomo
Ntabwo nari nkwiye kuba umwarimu 
Abantu bakunda kuzamura amajwi iyo bashimishijwe 
Umuntu wese cyangwa ikigo cyose cyangwa ba
Iyo awukuruye uraforoka
Nabonye abantu benshi bababara 
Trix yambajije niba nzi umukunzi wa Mukandoli uwo ari we
Imyenda yimbere yimanitse ku itara
Mariya ahitamo gusiga umusatsi we
kandi bishyigikiye ururimi gakondo  Kuva
Nabwiye ababyeyi banjye ijoro ryiza njya kuryama 
Galileo yavuze ko isi igenda 
yahujwe hagati yibibero bye na unlace
Ni umuhanda munini ufite imirongo ibiri yibiti byindimu
Isaha iyo ariyo yose iyo umuhamagaye ngo aze ahita ahagera
Abagore benshi bakurikirana amashuri makuru nakazi bityo bagatinda gushyingirwa no kubyara 
Kandi ndatekereza ko mbona mu kirere
Inkumi imitima yabo itazigera ihitamo
Nubwo byaba ari igitangaza
rumurukira abantu bose mu nzira
Tom yakurikiye Mariya mu cyumba
Arimo asubira mu iduka aho yibagiwe amafaranga ye
Guhinga imirongo mumirima mugihe cyizuba
cyangwa uko imisozi nibibaya byahindurwa ubukuna namapfa 
ingoma inyumva neza i Nduga 
Nzi ko ejo na Bobo wasibye ishuri 
Abana bose bari bafite isura nziza
kazitunga ntabwo yumvaga ameze neza ariko uko byagenda kose yagiye ku kazi 
Mu mwanya wawo nzawusimbuza umunsi utemewe nImana 
Ikibazo cyawe nzagikemura  naza
kandi bitabangamiye inyungu z umwana 
Yakuze aba umuntu ukomeye 
Aho arota abona amazi hafi asinziriye
Mariya asa neza cyane
Kandi ingorane ntoya nububabare bukabije
mu minywere mu gusinzira no mu myambarire
Ndashaka kukubaza ikibazo 
Bobo ntiyashoboraga kwizera ibyo Mariya yamubwiye 
ibishushanyo bigaragara byerekena ko Imana itagaragara iri aho hantu
Umwete nkumunsi imitima yabo yashyingiwe
Kandi itanga ibisobanuro byiza kubintu byamafunguro
papa nawe ati yego nyine 
ahita avuga mwijwi riremereye atiboss rekera aho
Twari tumeze nk abarota 
Muri make ibihangano byiza azi gukora
ndi murugo nimugoraba hamwe na Angel Jackson yahise ampamagara 
NGO UMUNTU ABE UMUYOBOZI
Niba ibirenge byawe bitose uzafatwa nimbeho 
Yasabye inshuti ye inama 
Indirimbo iri kure yibyo twibwiraga
ubutumburuke bwo hejuru itarangwaho isazi za tsetse 
Tom yahaye Mariya impyiko
Natekereje ko ushobora kumbwira ibyo nkeneye kumenya 
Imbwa yicaye hafi yikibindi 
intekerezo zumwana Niba umwana arangwa no kurakara 
alex ati ese boss ubwo koko
Kandi hepfo nashyize kurutonde rwumugani ubabaje
Tom yabwiye Mariya ko afite inyota
Yoo si ejo mu mwijima ndasenga
Mariya yakiriye nyina asomana
Ibi nibintu byoroshye
Hazongerwa umusaruro w ibikomoka ku buhinzi byoherezwa
Icyampa David akaba atarigeze aza hano 
nuburebure bgikijyepfo
Nshobora kuba umukene ariko sindi umuswa 
Aho kuri etage Kapiteni wanjye aryamye
Twishimiye cyane hamwe 
Fabric atiyego rwose nubwo
Urukundo urukundo rworoha
Ndashaka ko uguma ku mucanga
Ninjiye mucyumba kazitunga na Mariya basekaga ikintu 
Turiteguye mugihe witeguye 
Emmanuel Cattier yajuririye iki cyemezo  
Uratwemerera kandi kubyuka
Yamubwiye ko yemera inyenyeri 
David avuga ko atazongera kujyayo 
Abashaka akazi bagomba kugeza ifishi
nge ndumva ngiye kuruka kubera iseseme anteye
insanganyamatsiko woof  insanganyamatsiko zinyuranye
Iyo munsi yimyenda migufi
Uwo muntu ntashaka gukora ikintu na kimwe 
Wigeze kubikora kangahe 
Yendaga kumuhamagara ibaruwa ye yaje 
Ntekereza ko umugabo arimo kureba inzu yacu 
Nta kintu gishobora kuba cyiza kuruta ibyo 
Yambara umusatsi mu gikoni 
yakanyamuneza ahita abwira Fabric atiurakoze
Nzi neza ko nshobora gukoresha byeri ikonje 
Cyangwa wabonye imirongo irabagirana ariko yatinze kuzamuka
shati na joggers yagaragaye afata ingamba zose
yongera ku mpamagara ariko ndaheba nagiye kumva 
ushimira Imana imigisha yayo yose 
Nyamara imiburo yagombye kuba yarabaye impumuro yubugingo itanga ubugingo 
Utarinze kumena indabyo
Ntabwo bitangaje kuba ntacyo azi kuri kiriya kibazo 
Ariko rero mfata iyambere
Ndashaka kwinubira kumugaragaro 
bya Kiliziya byasigayemo ubwo yasenyerwaga ku Batutsi bari bayihungiyemo 
Amagambo yo gushimwa abantu bazavuga
Yishyuye amadorari icumi kuri iyo shati
Kunywa itabi mu buriri ni bibi 
Ko yari ananiwe byari byoroshye kubona 
Icyo nifuza gukora rwose ni ugusinzira 
Nzamufata ukuboko tujyane
kuri bitandatu  Nyuma yaho ibyana byacyo byasohokeraga mu kanwa bimaze gukura 
imico ya Ahabu yahinduwe mu buryo bworoshye na Yezebeli wari umaramaje 
Urashaka ko mbaza Tom 
biryoshye byinshi ku buryo abantu bareka
Mwarimu yavuze ko isi izengurutse 
wa gatatu uzarinda inzu y umwami 
Helen ahora hejuru yishuri rye 
aba ni bo bagaragaje
Samantha nawe asigara ashaka udufaranga
Ibi birampa umutwe 
mudusuzugura  ntimubanze kutugisha inama
Trix yahamagaye Mukandoli amubwira ko azatinda
Kuri buri muntu uri kuri iyi si
nk uko bosa urw igitambo cy uko umuntu ari
gusa nawe ashaka kumpobera ndamunwira nti 
gusimbuza izina rya BIHOYIKI Narcisse irya
sinongeye kumubona ubwo cyntia
Yasabye imbabazi kubera ikinyabupfura cye ariko ntiyamubabarira 
ahubwo yahugiye mu kwitegura ibyaba bitunguranye 
Ngambwa nabaye ingangare mu ngabo
Yavuze ko yasize iwe mu rugo 
kuko ndabona murimo gukina 
Mwembi mukora ikipe ikomeye 
twabuze uburyo twinjira mukigo 
tukajya tuvugana akampamagara nanjye nkajya muhamagara
ngo bahagere basanga ni umusazi wicaye munsi 
Nari nizeye ko Gakwaya azabivuga 
kandi uzi iki Ntabwo ari baloney
Ndavuga nti Nta kumwibuka hano
Natekereza kabiri kuri ibyo iyo nza kuba wowe 
Iki gitabo kirakoreshwa cyane
kazitunga akunda gutekereza kuri Mariya iyo yumvise umugozi wa kane 
atabifashijwemo n umukozi ubifitiye ububasha 
Yoo Ndumva meze neza
nabimwe ibindi akamureka ariko akajya asubiza anyitegereza cyane
Urashobora gutegereza nyuma ya saa sita niba ubishaka ariko kazitunga ntazakubona 
Kubera ko amano y ibirenge yari akomeye
Kandi kubwuko abantu benshi baharaniraga gusobanukirwa ibyo Imana 
Ninde muto kandi woroshye utaba umukunzi cyane
Ababyeyi bigishije abana babo kurya
Nashakaga kukubwiraIyo Imana itwohereje abamarayika
Nta nyenyeri yagombaga kuboneka muri iryo joro 
Umugore wari ufite umukozi wo mu rugo
Hari ikindi kintu kigomba gukorwa 
Ati Ko wabaye mu Bafureri
ijoro ryose hamwe na Mel Torme
bigendana nimpinduka nko kugabanya 
Iri tegeko rirakurikizwa kuri twe abanyamahanga 
Ntabwo rwose ndi mwiza nabana 
Niba imvura irimo kugwa ntabwo duteganya kujya gutembera 
baraza bakagenda ntawamenya ibyabo
Niga Icyongereza mugihe wahamagaye ejo 
Abo ni abameze nka Yozefu na Eliya na Daniyeli 
Hari kiri hano
Mu byukuri ntabwo numva nshaka kuvuga nonaha 
Trix yahamagaye Mukandoli amusaba kuza
Iyo umwenda uzamutse urwego rwijimye 
Iyo umukoresha yanze gutanga iki cyemezo
Ntabwo nizera ko Bobo yasebya Mariya gutya 
Wazamura umutwe wawe hejuru
Ugomba guhanagura ibitekerezo byawe hanyuma 
Nta numwe mu bilometero ijana nta numwe mu nzu
Kuberako isi idafite lyre isa nabantu badatuwe
Nigute waje kubyemera 
Ninde muhungu urimo koga hariya 
Aba bantu bakora iki 
Umusatsi we waguye ku rutugu 
Ni bwo abashoboye baruhunze 
Manika ubuzima bwe kumurongo woroshye kandi udakomeye
Tom ntabwo yaguze ibyo namusabye 
Urabona iyo nyubako ndende hariya sibyo 
Fata iherezo ryuyu mugozi 
Twabonye hafi aho dushaka 
william rero yakunze umukobwa 
Yerekanye ko yifuza ko agenda 
Nyamirambo yubwoko butandukanye 
Kugerageza Natekereje kubishiraho kurangiza
Mukandoli yise umwana izina rya nyirakuru
mu by ukuri uwo muntu aba
ubwo cyntia we yarageze kwa kellia 
Nigute ushobora kwihanganira uwo mugenzi wawe utagira ikinyabupfura 
Abantu bizera ibyo bashaka kwizera 
Unyumve fata izo mbuto zose
umugome sinzapfa nkubabariye njyewe kandi ndanigendeye
Iteka rya Perezida ryemeza burundu amasezerano ahuriza hamwe amategeko 
Yaguteye kundeba uruhanga rwawe
erick se aracyari muri byabindi bye
David ntabwo yigeze yubahiriza igihe 
Ariko aba basore bifuza Kandi bagiye kubigaragaza
ku bantu bose kandi bigakoreshwa buri munsi 
Ntabwo nshobora gutanga igisubizo kirenze ibyo 
Yashyingiwe ryari 
Nibagiwe kuzimya itara Amastan
Hariho ibintu bitandatu ndetse birindwi
Igitabo cyawe kizasohoka ryari 
Blithe hamwe nibyishimo bya mugitondo
Biragoye kuruta ibyo 
Ntabwo nishimiye na gato ibi 
Yashutse kandi azunguza umwana we udashaka kujya kwa muganga wamenyo 
Yego nibagiwe ubwanjye yego ndabizi neza 
Nzakora ikintu cyose Tom abajije 
Tom yasabye Mariya ikintu gishyushye cyo kunywa 
Imboga Rwatsi nInyanya mu Mirire y
munzaniye irivaruganda Ndwana i
Ucukura urwobo azarugwamo Kandi uhirika
Imyitwarire idahwitse yuburinganire bwubuhungu
nahise nkubuka kuruhande mbona wa umupolisi 
kwiringira Imana yari yaragiye igoboka mu bihe bya kera 
Hari mu mwijima tugeze mu mudugudu 
Kubifata no kugerageza kubikuramo
Yakinguye ikote mbere yo gusohoka hanze 
impuhwe zawe ni nkiza bihehe
Kumurika kandi yagiye imisozi yo mu Bwongereza ihagaze
Ntuzigera ubikora hano ari muzima 
Samantha ngaho ryama noneho turabonana mu gitondo
Tom yafashe
agahinda karamwica ndetse ikiniga 
kuzunguruka byihuta cyane
Ndashaka ko itagira amaboko kandi idafite inyuma
Trix na Mukandoli bamaze amasaha atatu hano
ubyumva sha david ati
muryango w ihema  nihagira umuntu uza akakubaza
Ntabwo umuhanuzi Eliya yarambiwe gutegereza cyangwa ngo atakaze kwizera
niko kubaza muganga ati ariko se muga ubundi mu byukuri 
Eva yarambuye amaboko ye
Kuki utajya hanze Aho niho imbuto ziri
Ururabo rwapfuye munsi yamaso nirengagije
Nakubwiye ko mfite ibi 
Imana igukurikire iteka
Trix yumvise Mukandoli asobanura icyo gukora
Ubuhenebere buteye ubwoba bwo mu minsi
maze aratanya anyura ku barinzi basaga nabataramubonye nuko ahita ahagarara imbere yumwami wari wumiwe 
Munzira bagenda baseka akanyamuneza ari kose
Gushaka inkota amahoro yabo
Trix yafashije Mukandoli kugura ibyo yari akeneye byose
kwisaha bibaza igihe akazi kari burangirire baze
Tom yavuze aho Mariya ashobora kuba yagiye
Nyamara Eliya ntiyigeze aha gushidikanya umwanya 
Ibyo bintu si ibyo guhubukirwa kuko ushobora 
Iyo nkuze ndashaka kuba umwami 
Ubwo butumwa bwuwo muhanuzi bwagombye gutera umwami wAbisirayeli
Yego ngwino Ugomba nibura kurara Ntabwo tumaze igihe kinini tubona 
Umubitsi wemezwa n Ikigo gishyiraho
binshuti zanjye turataha gusa ngenda
Ntabwo bari kwishima 
Ndagerageza kuguha amahirwe yo gukora icyo kintu cyiza 
Gakwaya yambwiye ko uvuze ukuri 
Umusatsi we wongeye gukura kugeza muburebure bwumwimerere 
ni mw ibyo yakoraga byose byakomokaga 
Numutwe muto kubugingo bwe
Ntabwo bari batangiye igihe imvura yatangiraga 
Iyi sura idasanzwe niyo yabiteye
Ariko uyu uganje mubworoshye
Tom yasabye abantu bose kugenda 
Ugomba gusoma ubwoko bwibitabo bikubiyemo ubwoko bwamakuru azakugirira akamaro mubuzima 
Yamubajije ibibazo bimwe 
kuzagenda irushaho koroshywa Abakora uwo murimo 
Nyamara Imana ubwayo yashyiraga mu bikorwa umugambi wayo 
Amuvana ku ishami rye aramujyana
Kandi buriya jye sinshobora gukundana na
kumererwa nabi mu gifu no kuribwa bikabije mu bura
Byizerwaga ko isi iringaniye 
Abagore ntibatwara kimwe nabagabo 
Urumuntu wamaraso akonje sibyo 
Ndashidikanya ko Chris arukuri 
Iseswa ry Umuryango UMUSHUMBA MWIZA 
amasoko yurubyiruko cyangwa shampiyona yikinira 
yarakibqza kubyo boss yaragiye kumubwira
mbwira ntugire ikibazo ntacyo ndaba bimbwire
Yakoze amakosa nuburyo yisubiyemo
Nasabwe kuguha ubutumwa
Mu bantu benshi bapfuye hafi
Tom yabajije Mariya uwo ateganya kujyana na Boston 
Byantwaye iminsi icumi kugirango ndenge imbeho 
Kandi yitiriwe umunsi utoroshye
Tom na Mariya bicaye munsi yigiti barya picnic ya sasita 
Menyesha igihe azagera 
kavugiye kure ngo ubutaha ho muzapfana niba mudashaka kurekana
babitewe no gutinya ko abantu bababona bakora umurimo wumugaragu
Tom yemeye ko yishe Mariya
Nuko Fabric atiariko wambaye neza wagira ngo
Ni ryari uzabwira kazitunga ibya Mariya 
Tom yabikoze mbere 
kazitunga yaturitse aseka abonye Mariya 
Tom yicaye amaguru mu mwijima
Hamwe nicyizere cyuzuye ko turimo gusuzuma
rirasubizwa maze imvura iragwa 
kazitunga nta kundi yari kubigenza uretse gukora ibyo Mariya yamubwiye gukora 
Nibyiza ko ureba Seine yirabura gahoro
Inyenyeri ya nimugoroba ninyenyeri yo mu gitondo
nkitegeko Igihe ababyeyi babemerera 
Icara neza Nzagaruka
kubagabiza inkota ye ikabatumura nk umukungugu  bigatumabashushubikanywa 
Niba imvura itaguye reka dusohoke 
Ese u te incuti O Yego
Ifoto ya sogokuru iri kurukuta
ahubwo mu mahanga yose uyubaha agakora ibyiza azagororerwa
cyatumye ikindi kigo cy iby ingede gikora
Rangurura ijwi kandi umunsi wanyuma uravuka
Hano hari igicucu munsi yurutare rutukura
yo kugomera amategeko agenga ubuzima
mwuka ukorera mu batumvira 
Niba ushaka kubona Tom ugomba kwihuta 
Ikibazo nuko tudafite amafaranga ahagije 
Ntabwo nashoboraga kubikora 
Muzi yuko umubiri wanyu 
Nzaba hejuru ku gisenge
uwo muganga wenda we ashobora kugira icyo yahindura
Njye namarira menshi ubu koko mama ntakintu azongera gukora 
bacu bagira imibereho izirana nuburwayi
Igihe kizagera uzamenya ukuri
Ushobora kandi gukora n ibindi byagirira
Yashoboraga kurwara ibicurane 
Nangahe nasangiye
Noneho nkwiye kwiringira Umuntu bwoko ki
Ninde wamurongoye mukinana kurenza umufasha
Hamwe nuduseke twavunitse arirwo
Ntabwo ari byiza kuvuga gutya 
Imana yacu igirubuntu nimbabazi itinda kurakara
Mukandoli yagiye guhaha nyuma yo kwinjira mumafaranga
Tom afite abahungu batatu Umuntu afite imyaka hafi 
Trix arashaka gushimira Mukandoli kumufasha
nuwashaka yagenda nubu ndabona nakazi narimfite
Malariya ni indwara imibu itwara 
Nabajije Tom niba ashobora kuyitegura bitarenze
Hashize amasaha make nyuma yaho
Trix yumvise ikiganiro cya Mukandoli na Yohana
wabimubwira cya wabyihorera
Ntabwo nshobora kwishima mugihe David ababaye cyane 
Yamumanuye munsi yumutwe muto
ibyigisho mutanga byerekeranye ninyama 
Uhamagara nde 
zipimishwa umubabaro Kristo yagize mu gihe 
Byantwaye hafi amasaha atatu kugirango ndangize umukoro wanjye wimibare 
Fabiora ati ibyo ni ibintu byoroshye rwose icyo
Nzi impamvu yatumye areka akazi 
yari yaguye mukantu atabyumbva neza
Niki kigutera gutekereza ko tutarangije kubikora 
Yaretse amaroza avukirayo
gicaniro i nk uko Yehova yari
Niba Bobo yari afite amafaranga menshi yakugurira ibyo 
ariko yaburijemo urugomo ububabare
gukorwa ku buryo bwisanzuye mu mijyi 
Wagiye kuri gari ya moshi nkubonye 
Ntabwo ari uguceceka ahubwo
Baseball irashimishije cyane iyo golf 
Muri wowe mfite inshuti nziza
kugira ngo ab inzu ya Isirayeli mbafatane ibiri mu
ntakintu warugereranya narwo kuko sinari nkibasha
Uzabyara abana wahisemo kandi ishyingiranwa
Reba ikirere isi nibidukikije byose
Igihugu cyababyaye cyateye ishema cyane muburyo bwacyo
mu zindi ndimi  kubicapa  kubiteranya 
agiye Kubaka igihugu cyubuntu
Sinari nzi ko hari umuntu unyitegereza 
kandi bindeba kurusha uko najya muribyo
Hejuru yikinini kinini cyo guhindagura urusyo
kandi ndashaka gutekereza
Iyo nza kuba wowe namubaza 
Tom yasize Mariya byose
Ariko kuva mu ntangiriro y irema
nenda kwitura hasi maze nonoho umujinya uranyica 
Aterura urutoki rwacuramye
Nibyiza bazagaragara nyuma
muremure wumuhungu imana yintambara yiteka
Mfite ibyo twibuka mu mutima wanjye
uwundi muryango bihuje intego 
byashyizweho n ubuyobozi bwayo bikorwa 
Icyo cyuma nticyari cyoroshye kuburyo ntashobora kugikoresha mu guca inyama kuburyo nagombaga kwishingikiriza ku cyuma cyanjye 
Mumwereke muri ubu buryo Ntabwo ndamutinya
Impamvu zagiye zibyara ingaruka 
Ibyo rwose byanshimisha 
Nazengurutse irungu nkigicu kuko ntamuntu twarikumwe
Niba ukuboko kwawe kwitanga no kumutima wawe kwerekanwe
Imana ikampa icyo nifuza
mwe n abahungu banyu n abakobwa banyu  n abagaragu banyu n abaja banyu 
Uzuza ubutayu bwose nijwi ridasubirwaho
ndimo gusa dukomeza kurwanira ku muyango 
ugendera mu mwijima adafite umucyo
muri sosiye mfatanyabikorwa ye 
Nishimiye ko ntariye ibiryo byaguteye uburwayi 
Bobo ntazemera ijambo umubwira 
Nyamasheke  Ikibazo cy icumbi kiri hafi
Yari umusirikare wubwami 
Urabitekerezaho hamwe nuyu murongo
Arashobora kuvuga gusa rwose 
Igicucu igicucu nyamara kitavunitse
Ibyo badashobora kumenya neza aho
Tom ni mugufi ariko ntabwo ari mugufi nka Mariya
Biracyari kare kuryama 
Cyangwa hejuru yumusozi cyangwa kuzenguruka inguni itunguranye
amashami nk ayayo  Ibiti by imyarumoni ntibyigeze bigira
Vuba aha ni bwo yahinduye imitekerereze 
Iminsi irahita iyo uhuze 
Ntukabaze ibibazo byinshi 
Wangerurira iyo sahani
kuzampakabizakugora rwose
Tom na Mariya bagendaga hamwe
Igihugu cyose cyababajwe no kumva ko umwami wabo yapfuye 
Ndashaka kwerekana ibyiringiro ko umubano mwiza wubucuruzi uzakomeza
Nari ngiye gusubiza ubwo yagabanije ashize amanga 
Kimwe cya kabiri uburyohe bwabo bwarengana
Na twe twigire mu byacu
Umubiri uraremererwa maze ukifuza guhangana 
umurayi wari wabuzuyeho
Mu bagiraneza abatwara amafaranga
Mu byukuri ngomba kurangiza umukoro wanjye 
Umushimusi yambwiye ko azica Tom niba nterekanye wenyine 
Trix na Mukandoli bombi bishimira gukina basketball
niyongere ibikorwa wenda Linda azagera aho amukunde
gusa nari ntangiye kwibagirwa agahinda kurupfu rwa mama 
cya Ntosho ngo pfukama umurase 
Ibindi birababaje
Nuko yaje kugera mukigo cisgur yaragiye kwigamwo aho yaje
Haba muri atome yijimye cyangwa mubumuntu
Mariya asoma kugirango ateze imbere ibitekerezo bye
Ku bapfuye batagifite ijoro ryo gukunda
Nahuye na Tom ngiye ku ishuri
Ntakintu kiryoha nkibiryo ukora 
mushahara  Leta igenera buri wese
Yashimangiye ko ari amakosa yanjye 
Naguze iyi shati muri iryo duka hariya 
biga imyaka nimyaka Ndetse no muri iki gihe
yari yarashatse umukobwa wa Rugira
Gakwaya yambwiye ko afite inyota 
Mushiki we muto ni we wamennye igikinisho cye 
Bobo azi ko ari bibi gukina numukasi 
Mariya numukobwa mwiza cyane
n abinjira bashya ku isoko 
Tom yicaye hejuru yintebe ye areba mu idirishya 
Birasa nkaho ejo twakinnye hamwe

ishobora gufata igihe ariko haribisabwa

mu bihuru by inzitane byo kuri Yorodani

ntibashobora gutsinda urugamba

MUKURU W INGABO Z U RWANDA
Iki nigice cyumwimerere 
kurya ibyokurya bikungahaye ku mavuta nibirungo 
kazitunga yakundaga Mariya ariko ntiyigeze amukunda 
Tom yasobanuriye Mariya icyo kibazo
Waba rwose witaye kubyo batekereza

imyaka magana urwenda na cumi nibiri arapfa 
Isanduku yafunguwe ryari
Ndashaka kwerekana neza ko ntigeze mpindura ibitekerezo

zitwara abagenzi zabuze maze aza kwemera ndanucyura

CARE  RWANDA KANDI RYEMERA
Ese ibimenyetso byerekana ko bitwaga umudamu
Amaze imyaka magana atatu aruhukira
Ye nubwo muvuga amasengesho menshi
Nshaka ubwungo bwa Gihanga
Ntekereza ko Esperanto ari ururimi rutoroshye

ndetse guhera bakiri bato Mubaburire

Chris buri gihe abaza igitekerezo cya Mariya

ariko Imana yo ntiyahindutse 
Imirongo imwe ihinduranya amabara
Bwira aba bana bidafite ishingiro
Yavuze ko akazi ke kamuhaye kumva indangamuntu 
Intambwe yintambwe yanjye
Baracecetse kugira ngo bataboneka 
Iyo nza gufata iyo ndege nari gupfa ubu 
kazitunga akunda golf ariko Mariya yibwira ko itinda kandi irambiranye 
Iki gicuruzwa kirashimishije gukoresha 
Ashingiye ku Itegeko rishyiraho Ikigo cy Igihugu gishinzwe ubuziranenge
imirambo yabo irambarare mu
akamoto ndataha gusa ngeze mu rugo 
Iterambere ririmo gukorwa 
Ibi bituma amaraso yanjye abira 
Imodoka ya toyota na Dinky
Ntugomba kubimenya kuko ntabyo uzi
Ntabwo nsobanutse neza kuriyi ngingo 
Yabuze umuyobozi ariko asunika ikibero cye
Ibihano bivugwa mu gika cya mbere cy iyi
Iminwa namaboko kumva namaso
Ntuye mu isambu
igihe ubwo yasengeraga ku musozi Karumeli umuriro waturutse mu ijuru ugakongora igitambo 
Muri za nkuru ze yatubwiraga
Urukundo nawe ararushaka kandi byamubera
Nzi neza ko urubanza rwacu rwari rukwiye 
Wakwemera niba tuvuga igifaransa 
hashingiwe ko ayo makuru akenewe kugira ngo
niba byashoboka mbe ndi hano iwawe nkurikirane Linda
amahame adakuka bazabasha kwirinda 
Ku mutwe we umutiba wuzuye ibyatsi
Amafunguro tutari dufite uko byagenda kose
Numvise ngize ubwoba gusa ndavuga nti ntakibazo tugende
Ndumva itsinda ryamamaye rizaseswa 
n ibigo cyangwa imiryango bitari ibya
Nibagiwe hafi gukora umukoro wanjye 
imirwi ngo amenye ibyo aribuyakoreshe
Yakomeje avuga
Kuko uru Rwanda ni ùruto cyane 
akamubwira ko aho bagiye
Iyo ziguye ngwino bavugishije ukuri baritonda
Nkako mukundwa utakindeba nagato
ariko humura chr urimo kurira ugatuma 
Mu materaniro makuru yacu hakwiriye kubaho
Agashya kandi karenze urugero
Mandela ziba sinshaka kukumva uvuga nawe
Nzi neza ko Tom azajya koga natwe 
Nibyo koko wowe na Bobo mwashakanye 
Tanga  gushyingirwa kwawe kugaragare
Samantha sha humura ntacyo yaba nawe ni 
abanyamuryango ndetse n abawushinze 
Gusuhuza umuntu mu Kinyarwanda
Iyi ni inyoni bwoko ki 
Tom na Mariya babyinnye ijoro ryose
Nawe data ngaho ku burebure bubabaje
Yinjiza amadorari arenga magana tanu buri kwezi avuye muri ako kazi 
Ntabwo yari yarize amashuri asanzwe 
Umuhungu avuga nkaho ari umugabo 
Ni kangahe ku ishuri ufite ibitekerezo byinshi byizera
Bajyanye nibibindi kugera kumugezi wurubingo
Ibirenge bye byoroshye byambaye inkweto nini
Ubugome butagira izina bwimvururu zabaturage
hasi kukabuye kari ahantu
Imana yamwohereje kuri uyu mupfakazi kugira ngo abe ari ho abona ubwihisho 
Icyo gihe yari arimo ateka ifunguro rya nimugoroba 
Usibye ko wowe kumurusha Kumurika hafi
Glen ifunganye yari yuzuye imbaraga zo gukurura umwuka umwe
Ibyo byakomeje gushyuha cyane
Cyangwa ubundi buhamya bwijoro Nymphs zagiye
ibintu bisanzwe bibaho
Ntiwibagirwe gufata umutaka wawe mugihe uvuye hano 
ibaruwa arebe ibirimo
Iyo twazamutse hejuru niko byakonje 
Nanjye ubwanjye nzamwigisha
ubwiza butsinda ubwiza
Hagati yibiti byimikindo ku gahanga
Ntabwo nzongera kubikora 
Ni umugore ushimwa 
Bobo na Mariya bari hagati yimpaka zikomeye igihe John yinjiraga mu cyumba 
Uzi ko nanjye ndagukunda
Yari umwana we kwitwara gutya 
zirushaho kuba nziza kuruta ibyokurya byorohereye cyangwa igikoma 
cyukwezi kumwe kandi igakora mu mezi 
aramubaza ati esubwo ko wagize
Bigaragara ko imvune ye yari mbi cyane 
Kate yakoze pome 
Kandi ni umukino wubwoba
Crystallize hafi ya nucleus rusange
Arazamuka aragenda ashaka imana nubutabera
Inteko rusange ibasha guhagarika buri wese mu
ku ruhu  azatangaze ko uwo barukuyeho
kandi zigakoresha nabi ubwonko bwabo 
Ongera umbwire igihe igitaramo gitangiye 
Ntabwo ikozwe mu kirahure cyangwa ibiti cyangwa ibuye

ingingo zo kwigwa z Umunara w Umurinzi mu gikisi
Nkuko benshi bamutangariraga kuko mu maso he
Tom yuriye muri lift hamwe na Mariya
Nizere ko usobanukiwe uko mbyumva
kazitunga yabaye anorexic igihe yari umunyeshuri mu mashuri yisumbuye 
Niba uhinduye imitekerereze tubitumenyeshe 
Bose baturuka mu majyepfo namato ya Nelson
Ntekereza ko spaghetti ari kimwe mu biribwa bikomeye ku isi 
Bagendera mu nzira zigoramye
ibyokurya byabo babirisha marigarine 
NLC  amaze kwumva icyo Inama
Bazakingura ryari 
Mariya yarebye mu gikapu cye ariko ntiyabona icyo yashakaga 
Ntabwo nari nkwiye kujya i Boston tutari kumwe nawe 
Inteko y Ishami ry ibanze rya sendika 
yamubwiye byari bitangiye kuba
gukoresha ibyokurya biva mu butaka kandi bazagenda
Umukobwa azabona umuntu utazi
Dufite icyubahiro cyo kuba banyakubahwa
Ikibazo nuko ingufu zizuba zitwara amafaranga menshi cyane 
Biro y Intara cyangwa bisabwe Perezida  
gutangaza burundu ibyavuye mu itora 
Muganga yamanutse gato umusego
Yerekeje ku matariki ku mva
Ingingo ya   Gukoresha uburiganya 
Iyo inzozi za mbere zijoro zigeze
Iyi shusho ni iya Tom

Ninde wazamura ingingo zumukungugu ubarwa
Umuhungu yahunze ambonye

Ibyo ntunze ninzu yanjye
umenagurira ibitare imbere yUwiteka 
kubyerekeranye nuburyo wakoresheje dash yawe

ubwo yahanuraga amanota nyayo yimikino itanu
Trix si we wenyine warebaga Mukandoli

kazitunga ntiyashakaga kumva ibibazo byose bya Mariya ariko yicara atuje maze aratega amatwi 
Kunda ubudakemwa ingeso ze kugira ngo mubane
Igihe kirageze ko uhindukira ukadutera imbaraga
Gusa nibajije icyo kibazo kimwe 
Urashaka kwicara ahandi 
Mariya yatangajwe nibyo yabonye

nindwara zikomeye zikangiza amaraso

maze kwikunda gusimbura urukundo yakundaglmana

Chris buri gihe asa nkaho ari kuri terefone na Mariya 
Ariko amaso yabanyabyaha aziheba
Buri gihe yibagirwa ibintu 
uruhare mu bugenzuzi afite umutungo
Amatunda nibinyampeke biteguwe neza
Nizere ko ababyeyi bawe bazatwemerera kurushinga 
cyangwa ryaranduye muryamo y inka 
Ameza yAbanyamerika akenshi aba ateguye

ugasubirana imbaraga Kwigomwa kurya
Tom yateye ubwoba Mariya pistolet
Bicaye kumeza bakina amakarita 
Buri gihe abaza ibibazo byubusa 
gusa ntungurwa no kumva ijwi ritava mu kanwa

ubwo se atarakomeza abona

utu jus banaganira nkuko inshuti

rucana namaganya intoki zifashe

ngo ihaze ibyo dukeneye

ahubwo nkingurira nisohokere

wa Fabiora yerekezaga nuko

mu bigo bya Leta

IBIKORWA BYO KUBUNGABUNGA ibidikikije
mfite umuheto wanjye Rwego 
David asa nuwishimye bihagije 
Ahari uburyohe butatu bwa ice cream buzwi cyane ni vanilla shokora na strawberry

Ndasaba cyane ko mwaguma kure ya Bobo

Reka turebe niba dushobora kumenya aho Tom yagiye 
ikibiriti na peterori ubundi aratwika we yumvaga
Bobo arashobora kukubwira ibintu bimwe na bimwe bitari ukuri 
ko wenda agiye hafi ari buhite agaruka ariko 
kazitunga arashaka kumenya igihe winjiye 
wumushinwa akaza akagira nawe icyo yamukoraho ambwira 
Yari umukene ku buryo atashoboraga kugura imigati
Yego nzi neza ko ari ababyeyi banjye
Buri munsi urashobora gukuramo porogaramu
natekereje ko ahari ndakajiji nkaba ntabona ibyo abandi babona 
ibyokurya bifitiye umubiri akamaro Ishobora kuzuza ameza mu 
Umunsi umwe ugomba kunama ibintu byose mubushake bwe
Nicaye iruhande rwa Tom 
Iryo jwi rirababaje cyane 
Kuki batakwishima 
Abaganga babwiye Mukara ko Mukandoli atazigera akira
Banki Nkuru kigafatwa nk ibindi bikorwa byose
rw ibumoso n uw Umuyobozi wa Banki
Fransisko Nzaramba yatwaraga UbusanzaSud
Amagufa yumye ntashobora kugirira nabi umuntu
Umutima wumugabo aho umutima wumugore wumukene waririmbaga
Umuvumo ibihuha byishyari
Yasenyutse nkigitaramo
Ntushobora kwera imbuto ushaka
Icyo gihe Trix na Mukandoli ntibari inshuti
abagore babo akenshi usanga aribo ari kugura
Yaje kudusaba ubufasha 
tuganire kuko ndabakeneye
Igihe abarwayi baturutse hanze bagana
Mushiki wa Mariya agira isoni kandi ateye isoni
ngo ni wa muswa ngo ni henry wayimuhaye gusa nawe 
afite ubuzima bwiza ku buryo bushoboka 
Nzi uko Tom yumva Mariya
izo ngirwabukwe zihagarare
Nzatuma kubahiriza umunsi wa karindwi biba ikimenyetso cyo kutumvira abayobozi bisi 
Ntabwo nahise mbizera 
Iyo byaje byubaka ikadiri
Iyi ni intsinzi ikomeye 
Ntabwo nizera ko 
Wizera rwose ibyo bintu 
Iki kintu ntikizaramba
Intoki zishaje zishaje amahwa ashaje atabarika
Guhagarika umutima numuruho byatezwaga niyo mikorere 
Nashakaga kubaza Tom amafaranga yishyuye inzu ye nshya ariko Mariya ambwira ko ibyo bizaba ari ubupfura 
Ni umuhungu wenyine twigeze kugira 
kunyirukana najye nkoresha amayeri yose ngo
arangije yahise ambwira ati Linda buvuye ku mutima 
nyobora ku buryo Isabato yImana izaba igisuzugurwa mu buryo bwihariye 
Nzakomeza ibyo niba utabyitayeho 
ni nde  Kandi mwene Yesayi ni nde  Muri iyi minsi
Nuko duhereruka Diane yikubise hasi Tutazi
nkibisanzwe twari twinjiye ndimo ndarira
Ubwitonzi bwa veleti hamwe na roza nkoraho
Maze Shekaniya mwene Yehiyeli umwe wo muri
ngo nicuza impamvu ntariye abana kweli
y agaciro muri mine nini  hakurikijwe iri
UMUTWE WA   INZEGO
maze wagenzura neza ugasanga icyo kintu ari ukuri koko
igatuma ikigo kibona umusaruro mwinshi wimizabibu
Iyo yakoraga ku rusengero rwa tutelari
byamadorari yAmerika ku kwezi
Urashobora kumbwira igihe kazitunga ageze hano 
Bari hafi kurengerwa nikamyo 
Ingingo ya   Inzego zigize Ubushinjacyaha 
by ubwizerane n abacunga iby abandi
Wagize icyumweru cyo gukora ibi Uzi byinshi kuri ibi 
Nakekaga ko avuga ibinyoma ariko ntibyantangaje 
Narangije kugasoma umutima wongeye kumvamo
Nyamara nubwo Yobu yari aremerewe nubuzima ntiyemerewe gupfa 
Ntushobora gutekereza gukora ibyo urashobora 
Nabyumvise nshyira bibiri na bibiri hamwe 
S Pawulo ntabwo yari kumwe na Mariya igihe yibwe isakoshi 
Uwo yari Bobo wavuganaga gusa sibyo 
Ntuzigera uba wenyine 
nimugenze mutya  muhekeshe indogobe zanyu
muve murayo kuko ndumva mwebwe mwabigize ibyoroshye
Tom yahuye na Mariya muri hoteri yi hoteri
yakubitanye na japhet arimo
maze umuyaga mwinshi wa serwakira uraza usatura imisozi 
Trix yakuye mikoro mu biganza bya Mukandoli
Ntabwo yari umuntu wabantu bakunda 
kutemerwa cyangwa kutishyurwa  ibyo wakoresheje
ry ibyishimo ziri ku
Mukanya gato Fabric yarageze murugo nuko
Tom ntiyigeze areka gahunda
Tom yabajije ikibazo 
kuba izigendana no kugira amagara mazima mu byumubiri 
Ntabwo uzakenera guhangayikishwa nibyo 
Narihuse cyane kuburyo nibagiwe gukinga urugi 
akwiriye kumuha ibyo ararikira 
kazitunga yashakaga kubaza ibibazo ariko ntiyabikora 
Ndashaka rwose kumenya ukuri 
Ntacyo yungutse ambwira ibyo 
ntanisoni bifite mumve mumaso se
Icyo gihe nzashyira umusaya
Kandi ahanini baragenda nijoro
akora mugihe amahirwe yanjye yahindutse
Sinshobora kwizera ko Bobo yariye byose 
Umunwa wumusozi wapfuye amenyo yinzaduka adashobora gucira
Ubwato bwose bukora umurimo 
Tom na Mariya bafite impungenge
Cyane cyane iyo ugize Imana
Tom na Mariya barishimishaga
akora kuri uwo mugabo wari waguye agacuho 
Gakwaya yabonye ko ibyo bishobora kuba ikibazo 
we asohoka muri ubwo buvumo  ahamagara Sawuli mu ijwi
Nibagiwe aho ishuri ryanjye riri
Amayobera yaramurenze
Naje hano nkiri umwana 
Mose na Aroni batavuze ukuri kuri ibyo  Yehova yababwiye
Umwuka we wari mwiza nka Gicurasi
bagiye kuyagura umukwe aba araje
Ubusanzwe yagiye kuryama saa kumi nimwe 
Nishimiye kubwira Bobo ibyo nzi byose kuri ibyo 
Eliya ashobora kuba yaribajije uburyo amasoko yamazi atarigeze areka gutemba yakama 
Guma kuriyi nzira
ngo hakoreshwe uburyo buteganywa
nibabazanira imanza zose zubwicanyi cyangwa zibyitegeko 
Ntabwo nshobora kwizera ko ibi byose bibaho 
Umucuzi aryamye muri forge
Ntabwo nemera ko igitagangurirwa kikiriho 
Nshobora kukubona umunota nyamuneka 
Mu byukuri sinshaka ko abana basigara bonyine 
Kumurikira inzira yanjye yiteka
kazitunga yashakaga gusaba Mariya gusohokana na we ariko ntiyagira ubutwari bwo 
Sinzi igihe ngomba kuza 
kuko bamwe bacumbikiye abamarayika batabizi
mu kunyunyuka ukuboko 
Nyamuneka saba Tom kudataka 
Yatangaga ubuto bwe nintoki
Nagerageje kumva uburyo ibyo bishoboka 
Ni muri urwo rwego kuva mu wa mbere kugeza mu wa kabiri
ibibazo byabo igomba kuba yoroshye kugerwaho
Ibyo bisa nkamahembe yacu 
Nta gutaka kuzaba kuriyo 
Nari nzi ko uzavuga ikintu nkicyo 
Nicaye muri gari ya moshi

Chris numwe mubantu bake nshobora kwizera 
ngo yiturize ntakibazo gihari abifate nkaho

ibyo bintu biva mu mutima wanjye

ibindi kabsa kandi cyntia mwaba

Iyo porogaramu izatangazwa muri Amerika yose
Ntugomba kwibagirwa kwandikira ababyeyi bawe byibuze rimwe mukwezi

usanga ko abagize imiryango baba badakunda

steven nawe aravuga ati 
kubababaza kuri bo  ku murimo 
Yongeye kwinjira mu bitaro

iriho kandi iraganje Izaha ubumenyi ngiro
ntabwo azahungabana nimumwitaho neza

mu mubiri iyo bariye kabiri ku munsi

hose ho mu gihugu  akore ibyo ba sekuru na ba
Mfite umukobwa mwiza

ntibashobora kugera ku mitima yababateze amatwi

Ingando ya Byumba  Gicumbi 
Tom aribeshya niba atekereza ko ashobora guhora afite inzira ze 
Imana yateranyirije hamwe ntihakagire umuntu ugitandukanya Matayo

angella nawe ati nanjye nuko

GUTERANYA  Lw   uteranye iteraniro ryose

uha umwana amashereka azatunga ubuzima bwe

Niba Tom yari kurya bike yaba afite ubuzima bwiza

iba yatewe no kugaburirwa birengeje urugero

cy icumbi ku buyobozi bw Akarere ka

Izingiro ry amahoro ya GASIGWA 
Bamuhaye isambu yibigori
Sinkeneye indabyo ishema cyane
Uwumva wese ijambo ry ubwami ntarimenye azapfa
kugenderwaho mu mirimo ya za resitora zacu 
shampiyona itaha hamwe na Willian niba imbere irangije 
Mariya yakuye indorerwamo ntoya mu gikapu cye agenzura umusatsi we na maquillage 
Yapfuye afite imyaka  
nawe wa nyanjak we
kwigomwa kurya mu gihe gito bigakurikirwa
Umutima we wari wuzuye ibikorwa
Umugabo we yerekanaga umuhondo
Ubwo twakomezaga kubona police iza idusatira
Bahinda umushyitsi munsi yijisho rya shebuja
cyntia nawe ati wooww 
Nta kintu Mbaraga akora kitagitangaje 
kandi nkunda maze mu gihe yansomeshaga kuri ji
Ari ukwuzuraho ivu
Maze abo bagabo baherako batinya Uwiteka
Nari nkwiye gukora ku manywa kandi rwose
Mu murimo uheruka Imana izakora ku isi 
Ngiye kwibagirwa ko wabivuze
Ni nde usohora ibintu byose
wabonye ubushobozi bwo gukomeretsa
Igitaramo nticyari cyiza cyane 
Reka noye kubivuga Ntavugishwa ntivuze Amazinda akanzamo
narapfuye uwo mupolisi yumvise iyo mvugo yumva
Ibyo kubitekereza mumaso

Ishyamba ryenag hanyuma ararusimbuka
kuri Samantha ubuzima bwari bwararyoshye 
Yaduteye ishema atwereka inyamaswa
Yasinziriye cyane yumvise izina rye ryitwa 
Kandi kwinubira intoki zo kudakoraho
bubasezeranye aribuze Fabric
Tom anyemeje ko Mariya yari afite ukuri
Yatewe nubushyuhe bwawe
Ntabwo twari twategereje igihe ukwezi kugaragara 
kobwa wanjye  ese sinagombye
kandi ntanakwiriye kumuha ibyokurya byinshi bikabije
David ntashobora kurasa umuntu 
nijoro cyane ubwo ijoro ryaratambutse
Bobo yinjiye mu igaraje rye azimya moteri hanyuma ava mu modoka 
ko kitazishyuza FARG ibyo cyemereye Komisiyo 
Tom yaba ari kubagwa
Ndakugira inama yo kutabwira Mbaraga kubyerekeye 
Abaturage bo muri uyu muryango muto ntibemera kugaragariza abantu urukundo 
Rwose mbabarira kuko kwirata kwanjye ari ukuri
ubumenyi bukuzuza mu byumba by imbere 
Icyiciro cya mbere  Umuyobozi wa KIE
washyizweho na Komiseri Mukuru ashobora
Birakonje cyane kuri picnic uyumunsi 
Tom ntabwo yinjiza amafaranga menshi nka Mariya

ingingo zurwungano ngogozi kuko imeze

akanyabugabo ngahita mubwira ko mukunda
bwiza mu bwenge no mu mubiri 
buryo bwemewe iyo hari ubwiganze bwa

biba ikosa rihanishwa kimwe mu bihano

n igihe cyose bibaye ngombwa itumijwe na

ndakwinginze umuntu nawe ati

UMUKARA WUMUKARA TURI AMAHORO

Kuri uwo mugabane hazabeho umugabane wera

bwuzuye imbaraga Nuko rero nimureke
Chris ahora yambara umukandara

Wakoze ibishoboka byose

mu matunda mu mboga no mu binyamisogwe

Nta muti wubukonje busanzwe

ahindukiye ahita akubitana amaso na Fabric nuko
Nakubwiye kangahe ko utabikora

kandi buri gihe gerageza kubyumva

ni ngombwa kubyatura imbere yumushumba

ahita amubaza ati niko willia

HOSEENUUWITEKA UMUREMYI WACU  
David ntiyigeze asura Jane mu bitaro 
Mbwira ibyo wakoze muminsi mikuru yawe
Nasetse cyane ndarira hafi 
abafozi b imiheto bose  Muteze urugamba muhagote
umugogo w umwami w i Babuloni kandi rikamukorera
Ibyo ntibidufasha rwose sibyo

Ayo majwi yumvikaniye kuri uwo musozi maze yirangira mu kibaya cyari hepfo yawo

Iyo resitora ihenze cyane

kugira ngo abe ariho ansanga ataza yabona 
niba tutabavuye ngo tubiteho uko bikwiriye 
Nimyenda ye ku mugongo
Ninde urabagirana witonze ukora igitaramo
Byihuse cyari igisubizo gito cyumukobwa

Mu mijyi cumi nibiri myiza irabagirana

abaturanyi gusa nkigera kumuryango mbona

mwanshakiraga ubundi ngataha

akenshi bitewe nubutunzi bwumuryango

Wibagirwe kubyo 
Samantha yewe uwo Rick simuzi gusa ubwo ndasubira
Ntushaka kumenya icyo Chris agutekerezaho koko 
Nasanze intebe yorohewe iyo nicayeho 
Uratekereza rwose ko nahitamo kuba i Boston kuruta Chicago 
Bacuruza imbuto nimboga kuri iryo duka 
Kubahiriza ibyemezo bya Kongere
Nabonye nkabapfuye bakanguwe nurupfu
no mu irari ryinshi ryubupfu rikabangiza
Ibi byose biragoye cyane 
amakipi y abubatsi bagendaga bubaka amazu y Abahamya yari yangijwe cyangwa 
Umuvuduko ukabije wibyiyumvo
Intambara yubutita yatangiye nyuma yintambara ya kabiri yisi yose 
Niba uhagaze ukaruhuka ibi bizagabanya impagarara nimpungenge mubitugu byawe 
Mu byukuri sindi abashonje 
Nta kindi nifuza nko gukora ibyo 
NDACYAHA HANO
bikungahaye ku binure Ni ingenzi
Reka manze nkumvishe aya magambo mama wawe yavuze
Birashoboka ko atari we wabikoze
bitarenze iminsi irindwi y akazi ahereye igihe byatangiriye
Kunda imana nziza kunda imana ihishe
Ariko ubwo mwanyim ye mugakorera izindi
Ndagukunda pe ntushake ubyemere
Mu mva nziza yo kuvuga igikundiro kuri njye
Nze ngusange umpobere Nguhe ibere usirimuke
Iyo mpunzi yari inaniwe 
Nakoze urutonde rwibiryo ntashobora kurya 
yamafaranga yatanzwe na sosiyete 
nimiryango itegamiye kuri Leta muri Irani

YA LETA Y UMWAKA WA   HAMWE
Babuze nkaho isi yabasubije inyuma
Kure kure yibi bihe byiza
kazitunga asa nkaho yapakiye ibintu byose ariko igikoni cyarohamye 
Ni umwere nibyiza birakomeye ni bito
Mu byukuri sinzi byinshi kuri wewe 
Amafunguro atatu ku munsi hamwe
abagenzi bamaguru nibo bari kwambuka
Ntabwo aribyo navuze 
imirimo y isosiyete n iri tegeko
Kubyara amoko mashya yubaha
Chris ntashobora kwizera ko Mariya ateganya kugenda 
Muri sterile impapuro Yari hafi cyane
Muri injiji nkanjye ndetse birenze
Mugupima intwaro zombi neza
amasezerano yabo hagati ya   kugeza iri
imyaka aho ndeba nkuko buri kintu kiri
Nzi ko ushaka kwishima 
Sinzigera nibagirwa ibyo wankoreye 
Hanyuma kandi ifunguro rya nyuma bakarifata
Umuhungu yemeye ko yamennye vase 
Ndashaka kwifatanya nabo
Kuri ecran kumwanya ibintu byose bizerekanwa
Trix ahora yinubira ko Mukandoli atwara vuba cyane
mbapimira ifeza na zahabu n ibikoresho
Mubyukuri ntabwo meze mumutima ibi 
Igicu kimeze nkibendera riva mu kirere
hakoreshwa cyangwa hatangirwa uburyo
Namwemeye nawe kuri iyo ngingo
Iyo mugize akamenyero kabi mu mirire 
Umuganga w amatungo wamenyeshejwe
Hanyuma naje kubona ko kuruta ikindi kintu cyose 
Kurenza guhangana nibibazo biteye ubwoba
Gakwaya ntabwo yavuze ko yahuye na Mariya 
n ibikorwa byo kwibwiriza birakorwa hariya
Abantu bamwe bavuga ko igifaransa cyoroshye kwiga 
Tom yambajije niba nkunda kwiga igifaransa 
Ibi bizashoboza abantu kwemera ko ibyifuzo byabo 
Nigute umuntu ashobora gupfa neza
Umusaza mu kagare kabamugaye yambwiye ko yari azi mama akiri ingimbi 
Mose umunyamateka wa mbere 
Reka nkubaze ikibazo 
Ninde wambaye imyenda idoda
Ntabwo nshobora kugendana nu muziki uherutse kuba mu Bwongereza 
Mu muyaga iyo uri hafi umuyaga uhuha
Hanyuma ab icyo gihe bose na bo barapfa
Uyu munsi birakonje rwose 
Ihamagazwa mbere y iminsi   Impaka zigibwa
Kuberako utigeze umenya igihe gisigaye
Henry Sawa ndagutegereje ubwo nzabonuje
papa angella aramubwira ati 
Nabajije Tom aho yari ari
