inyungu  cyane cyane mu ngingo zaryo  iya   iya Articles     and  
Imijyi myiza ya Wentworth na Warren yo guturamo
Ariko kuki ufata umwanya kubyo nkunda kumva
Eliya yari yariteze ko hazabaho ibintu byinshi bitewe nigitangaza cyakorewe ku musozi Karumeli 
gusa yari yarangiritse cyane mu mara kubera sumu ya panya
Ntabwo nemera ko ukora ibi 
Ibikombe bitwikīrwa namasaka
Ibihe bitandukanye biradutandukanya
kandi ibigirwamana byanyu biteye ishozi bikurweho o n ibicaniro mwoserezaho imibavu bimeneke
Iyo abihamijwe n urukiko  ahanishwa igifungo
Bari buzuye umutima wubwibone kandi baratwawe no gusenga ibigirwamana 
Mbanye neza nabaturanyi
Byaba byiza ufunze 
sha njye nkurikije uburyo kellia yendaga
unyoherereza message ndahita nyuza urupapuro
Umugore yasabwe gutanga amafaranga yubuzima bubi bwumwana 
Fabiora ati icyo ugomba kuyikorera ariko hano
Ntabwo nigeze njya kilometero imwe igihe imvura yatangiraga 
Yambuwe ageze mu rugo nijoro 
Biteye ubwoba kubapfu inyangamugayo kubantu
ntabwo nagenda nsize mugenzi wajye reka
Nahawe amabwiriza ku byerekeranye 
Intwari yemeye kurinda ya Nyirimbirima
Nkunda umuziki 
Bumvikanye ku giciro
Intego ya kamera kuri iri tsinda 
Iyi ndirimbo iroroshye kwiga 
Ubwoko bwabantu hafi ya bose ntibasaba kuzamurwa 
Kandi bakishimira ubugoryi bwabanyabyaha
Aherako aramukurikira
bihoraho kandi byimbitse gukorakora byoroheje
Niba ugiye gukora ibirori nyamuneka umbaze 
Na we Kalisa ati Urabashunga

mu gitondo nkazawuzindukana

ariko ugume hafi aho kuburyo niwumva boss
Ntukibagirwe ikintu na kimwe
Tom yahagaze imbere yinzu ya Mukandoli asohoka mu modoka ye

Ni umunyamerika ni umusitagiyeri wa Peace Corps 
Bobo ntazigera avuga ibintu nkibyo 
Ni ryari uheruka gukora umwenda

Umwarimu yari afite imbeho mbi

bamwe bageze mu buretwa kandi tubuze uko

uwabahitamo aba abaye ikizira

maze binginga imana yabo biterera hejuru bigaragura mu mukungugu

ye kumva  uba watakaje ubuimpamvu ukunda

Mu nzira yo kureba uko byakemuka
Ntabwo nshobora kuruhuka iyo mvugana nawe

Tom yajugunye ikindi giti ku muriro

bajya bagira ibyo batumvikanaho  Ababyeyi bawe na bo

Ndumva ko ari mubitaro ubu

Ntukabivugeho nko mu misa gusa

nka nyuma yimyitozo iremereye bikabije 
Hamagara kuri uyu mugoroba 
Nari kwiheba iyo bansabye kureka ikipe

muryango ufite intego zisa

wasanga ari william ashaka kugukorera
Niwe mugabo twashakaga 
UMUTWE WA II  UMUSHAHARA
Numvise mu mutwe noneho binshanze Samantha 
Umunyarukano umuntu ushinzwe gutanga ikoro iri niri ryo gushimira we
Bizakubabaza ndamutse mfunguye radio 
Muri kano kanya narabyizeye gato
Noneho kugerageza umudendezo wose waguzwe
Laura yahindutse imbeho nkibuye
asabwa ajyanye n uko isosiyete imeze
Ese habahoAmahirwe yurupfu
Reka Nero ahe intwaro amategeko ye
Ugomba kugirira neza abasaza 
Njye numvise iminota yose ishize Henry agipfukamye 
Ntiyigeze yurira imyenda yanjye yose
uburabyo bgamabara meza buhumuzumwuka neza 
Sinigeze mpamagara Chris 
Abanyamigabane b isosiyete bagira uburenganzira
Ntabwo arinjye wenyine utekereza ko aricyo gitekerezo cyiza 
Mbese Abanyetiyopiya nAbalubimu ntibari ingabo nyinshi bikabije 
Data yambwiye ko Intambara ya Kabiri yIsi Yose yarangiye 
Intangiriro Nyakuri yIvugurura nUbugorozi
kazitunga yabwiye Mariya gusubiza inyundo mu gasanduku kibikoresho arangije kuyikoresha 
ruto azaha uwo mwana imyitwarire nimico ye 
bibasha gukabura amaraso ariko igihe umuriro 
kuko Henry aragukunda kandi nta nundi musore 
na buri wese kandi ko hari ingaruka nyinshi 
Cyangwa bitandatu cyangwa birindwi turabana
Kuvuga izina rye numurimo akora 
amagara mazima ari ikintu cyatekerejwe 
Wafashe urutoki rumwe hejuru ya pee
cyagenzuwe giherereyemo cyagenzuriweho bari bakirimo ubwo
atiuyumunsi ndaza kwegera FABRIC mubwire ko
yicaye arikumwe kumutwe kugirango umurizo wa marcoun

Bakundwa ibitotsi byawe bibe byiza
Twigeze twishimira hamwe 
Tom na Mariya bari barambiwe gutegereza
kita ku bipimo ngenderwaho byo kudahemuka
Tom yabajije ibyinama 
Nabonye Ferrari itukura yijimye ihagaze ku marembo yikigo maze urwasaya rugwa 
Kandi ngo umutsima uhe imitima yabantu gukomera 
ubundi buryo byemewe mu kugenzura ubwiza
Ibirori bye rwose byari bishimishije 
Nziko ibyokurya bibasha gutegurwa 
Nagiye kureba nsanga umuhungu asinziriye cyane 
Mu myitwarire cyangwa mu mpu
Nzi neza ko Bobo atatunguwe nuko Mariya atagaragaye 
Twinjire mu kigo cya Business 
Gutinda gufata ibyokurya bya nimugoroba 
Isengesho Asa yasenze ni rimwe mu masengesho Umukristo wese wizera akwiriye gusenga 
Kandi nari naragiye nagarutse ejo bundi
amasezerano y inguzanyo no kwishyura
uwo mwami ntiyamenye ko bari bamuciriye igico 
Thomas yabaye umubwiriza w Ubwami 
amafaranga yo mu mahanga mu buryo
Tom yabajije Mariya icyo yashakaga gukora 
Ntabwo nashoboraga gukora ukundi 
Niwe urumva muri njye usa na we
Isolde igikombe gisangiwe

bya Tiro  uwo murwa   byajugunywe mu
Kunyerera mu ntoki zawe nubwo
erick na jack barimo gukina 
guteza imbere umuco wo gukora neza akazi
kumenya  gusesengura no gukurikirana imyenda
Sinzi niba nkwiye kwizera Tom cyangwa kutizera 
Bya butaka ninzu ibyabo mubitekerezo assignd
Ntidushobora kwerekana ko kazitunga abeshya ariko tuzi neza ko ari

ariko se koko boss urakomeje

ikiruhuko hakurikijwe amasaha yakoze

n iby ibikorwa  hakurikijwe uburyo bwemewe
Nigute bishoboka ko uhora wuzuye imbaraga
Uwo mutingito urasenyuka

kuri Yehova ati  genda umugarure mu rugo iwawe kugira ngo
akubita urugigi rimwe ahita yinjira asanga twese

Urugero ruhebuje Iyo uzashya
Amazi ye akonje yamenetse igitonyanga

ryaba ryaravuze ko dome ikora mu gihe
Yanyerera niba abishoboye adategereje canvas
Amaso yanjye amaze kuyakosora yabonye iyo mico
Igikorwa cyo gushaka amakuru ku bantu bahamijwe icyaha cya Jenoside
Igice cyiki gihugu ni icyanjye

imaze kuvaho ihute cyane kandi umenye

utaburimo bisa nko kwiyanga
Chris ntabwo buri gihe akora ibyo yabwiwe 
Abantu beza kurusha abandi mu gihugu cyose
Tom yahinduye imyanya na Mariya
AMAHORO YAKWA KURI LISANSI NA

umbwira ikibabazo ufite nyamukuru

boss nawe ati dore ngo birareba

ukaba incuti ye y indahemuka

INTERURO YA MBERE  INGINGO

Ngaho Cilniyo wa Arretium
Amazu menshi yangiritse muri nyamugigima 
Ikibazo nuko badafite amafaranga

aramye imyaka myinshi cyane

kujya yisetsa gake gake kuburyo wabonaga ko yishimye pe

Ugomba kugira umuganga ureba kuriya 
Byinshi kuri we na njye 
Ntugomba kumufata gutya 
Mu mitegurire yibyokurya ni ngombwa
Ntabwo nemera ko waguye kubwibyo 
Ibinyugunyugu byumuhondo bihinda umushyitsi

Ntabwo nigeze ngira ikibazo na kimwe

nibambe Imana idufitiye

kandi bikamenyeshwa abanyamuryango bose 
max nawe ati ewa kabsa sinzi pe

kazitunga yahise yiruka yumvise sirena 
Buri gihe usukura uhora urigata
Iki ni ikinyamakuru cya buri munsi 
Ni uwuhe muziki dukwiye gucuranga 
Tom yabajije umugabo uri kumeza imbere aho yakura ikositimu ye 
hafi ya yose yayobotse ibigirwamana

Abimukira ba mbere mu mateka yAbanyamerika baturutse mu Bwongereza no mu Buholandi

Ingingo ya   Kureka imbago

Ludicrous kugerageza gukinisha gukinisha no kuvuga tawdry
Ko ntawe uza kureba
bazabona ko ibyokurya bakoreshaga mbere 
Kandi bose basubira mu itumba ariko umuhanda
Ugomba kunkorera ibi 
Umwarimu yirukanye ishuri igihe inzogera yavuzaga 
Yahinduye ibara ryijimye
Bobo azi neza ko adashobora gusama 
Abo bahungu ntabwo ari beza kuvugana nabakobwa 
Dore iyi nganzo yarayigenze Ati

yahise asatira uwo muganga atangira kumutonganya

kabsa kandi buriya nimba witegereza

yibazaga ikiri mwibarwa akumva agize ubwoba

abari mu isi ntazigera areka abantu be ngo

Ingingo ya   Akanama gashinzwe umutungo
Ibyambo byagaragaye ko byatsinze bidasanzwe

ibindi bikoresho binyunyuza ibisukika
mbonezamikorere y umuryango ishingiye kuri

bwo gukoresha ibiva mu butaka 
ariko nyuma aza kubyuka asanga ndi kurira arampoza

Iyi nkota impano yubutaka bwa Odin 
Ntekereza ko turi abantu bonyine kuri iki kirwa

yabashishijwe kuzana impinduka nziza

reka dutekereze kure turebe icyo twakora

n urukumbuzi n ishyaka no guhora  Muri byose
n amafaranga y igenagaciro  Iyo nyandiko
Watangiye kwiga igifaransa ryari

Ko hari bitatu ndashaka kubiseka

yarahagaze neza yitegura kurya ifoto yagiye kubona
ntibakwiriye kwibwira ko umurimo wayo ari bo ushingiyeho

umubare w ababwiriza wagabanutseho gato

Nuko haheze akanya Diane yicaye aho atuje atanumwe
ingabo agabe igitero ku gihome cy umwami wo mu majyaruguru  Ni koko  azabarwanya

erega niyo naba impumyi nanjya

ubutumwa bwe bwatangaga umuti uvuye i Galeyadi womora imitima yokamwe nicyaha yabantu bose bifuzaga gukira

ryaciwe imisoro muri ubwo buryo
hariyo Urukuta runini gusa
bihabanye cyane nuko Imana nyakuri ibasaba kuyikorera babikuye ku mutima

hose iyo iryo saka rishobora kugira akamaro mu

ububasha bwo kuyihamagaza  Mu gihe
Mu bihumbi ubu Kandi iyo intwari zintwari
hejuru ariko bari bake kuburyo batabangamira ubworoherane nubumwe nubuzima bwuwo muhanda munini uhuze

ariko akomeza kwihagararaho Naramubajije nti

Irari Ridasanzwe Rigomba Kurwanywa
Nyina wa Chris yamubwiraga ko agomba kurya imboga nyinshi

bishobora gutwara umuntu kubeshya 
Mu kirenge cyabo bami munsi yabo bagabekazi

no mu minywere hamwe no gukabya mu ngeso

agaciro kibisarurwa mu butaka byera mu gihe

nibigeragezo byo ku ruhembe rwimbere

Tom yibagiwe gusezera kuri Mariya

Nibasinzire mumahoro mumuriro utazima
Icyemezo gifashwe n ikigo ngenzuramikorere

Uyu mugore ntiyari Umwisirayelikazi 
biva ku bimera bakwiriye kwitonda cyane bagategura

ku iteganyamigambi ry ishoramari
irindwi  Icyo gihe gishobora kugabanywa bibaye
Chris yampamagaye kuri iki gicamunsi 
Tuzabaza kazitunga icyo atekereza nitumubona

kazitunga niwe wenyine wari mu bwato igihe bwarohamye 
Ingingo ya     Gukodesha  gutiza cyangwa 
Nagiye ku ishuri nkiri muto 
Iwanyu ni Isi nibirimo byose
ninkunga idasanzweduheruka japhet
Bobo ntashobora kwizera ibyabaye 
cyangwaatabonetse  bigakorwa na Visi Perezida  bose
soya ibigize ayo mafunguro mu gitondo umwana afite amazi atanu
Mukandoli yatangiye kuvuza induru hejuru yibihaha
Najugunye ibintu byose mu idirishya
Mu gihe Perezida wa Repububulika cyangwa
asabiriza namaso yumuhondo
Njya kuryama saa kumi buri munsi 
a  Buri mwaka mu gihembwe   aha twavuga
Niki ugomba kugurisha nshobora gushimishwa 
utaranakora kumukobwa narimwe kweli

numukunzi we aramukunda cyane
ku mwaro wa Gisaya ati

bwari metero z ubuso 
nahise mpaguruka vuba vuba ndeba ku isaha ndababwira nti

ko angella asa nkurimo kugucika
Namwe iyo murya cyangwa munywa

ibyo byatumye nibaza ndetse nicuza impamvu
agahanga urwara akosereze ku gicaniro  amaraso
Zimwe muri izi pome ni mbi 
Linda koko niki gitumye umbabariza umutima bene aka kageni
kazitunga amaze kubyuka ibintu byose byari byuzuye urubura 
hashingiwe ku bisobanuro byerekana amakuru 
kazitunga yashakishaga Mariya hose ariko ntiyamubona 
Iyi raporo igizwe n ibice cumi na bibiri  bikurikira   
zitabara ngo zirebe ko iyo modoka

reka mbikubwire nawe wumve kandi wishyire mu mwanya wanjye

Buri gihe nagerageje gukomeza kugira ibitekerezo bifunguye 
Yabasabye inama 
Niba kandi wahitamo kudashaka  wenda hagashira nk igihe
Yamusutseho opulence yuzuye yo kumenyekana
Kwambara indabyo yera yubuzima butagira amakemwa
Ni ryari wabuze isaha yawe 
b ibihumbi  a abatware b amagana  b abatware bari bashinzwe

Kubura inkombe zanjye biragaragara
Aha hantu haranduye cyane 
Bityo ntube worohereye kandi ngo ube ufobagana 
Umunyeshuri yazamuye ikiganza umwarimu arangije gusoma 
wanjye ndetse bivamo no kubura umubyeyi wandeze ngakura
Amatara yubumaji ya horizon
Tom yafashije Mariya kuva mu bwato
imyenda kubwikizere babahaye
Ariko amaso yawe adafite uburyohe gusa
Ibi ni uguta igihe cyanjye 
batangira kutunnyega u no kuturebana agasuzuguro
Bazazamuka bakwire isi yose  bagote amahema
atari ukumukoresha ubusambanyi 
Yamubonaga amabuye kubera amaso yubururu
abakiliya  cyangwa igihe ibikorwa bya banki
Buri gihe ndamutekereza iyo ndi jyenyine 
Sinzigera ngura undi murimwe 
by umukobwa n ibyiyumvo bye 
Batarakatiwe ku buryo budasubirwaho igihano cy iremezo cy igifungo kingana
Biragoye kubigurisha ubu  asuhuza umutima
Kandi ibyo ni ibiki Wanyirukanye gusa 
Tom yari hafi kurengerwa nikamyo 
Ahaga utubondo asa nagapira
Umusabirizi yizingiye mu mwenda
wibeshye unkozeho numutwe wurutoki urebe ngo
Chris afite ikibazo cyo guhangana nabantu nka Mariya 
Noneho kurisha umukumbi muremure munsi yijuru
mu gihe runaka ariko ntishobore gukiza indwara
agomba gushyikiriza urwego rw ibanze icyemezo
Niba abana basa nisoni
Bobo yari akwiye kumenya neza kuruta kwizera Mariya 
Aroni yarambitse ibiganza ku mutwe wigitambo
Ndumva nkonje cyane 
ahasanga umugore wumupfakazi utoragura udukwi 
Ntiwibagirwe kureka imbwa 
ntizigera isaza imburagihe ngo igutamaze
kuva ku myaka yubuto bwabo Uko bakura ni ko
Genda unyegere cyane muri kimwe cya kabiri gifunguye
Iyi shati igura amadorari icumi 
Hagati ya pommel nini yaka
Jye na Tom turi hafi kurwego rumwe 
Nibagiwe kukubwira impamvu ndi hano 
Ntabwo ari umuforomo ahubwo ni umuganga 
Uyu muryango wanyakiriye neza 
Ntabwo nigeze ngira ikibazo cyo kumenya uwabikoze 
bwa politiki bwumupira wamaguru 
Sadako yashakaga kubyibagirwa 
ndakwinginze kandi ntumpakanire
Mariya ntakora cyane kurenza mushiki we
Tom na Mariya bombi bari mu rujijo
udashobora gutuza mu gihe cyose ukinyereka
Reka twicare hano ku byatsi 
Ntabwo byari bikenewe ko ubikora 
mwuka wera wabateye gukora  Bose batangiye kuvuga indimi zitandukanye 
Nkurikije umusaza nahuye ejo isake irashobora kuribwa kandi ntukarye ibibi byose 
Kandi ntukihutire kurakara
Urukundo Rwazimiye Nibisabwa cyane kandi ndabitanga
Kubyerekeye ishema ryinshi
Iyemere wenyine
ingaruka zo kudatanga amakuru ku byaha n iz imyitwarire mibi y Abayobozi
Mbabajwe nabari mu buhungiro basize inyuma
Star times yamamajwe kwisi hose
ibyokurya byiza bifitiye umubiri akamaro
Waryoshya urwenya pe nubwo bwije
baraje batubwira ko basanze ba bantu ntabahari
Tom yabwiye Mariya ko imbwa ye yapfuye
Gakwaya yabwiye Mariya ko ashonje 
ngo yice imigambi yawe myiza
Kwizera uzasubiza vuba
Tom na Mariya ni abanyamuziki babigize umwuga
Chris na Mariya basa nkaho bashaka gusomana 
Ntabwo azi igitutsi cye gikaze
Birasa nkaho basimbutse umujyi 
Abantu bose bazi ko atari amakosa yawe 
ubwite cyangwa umukorera uretse 
Iyo itaza kuba umuyaga nahageze vuba 
Ntabwo ibyo bigushimisha 
gusura masenge warutuyeyo
Tom ntiyagize ubutwari bwo kwanga gukora ibyo Mariya yamusabye gukora 
Nka sederi nziza yaguye imbere yumuyaga iryamye yishushanyijeho hagati yibiti bibumba
Icyo gihe ni bwo numvise mfite ubwoba rwose 
yibazaga ukuntu agiye kubwira 
kandi twashakishaga uburyo bwo kongera gushyira ibihimbano bikomeye imbere yabasomyi bacu bose
ahubwo mugire vuba badasanga tutararangiza
ku giciro gihwanye numuriro mwinshi

Inama y Abaminisitiri yateranye ku wa

nimboga bibasha kubaka umubiri kandi bikawurinda
Tom yatunguwe nka Mariya 
Kandi iyo igishushanyo gisa nawe
Umuntu wafashe imiterere kandi utababara
Ku mfuruka yamaso yawe meza arazunguruka
indyo ifite intungamubiri kandi bikaba
Ni uguta igihe cyo kwiga mugihe uryamye 
Yari yasinze kuri byeri
Yirunduriye mu mushyikirano nImana 
Nakinaga umukino numva umutingito 
Chris ahora ahugiye 
mu buryo buhanitse kandi bukabura umubiri 
noneho reka ntahe cyntisibyo 
Mbega ukuntu bari bahabanye kure
Mu gihe cyari cyegereje ukuza kwa mbere
Niba narashobora kugera iwanyu
Ibyo ntabwo bisubiza ikibazo 
kugira ngo umwizera wese abone guhabwa ubungingo
agashaka kumuha icyubahiro utari njye

kumenya no kujijuka

aba ingenzi kurusha amafunguro atatu

kubura ababo intimba bitera imbaraga

ahita ashaka gusohoka ndamubwira ngo nabe aretse

aramubaza atiese jack koko japhet

ibya Leta byo mu Rwanda cyangwa mu

twasize maze kubona agapapuro
Ibice byanjye byari bifite imbaraga zo gushimisha umubikira wera
mugashyira mu gifu ibyokurya bidatuma mugira amagara mazima 
Tom ari mu nzira yerekeza ku kibuga cyindege
izasoma abantu bose baremwe kimwe
kubigenza rero cyntia cyntia ati 
Iyo uza kuba uri inkweto zanjye wakora iki 
Ntiwibagirwe kubishyira kuri gahunda yawe 
kazitunga azaba hano mugarutse 
Turateganya imbeho ikonje cyane muri uyu mwaka

ikintu ndaranye nahise mbyuka

mujyi wa Cham mu Busuwisi

mwene Yuhi Mazimpaka akaba yari yaranamusimbuye

UMUTWE WA   AHO UMUNTU ATUYE
Ndashaka rwose kubimenya

nuko bwije mpora nibaza
Ibi byose ni hypothettike 
Tom yasunitse Mariya ku muryango
Yababaye abimenye
Nahitamo kujya gutembera kuruta kujya kureba iyo firime 
Ubuhinzi butwara amazi menshi 
yamaze kumfukura mbona nicaye ahantu heza cyane 
Iki gihe cyose wabaga hehe

yahise amfata akaboko kuko nari mfukamye

atinyizera rwose iyi nzu ni

ubuhinzi nubutaka Iyaba nibura abantu bamenyaga

Nyamuneka wange umuziki

obedia we yakomeje kumubwira

arya biba birwaye Inyama ziba zirwaye

usanga muka mugenzi we

UMUTWE WA V  IBIHANO
Iyo Ikigo cya Leta cyasabwe kuzuza ibisabwa
ubutaka bwacu bwoye kuducika bwigira muri nili
amajipo ye ya gypsy nongeye kwisubiraho
Yarebye televiziyo ngeze mu rugo 
Birahirwa ko ugomba kugira inshuti nziza nkiyi 
Bitabangamiye ibiteganywa mu gace ka  
Ahubwo uzarimbure rwose ayo mahanga  
Tom yatubajije ibibazo byinshi 
Ndashaka ko ubisesengura 
Aho niho nzasaba Kristo Umwami
genda ushyingure igufwa
Sinshobora kwizera ko Bobo yariye ibyo 
Ukwiriye kubihorwa 
Aka kazu kakozwe mu nsinga 
Bishobora kubaho kubantu bose 
mvuka mumuryango wabana batatu
Aho byavuye  Polisi y Igihugu  
ntabwo aba yaragiye imbere ya Ahabu 
Umugore ugeze mu kigero cyo hagati ufite igikomere ku mugongo wasaga nkaho ashaka aho yicara 
uwo murimo barawukorana umwete kandi ukomeje kujya mbere
Ndashaka ko ubimenya neza
Turimo kugerageza cyane muyandi magambo
Azahatira ububabare bwo gusinzira
Umugabo yashutse umukecuru amafaranga ye 
Ndashobora gupfa ejo 
Iki gitabo cyari kigenewe kuri njye 
yibyokurya bifitiye umubiri akamaro igomba 
n iz amatabaza yacyo  kandi amugerera n ifeza
Yerekana mumaso ye umuriro wumwuka wera
Ndakeka ko nzakomeza kubaho
Ntabwo rwose ndabyumva 
y impande zifite amakuru ahagije  zidafitanye  
Umucyo bari barahawe wari warahindutse umwijima 
amubwira amagambo agira atiuwo ukunda
Uzagaruka ryari mu Butaliyani 
vincent Niko steve ntuzi ko 
hatangwa uburyo bwo gutwarwa ku buntu 
Agera ahantu wayategekeye
Nta ntebe yo kwicaraho 
Amapfa ninzara byakomeje kuyogoza Isirayeli yose 
abagize uruhare bose mu isohoka ry iyo nyandiko
Mwisi Yera mugihe akiri serf yabami
Bifatwa nko kwanga kwisobanura
Niba ufite umutwe ugakoresha ubwenge bwawe
Sinzi neza uko ubikora 
Iyo hataba ubufatanye bwawe ntabwo nashoboraga kurangiza akazi mugihe 
Ikibindi bamenaguye kugeza igihe cyakubise hasi
Nakonje nuko nambara ikoti yanjye 
Ku mpera ziyi gari ya moshi nziza
Mariya asa naho ateye ubwoba kumyaka ye
Umubyeyi Teresa yakoresheje amafaranga yigihembo kubikorwa bye mubuhinde ndetse no kwisi yose 
Tom azi ko Mariya yibeshye
Yemwe isugi gatolika ni Mariya 
Nagize icyo kizamini mucyumba cyinama 
Tom yasezeranyije ko azadufasha ku wa mbere
zishimisha kandi zitera umuntu kuyoboka ibikurura 
Nihishe munsi yigitanda 
intebe ye y ubwami izakomezwa no gukiranuka  w
imikumbi n amashyo n amahema 
uragera murugo iri joro ubundi wareka

Imyaka mike iri imbere izahita iguruka
yatwo ni uguca intege ingingo zurwungano ngogozi zikahangirikira 
David ntiyigeze ashaka kubivugaho 
Umukozi muto wo mu biro byumwanditsi hamwe no gushira amanga
Fungura ubugingo bwacu fungura amaso namatwi
imbaraga zabo zigomba kubungwabungwa
Yari umuntu witonda ufite ubuzima bubi
Muryango ugendera ku mabwiriza yashizweho
biziturutseho mu bikorwa byerekeye imari  Ibigo
ntiwaruntunze nzivuza kandi nzakira
Iyi whisky irakomeye cyane 
Ntabwo nemera ko utekereza ko nsunika 
David ntabwo asa neza cyane 
Yahoze ari umugore wo mu rugo
Tom ahora anshinja ibintu
Kugira umutwe wamazi uva hejuru
Mbere yuko tumubona yari yatubonye
Uyu munsi nimwigomeka kuri
Mama Danaïde niwe afite gusa gusa
Ibyo ugomba gukora byose ni ugutegereza igisubizo cye
Ubwinshi bwurujijo rwibitekerezo nkimyanda ishaje
ati  hari umuntu ushaka kunyicana n ubwoko bwanjye  Ndakwinginze
Tom yasabye Mariya kumwigisha interuro zingirakamaro mu gifaransa 
Bateraniye kure cyane hejuru ya Himavant
Kandi mugutandukana nawe nonaha
Nibyo rwose nabwiye Mbaraga 
ikintu runaka  Inkuru ishushanyije akenshi nta bwo iba irimo amagambo  
izindi kuba nziza zubwoko bwose
arahamagara yumva irimo gucamo 
Biragoye niba nubwo bajugunywe ubuzima hamwe na Yankees
Uyu ni capitaine avuga 
Ntiwibagirwe kunyandikira
Ese koko bakoze imirimo yose bonyine 
Kugabana Oya Ariko uyitwike nkikirundo kimwe
kandi ko Imana izamubaza uko yakoresheje 
Nzi ko nzishima kazitunga ageze murugo 
bizanamushoboza kubaka ingeso zizamubera ingirakamaro nahazaza 
David ntabwo yigeze akora ibintu nkibi mbere 
UMUTWE WA III  IBYEREKEYE INZEGO
serivisi z ibikorwaremezo bari ku gipimo kingana na   muribo
nari nagiye gufata igikapu cyanjye
Wigeze ubona Mukara na Mukandoli hamwe
agahinda kenshi cyane
Nubwo nari nicaye ku zuba numvaga ntuje 
abakobwa babandi mubabeshya 
cyangwa ibigo bifite ubuzimagatozi zireba
Yavutse ku ya  Nyakanga 
Umusatsi wanjye urimo kuba muremure 
Nabwiye Tom gufasha Mariya ariko ntiyabikora
Gukura byari bigoye twarwanye igihe kirekire
Nibyo ishyari amaso yukuri adusiga
Uriteguye hafi 
Nifuzaga ko Bobo yakurikiza inama zanjye 
Ariko rero nzaba nsigaranye abantu ibihumbi birindwi mu Isirayeli 
yaragiye ageze mubiro bya Fabric ahita amuhobera
Ndatekereza ko dukwiye gutuma Mbaraga adukorera ibyo 
Ariko mbega ukuntu amaso yawe yimbitse
icyo babatwara  ariko Sawuli
bagiranye na Leta y u Rwanda  igihe
mbwira Samantha ngo reka muhamagare aze adufashe 
Ndashaka kunwa umwuka uhumeka
Nzakomeza rero uwo twashakanye nubwoko bwanjye
uriya niwe twifuzaga cyane
Ukoresha sponge mugihe woga 
Yemwe bakobwa b i Yerusalemu mwe  Ndirabura
Ese Bavuze ko yamwishe 
Tom ntabwo ateganya kugenda ariko Mariya we
Ntabwo bitangaje kuba yatorewe kuba umuyobozi 
Nabagabo bava amaraso mu ngoyi igihumbi
Ndemeranya nawe ko dukeneye abagore benshi muriyi sosiyete 
rwe  amazina n aho umukoresha ku rwego rwa
byamurenze nkumuntu watomboye za millioni
Tom yari yicaye ku giti
Amaso meza kandi yitegereza nijoro no ku manywa
Noheri iraza ariko rimwe mu mwaka 
Muri rusange abahungu bakunda abakobwa bafite imisatsi miremire 
Kurinda ibiza byari mu kirere
Twigishijwe ko Intambara ya Kabiri yIsi Yose yatangiye mu bihumbi bibiri 
Kuva igihe umunezero wacu umaze
ni wowe mbikesha ahubwo Imana ijye ukumpera ibyo ntashobora ku guha
Kugirango ubone ibitekerezo byawe wenyine
Bose uretse kazitunga bari bahari 
Ariko ubuturo bwumukiranutsi abuha umugisha
cy iminsi mirongo itatu   nyuma y uko
Sinigeze ngira umunezero 
Ntabwo twinjiye 
ko mbirimo david nawe ati hahahahah 
Nuko Yuda amaze kwakira inogo  muri ako kanya
Ntabwo wigeze umbwira ko udakunda Boston 
Ndasaba ko muba beza bihagije
aricyo nuburyo bwo kuvuka ubwa kabiri mumazi
Ndumva imbere muri njye ndira umuntu utazi cyane
Nkunda kazitunga ariko aratangaje 
Natekereje ko Bobo agiye kunyica 
nonese mama kellia na se baraho 
Tom yasomaga ikinyamakuru Mariya yinjiye 
Kandi yumishije iminwa yawe uryoshye no gusomana
Bobo ntabwo yemera ko abazimu babaho 
Cyangwa ibyo amaherezo kwibumbira ubusa kubugingo bwabo
Utanga ubumenyi ngiro no gusobanukirwa
Muganga wigirikibazo Linda Henry ndabizi aragukunda
Nabwirijwe kuguma mu buriri igihe gito 
Umuvurungano mu mutima we wagabanutse
Yasabwe kumwumvisha gushaka umuhungu we cyangwa undi muntu gushushanya inzu 
Ndibuka igihe nakubonye bwa mbere 
Iyi mitako ihenze
Ibi ntibizihanganirwa 
Nzi neza ko Tom azakora ibyo twasabye 
Yamusabye amafaranga yo kugura umwenda mushya 
Umutekano we wagombaga kwizezwa
Ndakeka ko utagomba kongera guhangayikishwa nibyo 
Imbaga yabantu yahagaritse inzira
angella ati yeeeh ngo cyntia
Ntabwo turi bonyine mu kwizera ko adahamwa nicyaha 
Birakenewe cyane kuko birihutirwa
Urashaka iki hamwe na kimwe muri ibyo bintu bishinja
bumva umuntu aravuze ati
kuri se kimuyobera ntakindi
uwo mutwaro mushya Kiba kitararangiza 
Ugomba kubona ibisuguti bigenda
Hano hari impeta nkikimenyetso cyurukundo
amasoko ikenda  andi yabaga mu nkengero z isunzu rya imirimo myinshi  Habanza iyi
Twishimiye kandi ibyo yagezeho
Yambwiye ko se yapfuye 
Kurambira ijisho igisenge kirangaye gisakaye
Kuramo ibuye iyo Noheritide
Yambajije uwo ndi we 
twimenyereje zidahinduka mu kwirinda 
Iyi ni ikaramu yasinyiye inyandiko 
Kuri uwo ni ho Umubiri wose uteranywa neza 
igihe baje mu bigo byacu
Mubihe byintwari bya kera
Bamwe mu batavuga kavukire batekereza ko bavuga ururimi neza kurusha abavuga kavukire 
Ntabwo nashoboraga kumuhindura nka mushiki wanjye
Tom yashinje Mariya ibibazo bye byose
umwuka wo guha ikuzo ubwenge bwa muntu 
Iyi niyo modoka ye ngira ngo 
Iyo turi munsi yamagambo
Ndatekereza ko utangaje rwose 
Chris numwe mubantu bafite impano nzi 
David rwose asa nkuwishimye 
Numvise amakuru cyane narumiwe 
Mukara yamanutse muri lobby guhura na Mukandoli
Filime yagenze neza cyane 
Imbaraga zawo zigera kandi mu bwonko
kurya inkoko itetse Naramubwiye nti 
Uyu mwana nta kindi yakoze usibye kurira 
Yatekereje ko ndushye cyane 
inshingano zabo hashingiwe ku
Barongera batera hejuru 
Mu ijoro ryakeye nari nasinze 
Nyamuneka ntuzibagirwe kumubona ejo
Ariko urahunze nkumwuka uhumeka
Ukwigomwa kurya nyakuri abantu bose
Gukoresha itabi nibisindisha bicogoza 
Nshobora kwandika inkuru nziza mugihe numva nkunda 
bimerera nabi byumwihariko abantu
Abo bantu batagira aho baba babaho mu ntoki 
Nzaguhamagara niba ngukeneye 
Nari nzi ko bidashoboka ko byoroshye 
Urugi rwari rukiriho kuko narufunze
Kubera ko bari bazi ko bahamwa nicyaha 
Niba abishoboye nzarya ingofero yanjye 
Ariko wowe mwana wanjye uzerera nkumuyaga
Twifuzaga ko umenya ko tubitayeho 
Ni ryari umuntu yatangiye gukoresha ibikoresho 
Nuko dutanguriye ahantu murugo rumwe rwari rwishimye cane
Iyo ntaza i Boston ibi ntibyari kubaho 
Tugomba kwibagirwa ko byigeze kubaho
zirimo ubwicanyi ibiyobyabwenge
Ugomba agaciro kose kugeragezwa hamwe nibyo
Bobo azi ko ibyo Mariya avuga byose ari ukuri 
ubaye utabishoboye ntacyo rwose
Umugore mwiza ni mwiza 
Ntabwo nshobora kugura ibyo kuko ntamafaranga ahagije 
Tom na Mariya barashaka gutaha
Natekereje gusa ku gitekerezo cyiza 
kellia ati ubwo se umuntu murahurira 
Ntabwo ari data ahubwo ni marume 
Buhoro buhoro uko umwaka wahitaga undi ugataha 
Sinshaka ko Bobo amenya ko namwitayeho cyane 
Mariya ntabwo asa na nyina
Urubavu nibyo rwose muri make
bwo kwishyura n isosiyete ibumbiyemo
Nari nkwiye guhamagara mbere 
ibicuruzwa cyangwa ibigemurwa bikorwa n umucuruzi
zibone amahirwe yo kuruhuka Ku bakora
Ni ryari uheruka koza imodoka 
Tom yabajije Mariya ibibazo byubupfu
Saba T Saba Tom kumpamagara akimara kugaruka 
Ntiwibagirwe ko ari umugore 
ko bifatwa   agaciro mu
Twaguhaye ibyo wasabye byose 
Hari hakonje cyane ariko ndasohoka

byahawe amabwiriza yo gutegura umurimo utunganye wo kwigisha abatambyi

mwamwishe ubwo rero hari ikintu nashakaga kubafasha

Ibintu byari bimeze gutya umuhanda
Nibyo nari niteze kumukobwa wanjye 
Kandi amashusho yubuzima Reba mu majyepfo
Aransubiza ati  ni igipimo
Abantu bintwari bumva ubwoba ariko ibyo ntibibabuza 
Ashaka ikintu gikonje kunywa 
Reka twizere ko tuzagerayo ku gihe 
i  ibigo by amashuri makuru

kugira umutima utari wo uratwereka akanya gato
Ariko umuntu ukeka icyo ashobora gukomeza
Nuburyo yahimbye imashini 
kandi ukunde abantu mubuzima bwacu
Kuri kaburimbo yunamye atikura amavi hasi

ngo ubategeke gukoresha indyo runaka
bari babakikije impande zose
ndetse umurimo yakoraga ashiritse ubwoba wari ugamije gukoma mu nkokora ubuhakanyi bwakwiraga byihuse muri Isirayeli

Nibyiza nkumunsi yaciwe

iyi flash mumaso yacu yaragaragaye

ifite ubuhagarike butari munsi ya metero eshanu

kandi nimigezi itangira gukama

Angel yahise ambwira ati Linda iyo uza kuba hano

mirimo  ashobora kudahabwa ibivugwa mu

bagakora imyitozo mizima kandi banezerewe 
kiri hagati ye na japhet

bari kumwe nabana babo batoya nabagore babo nabana babo bakuru 
Iyo ngenda mpitamo gutembera mu kirere

Ingingo ya   Imikorere y abarimu
ubwo ndangiza kurya no kunywa  maze hanyuma
ngaho rero tuguteze yombi
ushishikajwe no gusuzuma gusa
twamenyana umbabarire kuba nagutindije ukagera

nandi ameze nkayo ku giciro cyiza

ashobora kuba yaragejeje ikibazo cya Linda kuri police
kiruhura umuntu ajyamo cyangwa
Sinzi niba ngomba kugenda cyangwa ntagomba

borozi  muri bo hakaba harimo umuvandimwe

hamwe na Papa wicaye iruhande rwanjye kugirango ntuze amaboko yanjye
Yahoze ari umukinnyi wamamaye 
Yari umuntu mwiza  wuzuye 
Mubaze icyo ushaka cyose 
Sinashoboraga kwitabira inama 
Gishya kuri nyina amashami
Reka mfate kimwe muri ibyo 
Tom на натwe nib abishaka 
Ndashaka ko ujya kureba niba bikiriho 
Kuri Guenevere mu maso he harashya
Tom yasabye Mariya kuguma
Kuva mu muhogo muto wumuriro
Ikaramu mike yashizwemo no gukoresha igihe kirekire
ntiyorohewe nagato kelli kellia
kuva kumezi atandatu ku umwana agaburirwa
bikomeye kubyerekeye icyerekezo gukurikirana
Kandi inyenyeri yose itanyeganyega ninyenyeri izamuka
mitunganyirize y ubutegetsi  ibitero by abarabu
Ibintu byinshi bishingiye ku murimo udacogora wabumvira Imana bakayibera indahemuka 
Abakunzi ba mbere kwisi
Chris yahoraga arota 
Iyo hariho urukundo gusa ntuzigere urakara
Kubireba hejuru yibicu imirasire yoroheje
Nzi ko bisa nkibisazi ariko nabonye kazitunga na Mariya bakundana 
Yasabye amafaranga 
Umwanya muremure wumunsi nkurutoki rwerekana
madalina aje kumusura iwabo
hejuru yikirere kinini Igikona kiraguruka kigatontoma kuri
ninyama zamatungo yapfuye ntimukwiriye 
Ndabaza niba ushobora kubikemura 
kazitunga ntiyigera yitokazitungaba nubwo ibintu bigoye 
Iyi modoka ikorerwa mu Buyapani 
mubyiza ubu ndi numage ndi murugamba
mushinga Ubu izo karita ziri gukoreshwa  
Igihe gahoro gahoro ikubita ubuziraherezo
Ushonje nyamara uyumunsi nubwo inzozi
Kuberako nashoboraga kureka ikavukira aho
Ntibisanzwe ko kazitunga aryama mbere ya saa cyenda 
n abana bose bemewe n amategeko uwapfuye
batanu  kugira ngo abahe ubuhamya bunonosoye  bityo na
muntebe zari aho nkuko ibyumba
Genda hafi nigicucu impumyi nucumbagira
usanga byiganjemo cyane amata amagi nisukari 
Kurya inyama bica intege ubushobozi bwumubiri
Buri gihe aririmba mugihe arimo kwiyuhagira 
David ntabwo yemera ko Jane yishimye 
Linda yamaze atazi iyo ari gusa kuri iyincuro 
Chris hafi buri gihe ajya kukazi nimodoka 
Iyi mbeho birashoboka ko hazaba hakonje cyane 
ubutasi bwa Irani bwagerageje kumushaka
Nkuko undi yabivuze guhunga bigufi
Ububiko bwose bwo mwijuru buragaragara
Ndamwenyura ndunama kandi isi irasakuza
David na Jane ntibigeze babana 
Uwo musozi utwikiriwe na shelegi umwaka wose 
ibindi biribwa umuntu ashobora kuvanga nibinyamavuta
kumubwira neza impamvu 
Nkumugore ishyano iraguhindura
Iyindi si ikirere gifite impumuro yacyo
ndi Nkubito idasubiza imihigo ya rugamba 
uruhare rwabyo mu gukumira Jenoside n ingengabitekerezo yayo 
kuko buri wese muri mwe akeneye impuhwe zayo 
Ese ibyatsi nubusitani byatuye ko shelegi
Nanjye ubwanjye mbeshya gutya
amureba cyane atamukuraho ijisho 
Ibyatsi bya zahabu ibirenge bye byagenze byishimo
Kuba intumwa zishorewe nImana zarahamije ko Uwiteka Yehova 
Yafashe ikintu kidasanzwe cyo gutukana
Inshuro eshatu zisubira inyuma kubera ubwoba
Umuyaga woroshye hamwe na flake yamanutse
Ntabwo nasezeranye 
Kwibuka ibyuma biri mu mpande ze
imirabyo irarabya ndetse hakurikiraho numuriro ukongora 
Gishyushye hamwe no kwakirwa kure na roho zakira abashyitsi
Ndagerageza kurambura no guhuzagurika
Abana bagomba kwigishwa igihe nuburyo bwo kurya 
agenga ubuzima maze bageza aho bakabya
Njyewe nicaye hafi ya Thebes munsi yurukuta
Ndatekereza ko wahimbye iyo nkuru kubyerekeye impanuka 
Wibuke kohereza iyi baruwa 
Nta wundi ufite uretse wowe wenyine 
ijambo  mu gihe cyo gukemura impaka bose
kazitunga ntabwo agomba kunywa itabi kukazi ariko aranywa 
Ubusanzwe nkomeza kwandika buri munsi iyo ngenda 
Amafumberi ntayanene
Utekereza ko wumva imperuka yisi
Nibyiza byibura Trix ntabwo arambiwe nka Mukandoli
umwijima hejuru yawe  igihugu cyawe ngikwizemo
David ntashobora kurenga izamu 
Tom yagiye ku wa mbere
Natekereje ku kibazo
Yakundaga kwicara amasaha ntacyo akora 
Mukore musenge kandi mubayobore 
Umuserebanya witwa Ed aryamye mu buriri bwe
Waba uzi abo bantu bose
Ntabwo nahamagaye niba atari ngombwa 
rw imigabane ishingiye ku ngwate y umutungo
burasirazuba  no mu Gihugu
Subiza ibi bibazo ku gakuru unoza umukono wawe
Bamwe bavuga ko Ubushinwa bwari bumeze nkabakoloni bAbarusiya
Mukara ntabwo yari azi ko Mukandoli yari amaze gushaka
Trix yunamye iruhande rwa Mukandoli inyuma yimodoka
Nta gushidikanya ko azadufasha 
Yamubajije aho atuye ariko yari umunyabwenge cyane ku buryo atabimubwira 
Umusatsi wa Mariya uhuha mu muyaga
Nafashe imbeho kandi nari mu buriri ejo 
Hafi ya bose nzi bashaka kujya mu gitaramo cyejo 
Ntabwo yari yarigeze yumva ububobere bwe kenshi
Mbaraga yavuze ko wifuza kujyana natwe 
Ntabwo nshobora kubihindura kugirango nsubizwe
Icyerekezo gihamye cyo kwibuka
bigaragaza ko uri muntu ki 
Gukurikiza byimazeyo ibisanzwe
n imikorere y Ubutegetsi bw Ubucamanza 
ari kudagadwa yabuze amahoro anyicira akajisho 
bakamenya uko ibintu bimeze
n uko yacitseho gato  Nawe kuba
Icyakora  Yehova yakomeje kubana na Yozefu kandi
ndimo ndarota kurya ubugari ninyama
Kureka gutekereza kugirango umuntu apfe
Ubutumwa bwabo bugomba kuba ubu ngo Uku ni ko Uwiteka avuga 
kugira ngo bongere gusubizwamo ubuzima
Uwo mugabo azi kugera ku ruhande rwiza rwa perezida 
Witondere Jabberwock mwana wanjye
Urusengero rwe rwo gusenga ibigirwamana
Kubasunika cyangwa kubinyeganyeza kugeza ku birenge
birashobora kuba amakosa reba hirya
Ndasaba abantu bose kwirinda 
ubukwe bwa Fabiora na Fabric
David yavuze ko yashakaga gushimisha Jane 
wowe ujye umpa impano
Mariya na Jane barataka
Washakaga kuvuga ko uri umuganga 
Igitaramo cyari kigufi ariko byari byiza rwose 
yarangiye Henry ageze kwa Linda asanga abantu hafi ya bose
Chris ntabwo yumvaga rwose koga 
Reka kwatura rero bikomeze guhagarikwa
NSANZUWERA MUKAMUHIRWA Immacul e  
Kuki wari muri ako gace haba indaya 
Azasubira murugo ku cyumweru gitaha ni ukuvuga icya cumi 
Reba uriya mutware ku ifarashi 
kuko ibyaha bibabaje cyane byatandukanyije abantu nImana 
Yibwira ko indege zifite umutekano kuruta imodoka 
Hagati yishyamba nikiyaga cyakonje
bishobora kuboneka bitarimo inyama 
Ndi urega muri urwo rubanza 
Hejuru ku nzu nta mugore
Ingingo ya   Uburyozwe bwa nyirinzu
Mu gihe cyitumba nkunda kuguma mu rugo hafi yumuriro no kumva umuyaga uhuha 
Nizere ko uzi ko ntacyo bitwaye rwose 
kuri icyo gicaniro bityo batere abantu kwizera 
Namusabye ko yicara 
Sinigeze mbona firigo itukura 
Ni he nshobora guhisha ko ntamuntu numwe watekereza kumbona 
Nari guhunga ibyokurya byiza
Ntabwo bitangaje kuba yaratsinzwe ikizamini 
Umukara umanuka uva mumaso ujya kumutima
Gusaba inzozi zo gutekereza bidasobanutse
Ntawe uzi umubare Chris yishe 
ubwose umubujije nyuma ukazamubwira
Umugabo utarigeze ajya mwishuri ashobora kwiba mumodoka itwara imizigo ariko niba afite amashuri makuru ashobora kwiba gari ya moshi yose 
akazi ke ndetse ashishikaye kubera ko ntakibazo
Wowe uwo ikiganza cyiza cyane kiyobya
Ninjye ndavuga kuri Isi yose
Twas igihangange Oak gifite amaguru meza
Kwibuka abakurambere birashobora guhurira hamwe
kurya inyama zikabura umubiri akazisimbuza
rw ikiragi ruzaririmba kuko amazi azadudubiriza
Ntuzigere uhinduranya amafarashi mugihe wambutse umugezi 
Umusatsi wanjye wahagaze kumutwe 
Ni ubuhe bwoko bwa Tom akunda 
Nyamuneka shyira ibirayi byibirayi mu gikombe Ntukarye mu mufuka 
Ni ryari ushyira umuhungu wawe kuryama 
Imiryango yAbisirayeli yari yarahakanye Imana yagombaga kwerekwa 
Ingingo ya   Abakozi bo mu bikorwa
maze nkiyemeza gukoresha imiti Imana yaduhaye
yaba umwana muto cyangwa umuntu mukuru 
Inyunganirangingo  Ibyuma cyangwa ibindi bikoresho bifasha umuntu
Gusohokana na David biragushimisha 
kandi uracyiteguye gukora byinshi igihe cyose umuntu akeneye ubufasha bwawe
Chris yahamagaye umuhanga 
Chris rwose yari akwiye kuba yarangije kubikora kugeza ubu 
Ni ibihe binyobwa bikonje ufite 
mu guhinga ubwo butaka Abantu bose 
Arataka ati Fata uri iki hano
Turashobora kuganira munzira
Mbega uburyo amategeko yImana asuzugurwa 
Umuyobozi yatekereje kwirukana kazitunga ariko ahitamo kubirwanya 
ku byokurya bigizwe ninyama bikize ku mavuta
Mukara yasaga naho anyuzwe nigisubizo cya Mukandoli
Tom agomba gusaba gusubizwa 
John Jairo n umukobwa we 
ni byo byokurya birushijeho kuba byiza
Periwinkle yakurikiranye indabyo zayo
Tom ntazi niba Mariya yishimye cyangwa atishimye 
Nzi ko David ashaka gushimisha Jane 
Icyifuzo cyumvikana nicyo Leech yatanzwe ifatanije nigitekerezo cya Emmet 
Njye umva ntawe namenya kandi sinayafata 
Indyo ikwiriye kunyuranywa Guhorera indyo imwe 
Ariko napfuye imbere yamaso yawe kure yimbere yawe
uko Henry ameze akaba yahita agirubwoba
Trix yabonye umusore runaka atazi kuvugana na Mukandoli
Umusaza hafi kugonga imodoka 
amategeko asaba kugira ngo barinde icyo bita kwera kwumunsi wa mbere 
Ntabwo wigeze umbwira ko unkunda 
Hoba hariho ijambo ku miterere ya Tom
mu gihugu cyawe nigendera 
Ntabwo Ahabu yari kwanga kumvira irarika rya Eliya 
umuryango w Abahamya ba Yehova  
ku buryo bwarusha ndetse nibyo mu rugo 
Kunda aba bana bakomeye bamanitse kumyambarire yawe
Hari undi muntu wabonye ibi 
Nzi neza ko Bobo azatsinda ikizamini cyuyu munsi 
Nibagiwe gukora umukoro wanjye
Rwose byumvikana neza cyane
n imyenda bya yashyizweho n Itegeko n 
Biranshimishije gusubiza ikibazo cyawe
none ubwo ubundi mwamfungura nkajya kumara iki mu bizima bwo hanze
Nkunda umuziki Ukunda umuziki 
Ya Mana yahaye ubwenge abana bayo
Nubwo imyaka yashize ari myinshi
Imbwa zishongora cyane mubisanzwe ntabwo ari akaga 
Ese ibyo yatekerezaga  ntabwo ari njye ahubwo ni ishoka yanjye
Baguma munsi y ishuri
Aka kazi kuntera umusazi 
Ndibuka ababyeyi banjye bambwiye ibyo 
Guhitamo Imigati Imaze Igihe
Impumuro yibanga muri kaseti zifunze
Bob kuri cheri yacu
Abantu bose rero baragenda
Ubgo bugingo bgarumucyo wabantu
Yashyize igitabo ku isanduku saeb
Turashobora kujyana 
Ni ikibazo cyo kutwicuza cyane
Yashakaga gukora neza Agomba gutekereza
Natekereje ko uzanyica 
Umwe yazungurutse undi arambika ikintu
koko obedia ati yiweeeeh 
Trix na Mukandoli bakoraga mu birombe byamakara bakiri bato
Ako kanya doliane yarahagurutse arikubura adusiga
abantu bari bamenyereye ibyokurya byinshi
Ingufu nyinshi zifunze muri nucleus 
ingingo y uko bigomba kwemezwa n Inama
Yatekereje ati Hahn hahn ntukeneye cyane kumanura
Trix na Mukandoli barashaka kumenya gahunda yacu
Yafashe induru ya goblins
Ntiwumvise nukwo andatwa
Amurambika mu maso hagati yamaboko ye
Ntabwo mfite amafaranga menshi yo gukoresha 
serivisi zayo mu Rwanda muri Mutarama 
Urusaku twumva iyo tunyuze
Ageze kuri gari ya moshi gari ya moshi yari imaze kugenda hafi igice cyisaha mbere 
Twishimiye kukubona 
Noneho shyira ubwiza bwe
nibyo rwose gusa muhumure 
Bobo yarangije gushushanya ishusho ya Mariya amaze amezi abiri akora 
David arashaka cyane gushimisha Jane 
ubutaka n ibihakenewe  kimwe n ingingo
Urusaku rwo gusenga ibigirwamana
cyangwa gukoresha ku buryo
Sinigeze ngira isoni cyane 
Nibyo koko Bobo ashaka gusiga irangi inzu ye icyatsi 
irenze iyerekwa yewe uwo uri we
mu gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina 
Urwo ruhushya rugaragaza ubuso agomba gukora
Yumva umurimo wubuhanzi udahinduka
yitegereza se mumaso cyane mbese
n izindi nzego bireba 
Neza inkota rero oya ntabwo iyo we
Kurandura umwenda wa cyami
Gukina kurubu gusebanya
mumodoka nsezera kubandi bana 
Kuri tho duhereye kuri bourne yacu yigihe nahantu
Mukandoli buri gihe agomba gushyiramo amafaranga abiri afite agaciro
Turemeranya kuriyi ngingo
Ni ngombwa guteganya uburyo bwo kwibikira
Nuko umunsi umwe ku isabato  anyura mu mirima
Kugenda kwamabere yanjye
Roma yabaye imbaraga zikomeye ziyobowe na Julius Sezari 
angella nawe arasohoka ahagarara
bazabona ingaruka igihe umuntu 
Ninde ushaka gusiga abantu bose mumwanya we
ari ryo ribahesha ibyiringiro byo kuzahanwa
Ntuzongere gutanga ibimenyetso bye kuri roho yatatanye kure
Tugomba kwigira kubatubanjirije 
iba igiye kugutabara hahandi wumva ko wowe 
Ndangije ibyo nkora nzaza 
Kuki tutavugurura gusa disiki ikomeye Wagiye ugira ibibazo byinshi hamwe nayo 
ushyitse urangwa no kugira ubuzima bwo kwirinda 
Tom yashyize amakarita ye yose kumeza
Yasize akazi ke ahembwa nabi kubera urwuri rwatsi ahandi 
David arishima iyo ari kumwe na Jane 
Umuhinzi wabaga hafi yaje gukora iperereza 
Kandi uririmbire abana banjye
Ni mugufi ariko arakomeye 
Gusura ahashyinguwe abacitse ku icumu
Nzahora nkwibuka 
Ntabwo rwose mbyitayeho 
amabanki hagamijwe gukumira ibishobora guteza ibibazo
Iyi ni yo mpamvu yatumye nkureka 
Hafi yamashami yuzuye inzuki hejuru
Kuraho ububabare bwanjye Ndagusabye
Rusendereza amasahani ukabikunda
Nakundaga kuba muto nkiri muto 
Impamvu yabyo irasobanutse 
Ibuka mu gatsiko k idini ry Abasadukayo
Ibintu byose byasuzumwe ngira ngo twavuga ko inama yagenze neza kandi yujuje intego zayo 
Bizaba nkumuziki uzamuka
Yunukaga indimu Yapfuye 
Ntekereza ko bishoboka ko ashobora kuza 
nibyokurya barya uko byaba bimeze kose 
David ntabwo yigeze ababaza umuntu 
Kuberako kuva Janiculum yazimiye
Yayobowe no gutekereza kurota
nkisenda nibindi byo bibanza guteza
Nshuti ntugomba gutinda cyane
bagaragaje ari benshi ko ibibazo byo mu miryango
ari umwuka urangwa nubusabane uko bishoboka kose
ariko na none nkumva ko naba ngiye kwitera stress maze nkajya nkora
Ibyatsi byapfuye mumaso yabo
ndi nyamuca mu gakangaga abakobwa bakagacira icyo
nyizera nze nkurebe
Sinari nzi neza icyo gukora 
Nta bise canvas yigeze yumva yabyaye neza
Kuki Tom afite ubwoba bwo kuvugana na Mariya
Mukara yahisemo Mukandoli ifunguro ko imvura itagwa muri iki cyumweru ismaximum
rusange ku rwego rw Igihugu 
Sinzi niba unyizera cyangwa utanyizeye 
isoko ryo kubaka inzu   
Babasha gukoresha igihe cyabo cyingenzi bigisha
Urashobora kugera kubiri hejuru yikibanza
kugirango bigufashe kwitegura gutwara impanga
zitagira ingano bari mu kazi kugira ngo babone
abakozi ba Leta no gukumira impanuka 
Tom yeretse Mariya amafoto amwe
Ntugatongane numuntu mupfuye ubusa
Ariko gusomana ntibyemewe
Ntiwibagirwe gufunga umuryango
Yahoraga anenga abandi bantu 
Ni byiza ko abarezi bacu badutoza kubaha ababyeyi
Kurya wirukanka ibyokurya byamoko atandukanye 
Tom yambajije nimero ya Mariya 
sosiyete yacu irashaka kugira uruhare muri uwo mushinga wubushakashatsi 
icyo mbona nuko ubabaye kubera njye ukaba
UMUGARAGU WANJYE NI NDE 
bacu bakita ku ngingo yo kwirinda tuzaba 
izo nyito z amoko 
Niba unywa ntutware Niba utwaye imodoka ntunywe 
Fideli Kataba yatwaraga Umubari
zikwiriye kugira ngo abo bantu bategurirwe
Abagabo buzuye imiryango baraturika bafata amashyiga
Hanyuma batsinda imidugudu ihereranye ni Gerari yose kuko Uwiteka yateye abaho ubwoba 
bakorera Yehova Imana mu budahemuka 
David yavuze atuje 
Igipupe ntikizi ko kigenzurwa marshmallowcat
Ndacyamurinda kurimbuka burundu
Ngiye kubyita umunsi 
Alice yibagiwe kuzimya itanura
kandi agatwika imyenda yajyanaga mu materaniro  
ngo tubakuremo imibereho mibi bimenyereje
Ikigo gifite ikizere cyinshi mubushobozi bwawe
Nibihe bintu byamavuta kumashati yawe 
Reka mbyumve neza 
Si umwanzi wantutse erega
Kunywa amazi cyane bifasha umubiri
Icyo gitabo kimenyerewe kubana bose bato 
Yatashye nyuma yamasaha atatu 
Umuhungu nabonye ashakisha mu myanda ashobora kuvuga ko hashize iminsi ine ntacyo yariye 
Wikunde nkuko umuntu yumva umugozi ukunda amajwi
kazitunga yabajije Mariya igihe aheruka kubona Yohana 
Njya kuryama nka saa kumi zijoro 
Sinzigera nkunanira 
nirirwanye ubwigunge budasanzwe kuburyo nahise mbona 
turi ku gipimo kirenga   Iyi mibare iragaragaza ko
Aseka namarira  menshi kubera ibyishimo
Yakekaga ko bari kumenya icyo agomba kwihanganira
Amaherezo nabonye umugore nshaka kurongora 
Wita ku muziki wa kera 
Ubutumwa buvuga ibyigihano cyari kigiye kubaho bwageze mu matwi yumwami winkozi yibibi Ahabu bumeze nkinkuba zivanze nimirabyo 
Hafi yimyaka icumi ishize ku ya  Gicurasi  umusozi mutagatifu Helens wadutse 
Nzwi nka mugenzi wanjye munini cyane
Tom yakoze kuri Mariya ku rutugu
ariko hamwe namaso yeza cyane kurenza ayanjye
ko abo bantu mubakundisha kandi mukabagezaho 
Intugu mugihe umutwaro wumuhigi we
Ibicurane byacu byose bifitanye isano no gusinzira kumutima
byerekeye ubuyobo n imiyoborere myiza  mu
Ndibuka igihe kimwe ahantu 
Ni ryari uheruka guca imisumari 
Umususu ukora umusatsi we wicyatsi
Tom yari yicaye ku giti 
Wazanywe no kwibukiriza icyaha cyanjye 
Ntabwo wari kubireba nkikibazo gusa
Naoko aba muri iyo nzu yera 
Ni ryari Mariya yaguze iyi skirt 
Trix yavuze ko adashaka gutemberana na Mukandoli
kazitunga yagiye kuryama ariko ntiyasinzira 
gasutamo n Ikigo gishinzwe abinjira n abasohoka 
Nashakaga ko David yishima 
Tugarutse kuri Samantha yamaze gutwara ya mafaranga
Tolumniyo numukandara wa zahabu
Turi twenyine
Niyo mpamvu natinze amasomo ejo 
Urutare ruri hafi guhagarikwa 
Twakomeje kuganira ibyishimo ari byose kumpande zose 
Amurika iminsi yanjye kumwenyura no guseka
Ntekereza ko igihe kigeze ngo musabe ubufasha 
Impaka za zareberwa muri ibi ariko abantu 
cyangwa ngo umunyereke murebe 
ariyo umwuka mwiza namazi meza
Ngeze mu rugo nsanga nataye igikapu cyanjye 
Kandi abagwaneza na bo bazagwiza umunezero
Nasabye Tom kumarana weekend 
Ufite zahabu nyinshi ku mutwe wawe
Bikurikiranye na wikendi kuri Metropole
Mu byukuri ntabwo mfite amafaranga ahagije 
Kugaragaza cyane imirasire yiteka
isa nkaho ari ya modoka yacu ba mama
Ifunguro rizaba ryiteguye nuhagera 
ibibazo byose birimo byarakemutse
Ntabwo rwose ufite ibyiringiro 
byose  Akomeza umurava iteka ryose 
Iyo icyakuwe mubwimbitse butagira umupaka
Jane yahoraga yitwaza ko yari umukire cyane 
Ndashaka gufata umwenda mu ntoki
Bamwe mubanditsi na bahimbyi bemejwe harimo
Chris yatekereje ko Mariya yari umugenzi 
Tinya roho aho ibyawe byakwiga kwitaho
Ibyo ntibizabaho indi myaka itatu cyangwa irenga 
kazitunga yerekanye mugihe tutari tubyiteze 
Inshuro nyinshi imyaka makumyabiri
Uburusiya buhura nibibazo bikomeye byamafaranga

Ntabwo nshobora kubisobanura 
Ngwino nabwira abakundwa banjye
yabo ibe igendanye namabwiriza yubuzima bwiza 
batetse umuceri nibishyimbo
kugira amagara mazima
Ntabwo rwose uzagura ibyo nibyo 
atambire uwo muntu icyo gitambo gitambirwa ibyaha
Isi yaba imeze ite idafite abagore
Ntabwo nkwiye kubyumva nagato
basi niyo we yampemukira
umuti umwe gusa ari wo guhindukira bakava mu byaha byabo 
ivunjisha icyateza ingorane ku nguzanyo 
Yiyemeje ko abahungu bombi batunzwe neza 
kandi zigashyirwa aho Imana namategeko yayo byagombye kuba 
Abanyabwenge bo mu burasirazuba
Iyi ni ikarita yanjye yubucuruzi 
irahagije kugira ngo izanire ikigo igisebo 
Ndashaka ko usubira inyuma muri icyo cyumba 
Ikiremwa kizunguruka
Nashakaga kubaza Tom igihe yamaze mu Buhinde 
Tom yamenye ko Mariya atumva
Wigeze wumva urukundo nka apotheose
Icyo Kigo cyahawe Umuyobozi
Ibyo ari byo byose ibyamubayeho byari ubugome
bw imari igomba gushyikirizwa Minisitiri
Emera muri Mata yurukundo umwana wishimye
Nibishobora kubabazwa cyane nibyishimo
Tom na Mariya bakunze gutongana kubyerekeye amafaranga
Nkeneye kubaza Tom icyo gukora kuri iki kibazo 
Aho Imana yukuri isa naho isinziriye
Ariko kora amafaranga yo gushidikanya kwabo
Umuhanuzi yarasubije ati Naho wampa igice cya kabiri cyibintu byo mu nzu yawe 
cyagihe wampamagaye twari tumaze
Wibagiwe gufunga umuryango 
Umva ku munsi wa yore
Sinzi igihe nzagarukira 
ubwo bahise binjira kwa cyntia 
Tom yavuze ko azavugana na Mukandoli ku bigomba gukorwa
na bo  umutware w Abamanase abe Gamaliyeli
Numvise ko Gakwaya yatsindiye inzuki 
Ikigaragara ni uko badafite amafaranga ahagije 
kazitunga yabaye anorexic igihe yari mu mashuri yisumbuye 
Birenzeho uracyamurika
Niwowe muntu wenyine nzi usibye njye ushishikajwe nukuri kubintu nkibi 
Bamuha ikaze ngo kare bambe
nuko arangije asinyaho yewe anateraho kashi
Utemera igiti cye ngo ankurikire
Abantu bose bazi ko Jessie afite ikintu kuri wewe 
Birashoboka ko twashoboraga gukurikiranwa 
Uwo mugabo ninde uri inyuma yishusho 
Abiyatari k umutambyi  na Yowabu l mwene Seruya  
uwahawe uruhushya akorera  ku rubuga rwa
kuko bitera umururumba wo kurya ibirenze urugero 
Hari naho watabaye abanyabyaha 
Ni ryari uheruka gukanda amaguru 
Wizera rwose ko Mbaraga yizewe 
banoza umugambi wuko bagiye gufatanya bakica
Gutegera amatwi burigihe ariko ntibifata
Ndayifite mu mwaka wose
Ntabwo ari ibanga ko Mbaraga adakunda Mariya 
Ndashaka kwicarana numuryango wanjye 
Mbaraga akemura ibibazo nkibi buri munsi 
Menya neza ko uhagera saa moya 
kandi mukangure amatorero asinziriye 
Byaba byiza dukore ibyo basabye 
Nabajije inshuti yanjye inama

Wikunde nkuko muri we ubwoya bukunda urupapuro
wa Ositaraliya asezeranya kugera Kylie
Ndashidikanya ko Trix azi numero ya terefone ya Mukandoli

banezerewe kubwiborori bari bagejejweho na
kuri icyo kintu Nubwo bagomba kugaragariza
yarababwiraga ati Ntimukongere gukora icyaha

Nahoraga nkunda ibya kera 
Ntabwo twigera tubikoresha 
Kandi byose byansezeranije Mariya

Tom hafi buri gihe asinzira nijoro ahobera idubu 
bivuye ku nkunga yimpamvu twizera ko ari ubutabera 
ko mu buryo bw idini  ni ukutandura kw inyigisho
Kandi urabagirana gusa mu gicucu kandi guhera kumanywa uhinduka ibara
Niba ukora ibyo uzasa nubuswa 
acide yo ndabizi ntibazayibura

kwidagadura Entertainment guhanahana amakuru n ibindi

inyuma uyohereje agira ati

Nzakugura muri wewe niba aricyo ushaka

agakoresha ubushobozi bwe bwose 
Igihe cyitumba kirashize kandi mbaho ntarimo
babasha kugira ubutwari no kwiyanga

igitanda cyumwana wacyo  gishobora kuba igi
Njye sha umbabarire pe nanjye sinzi ibyo ndimo muriyi minsi

bwenda gucika bw inyamaswa n ibimera mu

n Umushinjacyaha Mukuru wungirije cyangwa

Ingingo ya   Gutandukanya abafungwa

nuko Hari nimugoroba ubwo murugo Bari bantumye

uburyo azaganiriza umukunzi akamwumvisha ko
ubundi aravuga atireka mpamagare kuri hotel

by ubucuruzi biri ahantu hakwiye

n amatungo bikorwa ahanini n inzererezi

ko bidashobora kugira icyo bibatwara

Kubona mushiki we yumvise gutaka wenyine
Tom yicaye ku meza ye 
Reba ibisobanuro ahagana hasi ku rupapuro rwa  Nero
Nimutyo twese igihe turi ku meza

ndamubwira nti Henry tuza umutima nanjye ndagukunda

Ndota Marika hafi buri munsi

Yatakambiye avuga ko ari njye nyirabayazana 
IZINA RY UMURYANGO  INTEBE YAWO  IGIHE
bagateza imbere amagara yabo aho kuyangiza 
tukabona ntibaza ibyo byatangiye
agiheshejwe nijambo ryImana
Umunsi wose yamaze mu mpinga ya Karumeli 
kellia ati eheeee ubwo se
Umwuka wawe no gutanga utume ubaza
Buri gihe aririmba muri douche 
Nzi neza ko Tom azinjira muri kaminuza yihitiyemo

yirukanwe mu gihe abakozi  babuze akazi muri

Yamugiriye inama yo kujya kuri sitasiyo ya polisi ariko aratinya 
Nizeraga ibyo Bobo yambwiye

agasore kaje kumutwara kaje nimodoka binjiramo
Nuko aramufata aramusoma

william ati ese ubundi wowe 
Rero muminsi iri imbere izina ryawe
Bazunguye amabendera kugirango bakire umwamikazi 
Aramuhamagara buri joro 
Umurenge isuzuma gusa ingingo urega
Nujuje izina ryanjye kurupapuro
Ntabwo nkunda abagore badafite imico
bagomba guhabwa na ba nyina zikwiriye 
Nyamara abenshi mu bakoze ibi
kumurinda impamvu iyo ari yo yose yatuma against any gender based violence

Inyanya mwanyoherereje zari nziza kandi

AMATEKA yigitabo cya Yosuwa

UZAMARA N INTEGO ZAWO
Mbere umuntu akiremwa 
kazitunga yavuye mu buriri saa kumi nebyiri nigice yinjira mu gikoni ashyira ibice bibiri byumugati muri toasteri 
Ntidushobora kureka Chris ngo ahunge no kwica abo bantu bane 
Rick ashaka Linda byanze bikunze gusa Henry amubwira 
Ariko iyo ndebye imbere yumuhanda wera
Ni iki cyabaye hanze aha 
Iyo twemereye irari ribi rigakura
birinda ibigamije kubangiriza ubuzima 
rw imyitwarire igenga Abunzi mu kazi
Kandi izatwikwa niramuka yumye
Wowe Itorero rifite amaboko yera
Tom yari yicaye ku ntambwe
Kandi mu binyejana byashize
Nyamara Yerobowamu yananiwe kwiringira Imana 
Ukuri kwose kwakera mumaso ye
Fabric atireka da ubwose byashoboka koko
Hariho imbavu yabuze ngaho
kabsa mwana wanjye dore
Abashakanye mbere bakomeza kubana

anenga n imigereka yaryo iyo ihari 
cy iyandikwa ry inyubako iherekezwa na kopi
Ninde wibagiwe yewe ubusazi bukaze

ko zirabashoboza gucisha bugufi

nyarwanda utari uwa Leta uhabwe ubuzimagatozi nk uko biteganywa n ingingo
Nyamuneka umbwire uko uteganya kubikora 
Umutima wumuntu burigihe kimwe
Nakorewe kujyayo 
Yagendaga yihuta cyane ku buryo atashoboraga kumukomeza 
Hari umuti wizewe ku bacitse integer kandi babuze ibyiringiro 
Mu burere bwumwana we umubyeyi 
Yonsa kugeza iminwa ye irwaye
maze ku bwibyo ubugingo bwe nubwumwana we burarindwa 
Ninde wamuhaye imfashanyo
hakurikijwe ibyemezo bya Kongere
bigaragara ku gishushanyo gikurikira 
Ntabwo ushimisha kwicuza igihe kirekire

bakoreye ibyo bitangaza byose

amuseka cyane aravuga atiariko 
Nukuvuga kuri we uwo ntekereza
Ntabwo nigera nsiga David wenyine 
Kuki udaha intebe yawe uriya musaza 
Kunda urukundo rukina izuba ryibishushanyo
Inshuro ebyiri zera zose
Ibitebo byuzuye imigati byuzuye
undi ntiyafashe umwanzuro yarahatiwe

Nta gushidikanya ko ururimi rwicyongereza arirwo rworoshye kandi icyarimwe uburyo bwiza bwo gutumanaho mpuzamahanga 
Uwo munsi wari ku cyumweru ku buryo nta shuri ryariho 
Igihe cyo kuryama ariko igitangaje kirashira 
amavuta ahita abwira innocent ati mukanya ndaza
Uyu muziki urababaza abantu bose 
Fata iyi shusho yose kubuyobozi bwawe
Mfite amarira ndira buri munsi
Byari amahirwe akomeye gukorana nawe 
kubarimbura no kubatsemba kandi muzajahurwa
Iyo wishingikirije kumurwi cyane birashobora kugabanya ubushake bwawe bwo guhatanira 
Nabonye ko injangwe zishobora kubona mu mwijima 
Mwebwe mwari kumwe nanjye mu mato i Mylae
ndetse ndebye kuruhande mbona
wo mu rwego ruciriritse yifashisha
bikozwe n umwe mu bashyingiranywe 
kazitunga yari hafi kwicara mugihe siren yumvikanye 
Umubano hagati ntubyitayeho
igihe habaye ukwangirika kwimyanya yurwungano ngogozi 
Itegereze maze uvuge icyo ubona 
Arashaka guhura nuwo mukobwa mwiza 
Ntabwo ntinya urupfu ahubwo ndapfa 
Ntuzigera wibagirwa ibyo 
Nagerageje kwibagirwa ko yarize
Nari mpangayikishijwe nuko yemera icyifuzo cyanjye 
Ugomba gutekwa kugeza igihe uhiye wose 
Kuko nshaka kuyikubira
Muri iyo minsi isukari ntiyari ifite agaciro kuruta umunyu 
guhamagara ariko yanga gucamo 
Bobo ifunguro ryawe rirakonja Umunota umwe gusa Nzaba mpari 
yahawe katanga ka mbere ubwo yaremwaga 
Ubu bwoko bwumuziki nikintu abantu bakuze bafite ikibazo cyo kubyumva 
Imvubu yicyagane ya ruhungabanyabitebo
Nakoze mu cyigisho cyanjye umugore wanjye amaze kuryama 
Ifungiye i Rwinkwavu kwa Sovanye
Nabakoreye ibibi ariko neer byari bibid
Ntabwo rwose uri umuswa nibyo 
bityo tukaba twiyumvisha ukuntu Yakobo yakundaga kumutega amatwi 
Kandi umunezero wagiye
Menyesha iminsi ushobora kuza 
ryo gushakisha Uwiteka Imana ya ba sekuruza imitima yabo yose nubugingo bwabo bwose

kari kavuye muri rya koti ryanjye maze ndagafata
Ndibuka umunsi impanuka yabereye

Nuko namwe nimubona ibyo bisohoye

barahirira imbere ya Perezida wa Repubulika 
Iyi myambarire nini kuri njye 
Nukuri ko ari mwiza ariko arikunda

ndetse n izigenga mu gihugu 
Ntabwo nakubajije

uburyo bukoresha ikoranabuhanga
Mu Buyapani hari isoko rikomeye ryumuceri 
Ngwino mu kanwa kijimye

kandi mfite ubwoba ko baba barisenyeye imibereho yabo

batorwa n Inteko Rusange  Manda yabo imara imyaka itanu
rugerwaho cyane n ingaruka z iki kibazo kurusha problem

cyane bifite umwimerere wabyo byaremanywe

uzarangira mumitekerereze yabo mbere yuko batangira

yumubyeyi wumumama numwana

kubiregerwa mu nkiko bibaye ngombwa

n Inteko Rusange kuri manda y imyaka
Kirima na Mukandoli ntibaryama mucyumba kimwe

Ibi ntabwo ari byiza cyane 
basabye nyina ko nagaruka kubasura
Turahunga ntabwo twigeze tugera cyangwa ngo turenze
Ntembera neza namaso yanjye inkweto zanjye
Sohora isanduku reka abaririra baza
Niba yarishimye cyane kuba yarambonye
wanguriraga nibyo byampumye amaso bituma ngambanira umuvandimwe 
Yajyanye iyo ngeso mu mva ye

AMAHAMBA YABUNGERI BINGURUBE
Niba abimenye rwose azarakara cyane 
Imana yaravuze iti Maze kandi mbaha namasabato yanjye 
Kuri kubyinakubyina wabaye iki
Nyamuneka reka nkemure ibi 
Trix atwara bisi naho Mukandoli nuyobora ingendo
Ntukamenya ko nkomeye
bwinshi kuko biteza umubiri gushaka guhaza irari riwangiza
Umuntu ninyamaswa yonyine ivuga 
Niba kandi iyo Fairy knight itabeshya
Tom yirukanye Mariya hanze
gutanga ubuhamya bwiza bwemeza 
umwuga wo kwigisha uratandukanye
Ibyo byamfashije cyane 
yatakaye  igitekerezo amasegonda make
burya wasanze maze
Kuba yararazwe ubwenge bukomeye
havuyemo agapapuro ngira amatsiko yo kugasoma
Ninde uzaba uwanyuma mubihe byanyuma byiminsi yanjye
Ndamugiriye impuhwe urumva neza
Masaru yaba ko ari umwere 
umwe bagendana duturanye muri cartier
Umuntu yavuze ko Mariya yahoraga atinda mu materaniro 
Munsi yikizenga cya zahabu na opal
Turi mu kaga ko kudaha agaciro iki kintu 
Nahaye Mariya imiti igomba gufasha 
Niba kandi raporo yabo ari impamo
bitewe nuko ducisha bugufi imitima yacu imbere yImana 
Ibitekerezo bye byarahubutse
Kuki wabwiye Tom Mary ko ari mubi
Naje kuba mu baturanyi nuko ndinjira kugira ngo ndebe uko Bobo ameze 
Nzagushakisha iyo nsuye New York 
Ubu nari kureka abana bakarara bicaye
Nibagiwe gushyira kashe ku ibahasha 
Nashakaga kwizera ko Bobo abeshya 
Ubuntu bwawe ni umunsi mushya gusa
igihembo papa amuguriraubwo
kwemerera abana kurya ibyo bishakiye 
abantu batazateshurwa ngo bave mu murongo utunganye winshingano 
gihagararo no mu marangi by iyo
Gari ya moshi ikurikira izahaguruka ryari 
Azaba umushumba azaba umuyobozi
Tom yashakaga gusaba Mariya ubutoni bukomeye 
atyo kellia yegura umutwe aramureba

umwe mu mirimo yaryo bagomba kubika ibanga
Kuri njye mbona byose azi

byifujwe n Umuyobozi Mukuru cyangwa   cy abayigize

Yamubwiye urwenya ariko ntiyaseka

ukayakurikiza  d Yehova Imana

ELYONIMANA ISUMBA BYOSE   
Abantu baracyakoresha iryo jambo koko 
Mbabarira ariko urashobora kumfasha 
Ubwo bwato bwari bwuzuye impunzi zaturutse muri Cuba 
biteguranywe ubushishozi kandi bitetswe neza 
Ndareba firime hafi buri munsi 
Ubwo buryo bwo gushimisha ntaho buzakugeza 
Nshobora kugutwara ibyo niba ubishaka 
kuko yagiye adasazeye kandi agenda asize Linda 
imirasire ivuye ku zuba
Genda usimbukire mu kiyaga
Umuforomokazi yamusabye kugerageza kugenda 
Nigute wavuye mubikorwa 
Sinzi niba niteguye ibi

ngo ahagarare imbere yanjye mu cyuho ahagarariye

Nzakura nzishima ningeza iyo myaka
Ni ryari wahuye numuryango wa kazitunga

Tom yabwiye Mariya kubikora
Bizareka igihe mbere yuko ubikora 
Ndashaka ko mwita cyane ku gutegurira 
Ni bo bareka inzira zitunganye

bwaciwe intege busigara nta kamaro

Ibyo ukize rwose urubyiruko rwa mbere rwabonye

KWAGURA  Gut   niyagura igihugu
Kuguha ibyo wampaye byose
Gutezimbere ikirere cyose
bitewe gusa no kubona ko nta mwanya
nta byinshi nkubwiye nzajya nkubwira uko gahunda zifashe
Buri gihe ahora afite umusatsi 
Ntukomeze kumbaza 
Urugomo ruramugaza
Guhumeka yego kureka umuzimu akagenda
Kuva mu iyerekwa ryatangiye
ukaza kurya imboga ku ifunguro ritaha 
Igitaramo cyagenze neza cyane 
Tuzatangira ibirori kazitunga ageze hano 
Nzavuga ntekereza ku bantu Bakora iki 
Mushiki wanjye yashimangiye ko tujyana
Chris asa nuwishimiye rwose kuba hano 
umenya yantwikira nkurikije uko nabonye yandakariye 
wangiwe kongerewa igihe ushobora kuregera
Umukiza mwiza wibambe yarlmana yigir umuntu

Ahabu aramusubiza ati Hasigaye undi mugabo tubasha kugishisha inama Ariko ndamwanga 
Nari maze kugenda bagezeyo 
Nkuko bikomeye cyangwa uko bishoboka

mu mateka y icyo gihugu cyo muri afurika
Umutekano kuruta imitima yose nimva zose
wicyo babonye cyose kandi ngo bagire ububabare

Trix ntiyitaye kubyo Mukandoli yavuze

Numva meze neza niba utagiyeyo wenyine 
Tom amwenyura kuri Mariya
Muri iyo minsi nagiye kuryama kare 
Tom yicaye ku ntebe iruhande rwa Mariya
Akaba ali we urakara kukurenza 
Niba imvura iguye kumusozi hakonje mubibaya 
Kurambura uburebure bwuzuye feza ishaje ya zahabuinkoni
ntacyo bitwaye ntakibazo kirimo Fabiora agumya
mu byumba byo gufunguriramo 
Ariko umwanawe yakize
Ati Enda dukomeze turohe mu nda
Iki kintu gikoreshwa iki

rw ukuboko rwo kwererezwa mbyatse Abisirayeli 
ku buryo bwamategeko adakuka 
wa Kigarama  mu Karere ka Kicukiro  established in Kigarama Sector  Kicukiro
none nibwo mu mugiriye impuhwe

ubundi kuba bwiza bigomba kwiganwa ubuhanga 
Igihe nageraga murugo nagiye kuryama

Tom yagiye kunywa inzoga nyinshi

Ntabwo mfite umunsi nkunda
Nishimiye ko nshobora kuba serivisi 
baramenyerejwe bakiri batoya kurya
Ni gake niba ari rimwe asoma igitabo 
Iyo aza kuba wenyine muri kiriya gihe yari gupfa 
Tugomba rwose kuyikandagira 
Ikintu cyo kugereranwa no gutema ibiti
Mukandoli yakoze amakosa menshi mukizamini cye
ubundi inda ayirambika kumuyaga inzira ayihata

igihugu igaragaza ibisabwa kuri buri

Abagore bose batekerezaga ko Chris yari mwiza rwose 
Turashaka cyane cyane kugutangaza kuri uku kuri

kazitunga yashakishije ibikoresho bye byambere ariko ntiyabibona

wo kumpanagura amarira narize Fabric babarira

maze bambwira ko Samantha twagendeye rimwe

ko kugica munsi ubona noneho atangiye kugenda
Nasabye ubufasha bwa data

yabonaga hafi ahita amubaza ati Linda arihe
Ndabaza niba ibi ari bibi 
Sinigeze mbona ibintu nkibyo mbere 
Umubare wabantu bishingikiriza kumagambo 
Hamwe no kugaragara neza
namahame agenga ubuzima bwiza 
Niba ufite ibibazo nzagufasha 
mu gihe cyikigeragezo ntikigenewe abantu 
Mariya niwe muti wa bombi
Twinjije miliyoni mu misoro ya leta
Imyitozo ngororamubiri irakenewe cyane ku batirinda 
kwiki gihe zaje gusobanuka kubwo umuhati

n igihe kimaze amezi arenga atandatu
imbaraga zo kubyihanganira

Chris buri gihe asa nkaho yinubira ikintu

bikagira ingaruka mbi cyane ku myigire yumunyeshuri
ubwo se anyanze ko ntashobora
gushaka  gushyiraho no gusezerera inama

Muburyohe bwimbuto nubuntu bwindabyo

arizo gutwara abantu n ibintu  amabanki  ubwishingizi

guhitamo umuntu ushinzwe kwegeranya

aho yisubirira inyuma ntanijambo

bwite  gufasha gucunga icyateza ingorane

KA GASABO  SERIVISI UBUTAKA  IMITURIRE 
Ubwo buryo bwuburyo butajyanye nigihe 
mukagoroba barimo gutaha
Igicaniro ntabwo kiri hano karekare
batabatanze ngo batsembe vuba
David na Jane ntibigera babonana muri iki gihe 
Hariho amaraso kumusenyi
Urantumye 
Sinshobora kwizera ko waje hano wenyine 
Tom nta kundi yari kubigenza uretse gusaba Mariya kumufasha 
Tom na Mariya basaze murukundo
Ibi bisobanuro byangiza ibirori byanjye
aravuga ati  mugaruke mureke ibigirwamana
kunywa nabonaga uretse ko numvaga ntanashonje njye
Batanze igitekerezo cyiza 
Bamujugunye hamwe nawe  ubwoba hagati yabo
Turashobora kubona ko ishaje cyane kuva kuri velomoro yambutse
Ni ryari uzavugana nanjye 
Kubera ko atabona mu maso hanjye Kuberako
Iri jambo ryatsinzwe Gakwaya amatora 
Ntabwo tuzongera kubikora 
Igihe Eliya yabonaga Isirayeli irushaho kwimbika mu gusenga ibigirwamana 
uwafatiriwe ibintu byose bishyirwa mu cyamunara
ya   ntirwari rushoboye guhangana n ibihe bya nyuma ya

azi neza ko afite amakuru y isoko
wawe ushobora kugabanyuka mukwezi gutaha

ku mazu cyangwa uburenganzira

ko yari yibeshye inomero ye

kuwa   rishyiraho Igitabo cy Amategeko 
Igihe cyari kigeze ngo Imana ivugane nabo ikoresheje kubahana ibihano
cyangwa afitanye isano ku buryo
guhitamo no kugena inshingano mu bikorwa
igifu kiba kimeze neza ku buryo
icyaha nubugome bishobora kugwira 
Hakozwe gahunda y ibiruhuko by umwaka wa   inayishyira mu bikorwa 
kandi uburyo umwami na rubanda bajyaga gukorwa ku mutima byajyaga guteza ivugurura rikomeye muri Isirayeli 
ntushobora na rimwe kongera kubahwa no kubahwa
Kumuriro ukoresheje ukwezi kumanitse 
yayo  N ububasha bwayo buri mu mitsi y inda yayo 
Mbere yuko njya kuryama nashyizeho isaha yo gutabaza irindwi 
Ntabwo ari nka Chris kudahamagara 
Trix yerekeje hasi hafi yibirenge bya Mukandoli
neza mu buryo bworoheje ukabirinda ibirungo
tutazosubira guhura je nawe canke Mama wawe kuko we aza
Nanga iyo imyenda yanjye ihumura umwotsi w itabi 
Umuntu wese utabyemerewe ugurisha amasashe
Nasomye umugabo wahagaze kuvuga
Ni ryari uheruka kwambara ikote 
Nkahantu heza nko mugihugu cyawe
kandi mu byukuri bakorera ibigirwamana 
Uwo ni Mikaya mwene Imula
Byantwaye ibyumweru bitatu kugirango ndenge imbeho 
Umusaza wari wicaye ku ntebe 
tubasha kwibonera amatunda atarangwamo kubora
Inyeshyamba zatsinzwe akimara gutsinda
gukorana n ibigo n imishinga bikora 
Ntabwo ndagusetsa maraya ukiri muto
Ntabwo ndi murugo ku cyumweru Serhiy
Banza uhaguruke hanyuma wicare hano

nashaka undi mugore  ntakagire icyo agabanya ku bimutunga n imyambaro kandi ntakagire icyo agabanya
Ndahamagaye mvuye i Boston 
Icyampa ababyeyi banjye bakandeka nkabikora 
Nari mu nzira
ndikurotaguzwa aza kuryama iruhande rwanjye
Gakwaya afite ikibazo kuri ibyo 
baba bikururiye uburwayi kurutaho
Umwuzure mugari inyuma

ugashyirwamo umwete kandi ugakoranwa ubuhanga

hari abasore barenga  bamaze kwiyandikisha

bukigaragara hamwe na hamwe mu mashuri

kugira ababwiriza   maze abavandimwe biyemeza kugira ikoraniro

igihe barimo kurya

butumwa ngira nti ishya nihirwe nibyo nkwifurije

Ubwoko bwiyo ndwara bushobora no kwihinduriza
Uvubira impavu zo muri bwo imvura nyinshi
kandi ntakiza ubugingo bwe cyangwa ngo avuge ati  ese iki kiri mu kuboko
Yumviswe mu banzi buriya muhanzi
Nari umufuka natakaje mucyumba ejo 
Icyemezo cyemerera gutanga ubuhamya mu buryo
bwamafilme agezweho naho
Kuri aya manota yawe atatu yimyaka icumi nigice

mu muryango  mu mibanire ye

Nishimiye cyane

ayo mafumba  arekurira izo

Tom yahaye Mariya igitabo
mirongo itanu n ubugari bw imikono makumyabiri n itanu 
Mariya akunze kwambara imyenda yubururu
Mariya yatunguwe cyane ageze mu rugo avuye ku kazi asanga Bobo yamaze gutegura ifunguro rya nimugoroba 
Nari kureka mbere yuko nkora ako kazi muri iyi sosiyete
kandi bishimira ko Umukiza wacu ari muzima 
birumviana steven na max bari
kazitunga arashobora kurya hafi ya byose uretse ibishyimbo 
Mukomeza mutyo gucogoza igifu

nisamye yambonye maze ndamwaragurika ahita

Nuko Francis arayifata arayifungura ahita abonamo
Ntabwo rwose nkunda umuziki wa Noheri

ntarinigeze mbona ububi bwiki gikanzu ahubwo

n Umujyi wa Kigali igafatira ingamba abarangwaho imikorere itanoze

iyo bataza gukerensa ubushobozi Imana yabahaye

haje abagabo ariko ntazi aho baturuka

rwose Reka abana batinya cyangwa bivovotera

agomba kumvira muruganda kuko nazashiduka

gisigaye iyo kirengeje amezi atatu

cyangwa mubucuruzi ukoresheje uburyo bwo

ubushobozi Imana yabahaye 
ko bene iyo mirire izanira abayirya ibibazo

n itako ry iburyo Byose abishyira mu gafuka

abarebere ko nta kibazo Nuko igikorwa kirakorwa

MU MUTUNGO BWITE WAYO
Kugwa ibiti byose birekuye
Rindira imvura mugihe ibicu byirabura
Kandi varlet ebyiri zanyuma zayoboye umuborogo
Kubera ko nagendaga vuba cyane nari mugihe cya gari ya moshi iheruka 
Niba utazi inzira baza umupolisi 
Yateze amatwi umururumba kandi yitegereza umugambi
Kugira ngo wishime ugomba kumarana umwanya numuntu ukunda
Iki nigitabo nashakaga gusoma 
Paulo yifuzaga cyane kubonera no gukiranuka akananirwa kubyishyikiriza 
Mumutima wanjye ushaje ukora icyatsi
Nyamuneka kora uburiri bwanjye 
Yagumye muri ako gace igihe gito 
gucukura cyangwa gukeberwa imbago
Ndakeka ko abantu bose batekereza ko nkunda Mariya 
Tom na Mariya bahora batongana
Nzabwira Tom akazi gakomeye wakoze 
Muri ubwo buryo ababyeyi baba babiba imbuto
ukurikira ufatwa nk umusaruro umukoresha
Nizihaga zihundagarire mu bizenga
kuva akiri muto kwimenyereza ibyo kwirinda
umutima wahise umvamo ndatekereza nti ubwo birarangiye
Ku munsi wo kurekura Billie Eilish yagize ati 
Ntuzigere wumva amagambo nkurwembe
Een aho dukina kandi hirya no hino
Kubera ko amajwi yo kwigaragambya yarushagaho kwiyongera ijambo rye ntirishobora kumvikana 
Fabric na Fabiora bagiye
kuyigabanyisha kuburyo imyenda ibegera neza
david nawe ati eee ariko mn willia 
Umugabo arakora kandi arota ko Eva ari umwere
Turashobora gukoresha ibitekerezo bishya 
Nkuko byoroshye izuba riva
Abantu bararakaye hejuru yinyanja
Ariko guhora mu mutwe
bibaganisha ku byokurya bitamerera neza ubuzima bwabo 
Tugomba guhamagara Chris 
ntakibazo ariko ndakeka ntakibi naraye nkoze gusa
Yari aryamye mu buriri igihe kirekire 
Nabonye icupa ryumusatsi wirabura wirabura mumababi yimiti 
Yavuze ko azanyandikira ariko ntabwo yanditse 
ndi kumwe n icyaga twahize ubugabo
Nari nicaye ntegereje ku ntebe 
Bazatangira gutema ryari 
Tom yamenye ko Mariya ashobora kuba ananiwe
Bene nkabo banihishwa numutwaro 
nuko ageze kumeza yirira imineke
Ni ryari uheruka gukuramo inkoko 
Uratekereza ko umushahara muto ugomba kuzamurwa 
Abafaransa abiruka kwiruka bakabafata
Kandi ubukuru buva mu kirere
bishimye byahati jack aba abajije
Abaje kureba uwo yaguye mu maso baba bameze bate
Nabahungu uruhanga rwabakurambere
Biragaragara ko tugiye mu rusengero 
kandi mujye mweza amasabato yanjye 
Turashobora gufata urugendo 
Ntabwo nkeka ko wifuza kumenya 
Tom arakaye yirukana Mariya
Wita nyoko iki 
mu rusengero rwa Yehova  babishyira mu rugo r rw inzu ya
gusa nari nasize mubwiye ko ntari butinde

ntacyabaye ngo ririya ni iterabwoba boss ari
Ntabwo ari urupfu ntinya ahubwo ni ugupfa 
ELOHIMUWITEKA UMUREMYI WA BYOSE  
Amasezerano y umurimo yo ku rwego
mu banyabwenge bo mu mahanga bose no mu bwami bwabo bwose 
tugomba kwita cyane kandi tukarinda 
Ntiyashoboraga kumureba mu maso
Tuza iteka ubuziraherezo 
ibyo nahize ibyo guhunga nabigize terera iyo umwami
ngo bamenye impamvu nyakuri ibitera
David ntabwo yigeze aba umuhanga cyane mu kuvuga igifaransa 
idashidikanywaho mumujyi Akinisha 
Birashoboka ko David atabyishimiye 
niba atari ko biri se kuki bari bahamagariwe guteranira i Karumeli 
mbese imibereho ya benshi muri twe izavugwa ite
Igihe twari mu ishyamba hakurya ya Parike ya Gowbarrow 
Buri gihe ukoreshe amazi yamenetse mubyuma kuko gukoresha amazi asanzwe 
mfatanyabikorwa ze kandi izo manza cyangwa
cyane ko na Samantha nawe yatekerezaga icyo ari bukoreshe
Umuyobozi wuyu mujyi yashinjwaga kuba yarateze amatwi ibyo abaturage basabye 
Hariho abana benshi bahawe uburere bwabahinduye
Nibagiwe ko uyumunsi wari umunsi wabasazi
gukora sport kwigare yikubita
Mushiki wanjye na murumuna wanjye
Mu burengerazuba izuba rirasa ritinze
kazitunga arabyishimira igihe Mariya aje kumusura mu bitaro 
Uburwayi bwumugabo we bwamuteye guhangayika cyane 
Chris asa nuwishimiye cyane kuganira na Mariya 
Ntibyari bikonje cyane ariko byahoraga bitose 
Tom ejo yarogeje umusatsi 
Trix na Mukandoli ntibakunze gukora ibintu hamwe
Mu kiraro cyubwato Ndaryamye
Ntabwo nizera ko ugiye gusaba Mariya kurongora 
Tolling yibutsa inzogera yagumishaga amasaha
ariko weho ndakwingingiye ngo kwizera kwawe kudacogora 
n abakora iterabwoba cyangwa gutera inkunga
Tom ntazi niba Mariya amukunda 
Sinatekerezaga ko ibaho koko
Fabiora agisohoka aho akorera asanganirwa
Iyo umuyaga uhumeka neza utuje nubwo aribyo
Ko Alegizandere yafashe akabigeza  kuri Sezari
Kukwizeza ubufatanye bwihuse kandi bwitondewe
Inama ya Diyoseze igizwe n aba bakurikira 
Ibyo byagumye hasi hafi gutongana neza
Azakugira inama kuri icyo kibazo
Bobo arashaka cyane kwizera ko ibyo Mariya yavuze ari ukuri 
Natekereje ko wenda Bobo yari amaze kugerageza kubikora 
Narwanye nimbaraga zanjye zose
Mariya yubitse amaso
Nabonye ubutumwa Mbaraga yashakaga kundeba 
Yamubajije niba ari Jane 
Ndasaba gutandukana nawe kuriyi ngingo 
Yatuye ko yamennye vase 
Ntabwo byari impanuka Umuntu yatwitse inzu 
Tom yahaye Mariya amafaranga menshi
Tom yasabye Mariya kumubwira impamvu yamusize 
Ntawamenya igihe bazazira 
Bafite uburenganzira bwiza bwo kumvikana aha hantu 
Yishimiye uburangare butangaje
Yarebye mu muryango inyuma ye maze avugana
Tom yahagaritse kuvugana na Mariya
Tom yahaye Mariya gusunika gato
Ufite impano yumuziki 
Bwana Tanaka yibeshaho akora iduka ritoyi hafi ya sitasiyo

YA SHYOGWE   EER D SGWE

ngaho dutange comments zacu

UMUGEREKA WA MBERE  ISHYIRWA MU BIKORWA RY IMYANZURO Y INTEKO ISHINGA AMATEGEKO

kandi ibi bibazo bigakemuka

munzu Fabiora aratatse cyaneeeee……

no kwirinda mu mirire yanyu

KOMEZA UMUTWE WANJYE

jack ati egokoubwo se

yambere kuri Willian Muri Arsenal Imbere muri 
mu ikurikirana ry igihombo bagira uburenganzira 
Uyu munsi ni vendredi kandi nakoze ibyo nkora hafi buri wa gatanu

mu isinagogi bajya kwa Simoni na Andereya

yego yubahirizwa gute  niba ariwe

nk uko Yesu yishwe  Umunara w Umurinzi

ahibwo sha Li babarira Henry nukuri dore

yewe ntanubwo anzi kandi nanjye
Washakaga kumbona mvunitse
Muri iryo joro ararwara afite ububabare mu nda 
nimico mibi byiki gihe byica imibereho nubuzima
Yavuze ko ibintu byose binyibukije kandi bigatuma atekereza cyane 
Oya humura mushiki wanjye
zimyakura ikora nabi kandi amabwiriza baha abana
Nashoboraga kubyina ijoro ryose
cyangwa nintegeka inzige ngo zone igihugu cyangwa ninohereza mugiga mu bantu banjye

UMUVUGO VIII
Nyuma yakazi Chris ahora ananiwe

Mu manza zigomba kuburanishwa mu gihe

aho rwamye inanga ndutikura mo indekwe

ubwo ibirori byari birimbanyije
Umunyamuryango w Ishyanga ryera

dan yagomba kuba yaribagiwe urufunguzo rwe

Ntabwo wanshakishije ntabwo wantoye

cyU horaho kandi mubigisha

itatugomwUmwana wayo nta kind yatwimye 
no mu yindi miryango

Iyo nkuru niyamamare abantu bose bazi 
inkuta ndende cyane zigera ku
Ndifuza ko twarangiza uyu munsi

ryacyo  gushyikiriza umukoresha ibibazo byazo
w Akagari ashyira mu bikorwa ibyemezo the implementation of the decisions
Nakubajije iki kibazo mbere 
Chris buri gihe agomba kugira inzira ze 
cyakozwemo ibikorwa bitandukanye birimo
urwenda na mirongo itatu 
Mu kirere ijwi rye riranyeganyega
kuko ijambo ry umwami ryari ryamuzinuye 
Icyo gihe nta gari ya moshi yari ihari mu Buyapani 
Urashaka rwose kwambara iyo karuvati 
cyane akumva amugiriye agahinda 
Nibagiwe kuzana ikintu cyo kwandika 
Ntabwo nzabyemera kugeza igihe nzabyumva kuri Bobo 
Yatakambiye abonye inzoka 
Abakozi ntibamanutse mu kirombe muri iryo joro
uko habaho kwigomeka ku butegetsi bwe 
Bafashe impano zabo guhitamo na benshi
Ntabwo nkomoka mu rusengero
Ariko guhumuriza umuntu kubibazo bye
ibyo byatumye ntekereza kubyo nari maze kubona bitandukanye
Iteka rya Minisitiri riha ubuzimagatozi 
Wandike iyo myenda neza mbere yo kuyimanika
Ariko ubundi wabiretse bikareka kugutesha umutwe
Ugiye kurya kiriya gikombe

rikuru rishaka gushingwa n umuntu ku giti cye
Nibyo nkuko nashakaga gusimbuka neza

uburakari bwa Yehova bugurumanira iki gihugu

wo kumenya kwigomwa no gukorera

Tuzaguhamagara

nyina udashobora kubona imyenda
mbura uburyo nza kukureba kuko nari njyenyine mu cyumba
Yabaye impfubyi afite imyaka icumi

igihe kitarenze icyumweru amatora ageze mu muriro

Muri iyo myumvire iryoshye iyo ibitekerezo bishimishije

buhoro bibanesheje bikabakururira

byerekeye uko ziteye  Icyakora  inyandiko

Yoo Mumbabarire ubusazi nagize

bijyana na byo mu buryo bwemewe

Ntacyo nakora uretse kwica

indyo yoroheje yuzuye kandi ifitiye 
Bakunda kuvuga ngo yaravumbutse

wose uri  mubanzanire mbohereze bagende igihugu

SHAMMAHUWITEKA ARI HANO

wawe boss papa angella ati hhm

ku munsi ashyiriweho umukono

Byakurinda umugore winkozi zibibi
yabana babo nimibereho myiza yubwenge bwabo 
Kirima na Mukandoli ntibakibonana
Yahumeka umwuka ukonje 
Nzamugurira iyi meza 
yari yihishemo ikoresheje umumarayika wayo 
Ntabwo bose ari bo umuriro wubuzima bwanjye uzaba ushushe
Umwuka wumusizi ukingura urugi
Tom abona Mariya gatatu mu cyumweru
ndabona ntazi ahantu nkuzi umugore nawe ati 
Nashakaga guhamagara ariko nibagiwe 
Inyandiko zacu zerekana ko utarishyura 
Ntabwo nigeze njya i Boston mbere 
kellia ati ahubwo njye nagize ngo
mu igenzura ry imitangire ya serivisi    
Yemwe ibisigo yewe ubufasha bwanjye busanzwe
ko ingaruka zidateye ubwoba nkuko babitekereza 
Ugomba guhamagara Chris

bwanjye buzashyingirwa numuntu ugukunda
nirari kuzateza abantu akaga kubumuga bwumubiri
Ibyishimo byuzuye kandi bituje
Intumbi zanyu zizagwa muri ubu butayu 
Iyo si yo ngingo ivugwa 
kugira ngo ubone kwibuka no kumwarwa
Nyamuneka reba kuri iyo shusho

uko byagenze biranyobera kumbe yari yumvise
Inyenyeri ndwi mumazi atuje
Nahagurutse hari urubura hanze

ROHIUWITEKA UMUNGERI WACU 
Ese ibyo byakubayeho mbere 
Icyubahiro cye ni ishyari rye bizamurimbura
barigeze babona agira ikibazo ikibazo icyari cyo cyose ibi
Umugoroba umwe ubwo yagendaga ukuboko
ngororamubiri ushobora gushira inshuti
Imico myiza Imana ishyira kumutwe we
Ibihe byashize byaje kuva mubitekerezo bye
n ayinjijwe kuri buri mugabane 
Ukuntu nakunze izuba ryinshi
Niyihe gahunda ukunda kuri TV
Iyo nta kintu gisigaye gukora ukora iki 
Ubu bicaranye mu madiva yo kwa enoki
Duheruka fabric abaza Fabiora icyo yari bukore ngo
Mbaraga arimo yitwaza gusa ko atabizi 
ubumuga mu Mutwe w Abadepite 
Bukeye bwaho mu gitondo ni bwo twamenye ukuri 
Yavuze ko aramutse ahari azamufasha 
kubwaho yari ari ugereranyije numwanya wo hejuru 
Benshi bameze nka Esawu 
Muvandimwe gusunika ibimasa mumatongo yisi
Ni ryari uheruka kubona kazitunga yambaye karuvati 
Ndagusaba ko wabiganiraho na Gakwaya

yamavuta nisukari ryakomeje kwiganza

GUSUKUMA  Ye   amavi asukuma

ku wa mutarama  rigenga imiryango idaharanira inyungu
ubwoko bw ibibazo byakiriwe
