UMUTWE WA   IMPUSHYA  IMBAGO
kazitunga yashoboraga kujya kubyina na Mariya ariko ntabwo yagiye 
Inguge na Achille ikomeye
Ubwira iki iyi gahunda 
Mbe Diane azo guma muvyishimo vyubuzima nkivyo
Ntabwo twigeze tubona ibintu nkibi nkiri umwana 
imiryango itanga serivisi z ubufasha 
Nubwo atari hamwe no Kwizera 
Kuyavuga si ko kuyarangiza inyuma
Tom yashyize ikindi giti ku muriro
bakarurekurira rimwe rukagwa rumeze
Yabazanye izuba rirashe uyumunsi
Izina yaryiswe ko riba umuntu
Ndi umuhanga wo kumenya abagabo hasi kandi muremure
Nzakubwira ibyaribyo byose ngeze murugo 
Ndahamagaye ngo mvuge muraho 
bwo gukoresha indyo yoroheje Nimubigishe
Asezeye ku bwende bwe akabyemererwa
Nzi neza ko Bob azatsinda ikizamini 
Yajugunywe umugore wo murugo
Ntabwo byari impamvu nari hano
Arimo kuba muri hoteli ihenze
kandi agatuma umugati utamerera neza
Isi irahunga nkimbuto zumye
Njye mbona bigaragara ko yibeshye 
Tom yagiye kwa Mariya amwongorera mu gutwi 
Ntabwo nashoboraga kumenya neza 
nabonye muri ninshuti cyane
Sinigeze nshaka ko hagira ikintu na kimwe kibaho 
mu gihugu cyacu uranduke 
Ko mbyina nkaba mfite diyama
Twaryamye ku buriri burebure 
Yariye inshuro ebyiri amafaranga wariye 
bagasuzugura amategeko agenga ubuzima bwiza 
kubera uruhare rwabo muri iryo kurikirana 
Natekereje ko nabikubwiye ejo 
Imvune yateje umukinnyi ububabare bukabije 
Ibyo byari ibintu bishya kuri njye 
utagunda niyo wakora ibyiza binganiki ntacyo biba bimubwiye 
cyntia nawe ati shn simbizi pe
Kubyifuzo byinshi nuburyo bwiza
Kandi yafatanye uburemere umukino wurukundo
Buri munyarwanda wese ufite ubushobozi nk uko
Iyo mpuye nawe nibuka nyoko 
nabi ikigo cyubuzima cyangwa ngo bibere urwitwazo 
Tom yakoze amakosa menshi 
Wowe wasinziriye munsi yamaso
Ntakindi mwarimu asuzugura kwihanganira
Ariko noneho yogeje imisatsi ivi
Robin asa neza cyane iyo asinziriye 
Ibicu nkibibabi bya roza
Tom na Mariya bafite ubuzima bwibyabaye
Kwijujuta kwinyanja
Nta wigeze gusa na Ahabu wiguriye gukora ibyangwa nUwiteka 
Uzababazwa nibi byose 
Kuki amagambo yanjye meza yirengagijwe

Ariko guhura ntitwifuza
Bwira Mbaraga ko tutagiye kumufasha 
Sinashoboraga kwihanganira kubona ugenda
kutitonda no kureshya utubari twizuba
Akimara kurya atangira kugenda 
inyama bitangiriye kuboneka ku meza 
mutitaye cyane ku guhitamo imirire bakwiriye gufata 
Uri umugore nkunda 
Kandi ukande ibintu byose namaboko yombi
ryahinduwe kandi ryujujwe kugeza ubu ihinduwe

Iyi ni ifoto yanjye mfite imyaka itatu

duheri bari bafite ariko bafashwe ninkorora

Niba Tom aje mbwira

ICYICIRO CYA   INAMA Y UBUGENZUZI
mutungo w igihangano bugarukira
yatangiraga kuzamura akaboko ngo akubite
Kandi ntukanguke uvuza amagufwa namagufwa
kandi rero yajyaga kugumya kuba yo iteka 
imeze nkumutego ku miryango yabo 
kazitunga azi uwishe imbwa ye ariko ntazatubwira

njye uko undeba nigize nkaho ntacyabaye kidasanzwe
akiri mashyashya mu gihe kinini cyumwaka

ngo ntangire nsome dore uko kari kanditse

muzahereko muvuge muti  Abusalomu yimye

bwo bwifuza urugomo  
Aho kunanirwa imishyikirano yacu yagenze neza 
bityo rero dukwiriye gukoresha ubwenge bwacu 
N iyo mugiye kuri Komini 
Ntushaka gutose no gufata imbeho fata rero uyu mutaka 
ndetse no mu mpfuruka zijimye zisi 
ukore ikivange cyifu yumugati 
kazitunga niwe wenyine uzi igihe dukeneye kuba duhari 
Tom na Mariya bagombaga guhindura gahunda zabo
Sinshobora kwizera ko urya ibyo bintu 
umubiri akamaro ku buryo ibyo byokurya bibasha
Agatebe aragashikamira ukwo ari
bitanga amahirwe yo guhitamo imirire 
Nagukunze  nkikubona bwa mbere
Nahamagaye ndwaye muri iki gitondo 
Ntabwo ari umunyamahanga rwose
Nibitekerezo bidasanzwe
witeramakofe hagati yinzoga nurumogi
Iyo myenda ihuye numusatsi we utukura

n umugore ngo abe umukiranutsi

Na Aruns wa Volsinium
Ahantu hose umurimo wivugabutumwa mu buvuzi 
Kuva mu nyanja ya populoniya

Munsi yintoki zabo zumuhindo kare
Abakurambere basa nabapfuye
bibarenze ndetse byabasha no

Vuga ibyo ndota kuko birakomeye

amakuru atanze ari ukuri no kugumana kopi

Uhora ubivuga

maze imbaraga zubwenge nintekerezo bigacogora

yari afite ibyishimo habe namba ntanubwo

kandi umujinya wabo wari warabyukirijwe kwibasira intumwa zImana 
ni ho yize kimwe mu byigisho bikomeye cyane mu buzima bwe 
Ku nkuba umuntu wo mwijuru yagiye gufata ejo
atarigeze yirukanwa mu mirimo yakoze
Ibitekerezo biva hejuru birabapfukirana
Nzakumenyesha igihe ugomba guhindukira 
Wigeze uba kuri TV
Hanyuma irashobora gucika gitunguranye
Dukuramo inzoga muri sayiri
Tom yakuyemo imbunda maze agenda atuje ku ngazi 
Natoje imbwa yanjye kuza iyo mvugije 
Nasabye ko gahunda yasubikwa 
Tugomba rwose kuba munzira 
Niba igikundiro cyawe atari amayeri ababaje
Uhambiriwe nuruzitiro rugufi rwubuzima
ingabo yanjye ni isuli ya rusanganira abafite imyambi
hiyambazwa Inkiko zibifitiye ububasha 
Imana yakunze isi cyane ku buryo yatanze
Uburozi bwe bwarandwaye kandi uwanjye yaramugaruye
Ibi bizatanga urugero rwiza 
Nkeneye kumenya ko Bobo ashobora kugirirwa ikizere 
Kuva kuri nyabarongo kugeza nyabugogo
Sinzi igihe yagarutse avuye mu Bufaransa 
Madamu umuswa tekereza
by umushahara ngereranyo w ukwezi
Ndashaka ko umbwira icyo utekereza rwose
Yabajije ikibazo kubijyanye 
Nuko bateranye Pilato arababaza ati  Uwo
mu muringa byose byari mu nzu ya
ku buryo bitera ipfa kandi bikaryohera ijisho 
Tom na Mariya bari bicaye hasi
Uragukunda imyaka icumi mbere yumwuzure
Ariko cyera kandi kibi mpumura amakara ya Yesaya
kugira icyo murya  kuko ibyo
Ndabaza niba Mariya amenye ukuntu Tom ari umukene koko 
Hari ikintu kiri mu mutwe wawe
Fleeting ikora ku kintu kinyamahanga kandi cyinjira
Uko abe ari ko uzabaza umuhanuzi uti  Wowe se wabishobora
bageza umunsi Nowa yinjiriye mu nkuge ntibabimenya 
Iyo ari urumuri kandi rwiza
uko biri kose ubu yashizemo umwuka
Umutsima wayo mazi se uri he 
Ninde watashye yatinze cyane
Icyiciro cya   Gufasha uwakorewe icyaha 
Kandi guhakana kwinjira iyo babifite mumaso yabo
Azatanga byinshi kugira ngo yemerwe
mu Burusiya urugero aho igitugu gishobora gufatwa nkicyaha
Umwaka ushize namaze igihe kinini njyenyine kuburyo nibagiwe hafi kuvugana neza nabandi 
Tom yabajije Mariya izina rye ryanyuma 
Ngomba gusaba Tom kudufasha 
Birashoboka ko avuga ibinyoma 
barindwi bazafata umugabo umwe o bamubwire bati  tuzitungirwa n ibyokurya byacu kandi tuzajya twiyambika 
yaba makeya cyangwa menshi Ibirayi cyangwa 
Agomba kuba yarahaye ikiganza Icyakora
ya kellia yo ihari agiye kubona
Ishusho   Ishusho igaragaza uko abaturage 
ahera i Bērisheba ageza mu gihugu cyimisozi cya Efurayimu 
bo ntabahari kandi ko atasiga abana munzu 
Ni ryari uheruka guhindura igitabo 
amavuta yimvange yikimuri bita kreme 
Ndibuka ko yari yambaye ingofero yicyatsi 
nicira i Buvugangema na Mutakara 
Sinshobora kwizera ko yankoreye ibyo 
Umwijima wicuraburindi wubuhakanyi watwikiriye igihugu cyose
Mukara yaje kubona ko Mukandoli amureba
iyo ukoze Inshuro eshatu harigihe bikunda
Bavuze ko ikirego cye ari ibinyoma 
Tom yibagiwe kubaza Mariya icyo yateguye kumubaza 
Erekana ibitekerezo byacu nkuko twabigaragaje
Urashobora kwicara ku ntebe 
ava kukazi atinze cyane 
Amarira yamara kumanuka mumabuye yagaciro
Naho urusasu rubagenyera 
Bahindura umuhondo gusa aho bari
gace ka  o  k ingingo ya   y aya mabwiriza
ntiyongera gushukwa maze irihana 
Henry konaringiye kwa yumva bihise byikupa atarangije kumubwira
Wizera ko hariho ubuzima nyuma yurupfu 
Arsenal irateganya kugabanuka United ikangisha 
Niba hari amazi gusa hagati yurutare
Mariya akeneye kunoza amanota
Numvise ko Gakwaya na Mariya bashakanye 
hano ifu ikuramo  inzara
Kuruhande rwakabari rusange mumuhanda wa Thames
Gukorera umurimo aho ababwiriza bakenewe cyane   Kubwiriza mu ndimi z amahanga
Wowe urabya ibyo ukoraho
Ngiye kuburira Bobo ko Mariya amushaka 
Mu maso ye hari haje ikibazo gikomeye
Bene abo bantu bindahemuka babarizwaga mu basigaye bakiranuka 
Biragaragara ko batishimiye kuba hano 
Ibyo ntibyari bigoye cyane nibyo 
ivanze namata hamwe namazi meza
Kandi akura mu midugudu yi Buyuda yose ingoro nibishushanyo byizuba
